The ultimate Pettson compilations app! Compete in the brand new VS mode, beat a friend or the clock! 

"Pettson's Inventions is a great series of fun contraption games. The cooperative play, VS mode, and the large number of puzzles make the Deluxe version the best of them all." www.geekswithjuniors.com 

"Excellent educational game of creativity, engineering and skill that stretches the imagination!" www.ipadfamily.com.au 

Containing most inventions from Pettson's Inventions 1 and 2 for a smashing total of 66 stages including 6 completely new. 

Help old man Pettson and his cat Findus build their amazing inventions! Which of the objects should be included and where do they fit in the machinery? Drag and drop the parts to their right spot and watch the invention go! A fun and pedagogic app that teaches logic and stimulates creativity for children of all ages. 

- Compete against a friend or the clock in VS mode. 
- A massive 66 ingenious inventions to solve! 
- 6 brand new tricky inventions! 
- New co-op friendly layout. 
- Get help from visual instructions (optional). 
- Possibility to increase difficulty by including fake parts in the inventions. 
- Voices in English, German and Swedish. 
- No in-app purchases.

- ì‹œê°ì  ì§€ì¹¨ (ì„ íƒ ì‚¬í•­)ì—ì„œ ì§€ì›ì„ë°›ì„ ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.
- ê°€ëŠ¥ì„±ì€ ë°œëª…ì˜ ê°€ì§œ ë¶€í’ˆì„ í¬í•¨í•˜ì—¬ ì–´ë ¤ì›€ì„ ì¦ê°€ì‹œí‚µë‹ˆë‹¤.
- ì˜ì–´, ë…ì¼ì–´, ìŠ¤ì›¨ë´ì–´ ëª©ì†Œë¦¬.
- ì•„ë‹ˆ ì¸ì•± êµ¬ë§¤.

This is the perfect game to have a good time with your children. It is designed to help kids learn different species of animals by using cute puzzles for kids.

The rules of Animals Puzzles for Kids are quite simple. Have your child drag images around the screen to fit them into the shaded region.
There are over 100 puzzles in total with varying difficulties. All puzzles are free to play!

Why puzzles for kids are so important in learning?
* Toddlers develop cognitive skills
* Babies learn Hand-Eye Coordination - When children move pieces of the puzzle, they are learning the connection between their hands and their eyes.
* Puzzles for kids enhance problem solving - As a child looks at various pieces and figures out where they fit or donâ€™t fit, he or she is developing this vital skill.
* Shape Recognition - Puzzles help toddlers since the pieces need to be recognized and sorted before they can be assembled.

Features:
* Bonus memory game with animals
* Cute animals - farm, forest, jungle, water
* Spoken animal names in English
* Different difficulties - 4 to 9 pieces per puzzle
* DIfferent puzzle types
* Easy to use for toddlers and kids
* All puzzles are free
* Family Ads
* Safe hold to activate buttons
* Designed for 1 to 5 year old kids
* Pop balloons and water bubbles after each level

â€œCars for Kidsâ€ is a free learning game for children between the ages of 1 and 4.

Learning about cars, vehicles and other type of transportation has never been easier. This educational game for toddlers comes with so many learning flashcards with real pictures of cars and vehicles, so your kids can easily get to know more about them. Each of these flashcards for kids contain a high quality picture of that car, the vehicle sound and how it pronounces and spells.

Once your kids finish browsing through the entire learning flashcards, they get to take part in a fun quiz for kids to find out how many of the words they have learned. So many stars, enthusiastic applause and floating balloons are waiting for your smart kid when toddler finish the quizzes with any amount of correct answers.

This preschool educational game for toddlers has mainly been designed for children from 1 to 4 years old and the interface is so user-friendly that your kids can easily get used to it and use this kindergarten game without the parentsâ€™ supervision. The graphics is just wonderful and the car pictures and vehicle sounds are real.

â€œCars for Kids Learning Gamesâ€ offers everything you should expect from kid preschool educational apps and while itâ€™s considered as a learning cars for toddlers, it can be used as a kindergarten game as well. This game for boys and girls, supports different languages, so your kids can easily learn the name of different cars and vehicles in foreign languages. So, no matter you have a toddler, a cute boy in kindergarten or a child in preschool, weâ€™ve got you covered with amazing flashcards for kids and of course different quizzes.

Cars for Kids Learning Games Main Features at a Glance:
â€¢ Kids-friendly user interface
â€¢ Full set of learning flashcards from â€œCars and Vehiclesâ€ category is available for free
â€¢ Learn more about car, truck, plane, ship, train, fire engine, police car, tractor and many other vehicles and transportation.
â€¢ Shortened demo version of other categories: â€œJobsâ€, â€œBuildingsâ€, â€œMusical Instrumentsâ€, â€œToolsâ€, â€œFurnitureâ€, â€œKitchen Tools,â€ and â€œClothing and Shoes.â€
â€¢ Real photos of cars and real vehicle sounds
â€¢ Useful for kids between the ages of 1 and 7 years old and even for school-age children who learn the foreign languages
â€¢ Supported languages: English, German, French, Spanish, Russian, Ukrainian and Polish
â€¢ Allows toddlers learn about vehicles and car sounds with fun quizzes
â€¢ Free

This educational flashcards game for boys is really easy to use and can be easily named as your kidsâ€™ best companion when it comes to learn about cars, how they sound and how to write and spell them. On the other side, your school-age child who is learning a new language, will have free access to so many valuable words in different languages and can easily learn about them.

Download â€œCars for Kids Learning Gamesâ€ for free and let us know about any bugs, feature requests or any other suggestions. Stay tuned for more features and supported languages, and if you want your toddlers learn more words in different categories make sure to download the â€œThe Human World for Kidsâ€ full learning app.

ìë™ì°¨, ì°¨ëŸ‰ ë° ìš´ì†¡ì˜ ë‹¤ë¥¸ ìœ í˜•ì— ëŒ€í•´ ë°°ìš°ëŠ” ê²ƒì€ ì‰½ê²Œ ì ì´ìˆë‹¤. ìœ ì•„ë¥¼ìœ„í•œì´ êµìœ¡ ê²Œì„ì€ ìë™ì°¨ì™€ ì°¨ëŸ‰ì˜ ì‹¤ì œ ì‚¬ì§„ê³¼ í•¨ê»˜ ë§ì€ í•™ìŠµ í”Œë˜ì‹œ ì¹´ë“œì™€ í•¨ê»˜ ì œê³µë©ë‹ˆë‹¤, ê·¸ë˜ì„œ ë‹¹ì‹ ì˜ ì•„ì´ë“¤ì´ ì‰½ê²Œì— ëŒ€í•œ ìì„¸í•œ ë‚´ìš©ì„ ì•Œê³  ì–»ì„ ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ì•„ì´ë“¤ì´ í”Œë˜ì‹œ ì¹´ë“œ ê°ê°ì—ëŠ” ìë™ì°¨, ìë™ì°¨ ì‚¬ìš´ë“œ ê³ í’ˆì§ˆì˜ í™”ìƒì„ í¬í•¨í•˜ë©° ë°œì„± ë° ì£¼ë¬¸ ë°©ë²•.

ë‹¹ì‹ ì˜ ì•„ì´ëŠ” ì „ì²´ í•™ìŠµ í”Œë˜ì‹œ ì¹´ë“œë¥¼ í†µí•´ ê²€ìƒ‰ì´ ì™„ë£Œë˜ë©´, ê·¸ë“¤ì´ ë°°ìš´ ë°©ë²•ì„ ë§ì”€ ë§ì´ ì°¾ì•„ ì•„ì´ë“¤ì„ìœ„í•œ ì¬ë¯¸ìˆëŠ” í€´ì¦ˆì— ì°¸ì—¬í•˜ì„¸ìš”. ì•„ì´ê°€ ì •ë‹µì˜ ì–‘ í€´ì¦ˆë¥¼ ì™„ë£Œ í•  ë•Œ ì´ë ‡ê²Œ ë§ì€ ë³„, ì—´ì •ì  ì¸ ë°•ìˆ˜ì™€ ë– ìˆëŠ” í’ì„  ìŠ¤ë§ˆíŠ¸ ì•„ì´ ê¸°ë‹¤ë¦¬ê³  ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

* Please note: This game is not playable on Nvidia Tegra 2 based devices (some tablets and phones released around 2011) *

LOLA'S ABC TRAIN GAME FOR CHILDREN

The ultimate game for kids! Make learning fun with Lola's alphabet abc train! Designed for children 3 to 7-year-olds. Teach reading and writing skills and improve children's vocabulary with this great application from BeiZ!

Key Features:
âœ” Easy-to-play! Simple!
âœ” Suitable for kids at any age! Specifically designed for 3 to 7-year-olds!
âœ” Excellent graphics and music
âœ” Compatible with all Android versions above 2.2
âœ” Free!
âœ” Works with all Android phones and tablets
âœ” Available in languages: English, Chinese, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, French, German, Japanese, Norwegian, Russian, Spanish, Swedish

Guaranteed fun and education for your children with Lola Panda. Includes several fun games to play: letter drag & drop, make words, memory game, etc. Adapting difficulty levels based on child's learning progress.

â˜… 90 animal pictures situated in colorful sceneries, accompanied by authentic animal sounds and phonetic sounds of the animalsâ€™ initial letters 
â˜… 21 wonderful, professionally illustrated sceneries 
â˜… 7 alphabet phonetic sectors divided according to the Montessori methodology 
â˜… easy-to-use, child-friendly interface 
â˜… high-quality audio spoken by a professional voice-over actress 
â˜…friendly, encouraging environment 
----- 
Hello everyone! Are you up to an adventure? I am Abby the Monkey, the friend you know from a highly-successful application series by 22learn, and I have prepared one for you! If you want to EXPLORE a strange animal island and LEARN PHONETIC LETTER SOUNDS, you shouldnâ€™t wait a minute, and come with me!!!

But first let me tell you a storyâ€¦. 
****************************************** 
Once upon a time, there was an island, an island of indescribable beauty and magnificence. There found a shelter the animals small and large, slimy and furry, savage and tameâ€”all protected from evil hunters and curious eyes, supplied with food from the bountiful earth. Each year, a special event was held, when one, and only one, person from the whole humankind was selected and transported to the island (blinded, to preserve the islandâ€™s secrecy) to appreciate its beauty and spread the word about it, so that the island would never be forgotten. 

The legend has it, that deep inside the rocky hill on the island, a treasure is kept. Yet, no one knows its secret anymore because the last humankind representative had enraged the animals on the island, and since then, the animals decided never to invite anyone again, and the island got lost in time and space. 

All that remains from our knowledge is that through the whole island, a very special train goes. The train has a mind of its own and likes it when the passengersâ€™ names start from certain sounds! It is said, that if someone was ever capable to fulfill all the trainâ€™s wishes, the train would transport the lucky being deep inside the rocks and reveal the islandâ€™s precious treasure! 
****************************************** 

But, you are asking, what does all this have to do with me, monkey Abby? Well, imagine what happened to me just recently! I was flying around with my plane when, out of the blue, the storm hit and my plane got lost! 

And now, I am on this weird island that looks exactly like the legendary Phonics Island I told you about! Wohoo, how exciting! But I need someone to help me with all the strange tasks the train asks me to do! Do you want to be the one who will help me, and discover the islandâ€™s treasure together with me?

An educational and entertaining super duper game for preschool and kindergarten explorers with beautiful graphics. 

It's developed by a team of educational experts from 22learn designed to best prepare your children for success in the kindergarten curriculum. Its simple, yet modifiable, child-friendly interface offers children an engaging way to master the essential skill of PHONETIC LETTERS SOUNDS. An educational adventure application your children will love!

22learn developed this app based on the facts and he worked to inspire young children to learning phonics to jump-start the reading process.

Thank you for your purchase! We hope your children will enjoy this engaging educational application the same way our enthusiastic beta-testers did!

Looking for fun, educational games for kids to play? The PBS KIDS Games app has over 100 free learning games with your favorite PBS KIDS characters. Kids can play and explore learning anytime, anywhere!

PBS KIDS Games features 100+ games from our top shows, including Daniel Tigerâ€™s Neighborhood, Wild Kratts, Super Why, Arthur, Sesame Street, The Cat in the Hat Knows a Lot About That!, Odd Squad, Dinosaur Train, Letâ€™s Go Luna, Pinkalicious and more. 

SCHOOL GAMES FOR DISCOVERY, EXPLORATION & LEARNING! 
* 100+ FREE creative games for kids 2-8 - Play mazes, puzzles, dress-up, coloring and more
* Science game
* Math games
* Letter games
* And more!
* NEW educational games are added all the time

WINTER LEARNING GAMES
* Educational games with winter themes for the season
* Explore learning with a winter-themed interface and daily games

CREATIVE GAMES DESIGNED FOR KIDS
* School games provide a safe, friendly playing experience for toddlers and kids
* Offline games that kids can easily browse and play at home, on the road, or anywhere they go

PARENT RESOURCES
* Learn more about a TV series, such as intended age and learning goals
* Find your local PBS KIDS station schedule 
* Download related PBS KIDS apps
* Manage the amount of storage the app can use on your device

Play fun school games and join your kids on an educational adventure alongside their favorite PBS KIDS characters with the PBS KIDS Games app!

Download PBS KIDS Games and start learning and playing today!

ABOUT PBS KIDS
PBS KIDS, the number one educational media brand for kids, offers all children the opportunity to explore new ideas and new worlds through television, digital platforms, and community-based programs. PBS KIDS Games is a key part of PBS KIDSâ€™ commitment to making a positive impact on the lives of children through curriculum-based mediaâ€”wherever kids are. More free PBS KIDS games are also available online at pbskids.org/games. You can support PBS KIDS by downloading other PBS KIDS apps in the App Store.

AWARDS
* Kidscreen Award Winner (2017): Preschool - Best Game App (Tablet) 
* Parents' Choice Recommended Mobile App (2017)

PRIVACY
Across all media platforms, PBS KIDS is committed to creating a safe and secure environment for children and families and being transparent about what information is collected from users. To learn more about PBS KIDSâ€™ privacy policy, visit pbskids.org/privacy.

Cut, color, shampoo, style and dress up super cute jungle animals: sloth, leopard, toucan, elephant, bear and giraffe! 
Our top game for kids and toddlers Animal Hair Salon now takes the little ones on a crazy jungle hairstyle adventure with new adorable animals and even more makeover fun!

Jungle animals love to change how they look! Color, cut, shave, wash, dry, comb and style their hair, fur and feathers. Do fancy manicure for sloth, leopard and giraffe. Play jungle fashion designer and dress up tropical animals in crazy fashionable clothes. If your hairy salon clients get thirsty, make them fresh fruit cocktails! 

GAME FEATURES

Stylish Sloth Makeover
Lovely sloth Linda wants to get a new look, make her wish come true! Create a classy hairstyle - cut, dye, comb and style Lindaâ€™s hair. Clean up her super long nails, color them pink and cover with glitter. Dress up lady Linda with your favorite t-shirts, summer hats, sunglasses, accessories and jewelry, and take a picture of your creation! 

Leopard Amy Care
Cute leopard Amy was playing in the jungle and got dirty! Wash her fluffy fur with shampoo, dry, comb and cut Amyâ€™s hair, and make a funny ponytail on her head! Create leopard makeup and matching leopard nail art. Dress up this sweet leopard in the most adorable jungle clothes and take a photo of her!

Toucan Carnival Makeover
Toucan Rosa came here from Brazil rain forests to dress up for the Carnival! She loves bright colors and she even has a picture of her dream look. Do party makeup and color Rosaâ€™s beak bright green, orange, pink and baby blue. Free your imagination and create her the most beautiful carnival costume!

Giraffe Day Spa
Fashionista giraffe Rachel wants her favorite day spa treatments! Wash and shave her long hairy legs. Cut, shave, dye and wash her hair. Polish Rachelâ€™s nails red and surprise her with bright makeup. Play giraffe dress up, choose from punk clothes and accessories in 7 categories, and create Rachel a new punk outfit!

Baby Elephant Spa
Meet the lovely baby elephant Sarah and create her a new cute look! Wash, shower and shave her, dye Sarahâ€™s hair and tail, color the nails and do makeup. Dress up Sarah with baby girl dresses, tropical flowers, bracelets and tail ribbons! 

Bear Kim Beauty Time
Baby bear Kim looks cute even with tree leaves and sticks stuck in her fur but itâ€™s makeover time! Style her for tonightâ€™s hip hop music concert: first wash, cut and dye Kimâ€™s hair in hot pink, then design her a super cool outfit!

- A free game for kids 1-5 years old!

Welcome to App For Children - a fun game for kids 1, 2, 3 and 4 years old! App For Children contains a total of 8 games and 8 jigsaw puzzles - all in one app and optimized for both boys and girls.

App For Children is a free kids game. The puzzles and games contain over 100 fun animations of cars, fire trucks, buses, police cars, trains and much more. When a puzzle is completed it turns into a fun and entertaining game for kids.

The interface of the app has been optimized to suit toddlers and children 1 year, 2 years, 3 years and 4 years old.

The app contains the following kids games:

- Build a car
- Train
- Ice cream truck
- Police car
- My first boat
- Airplane
- Fire truck adventure
- Truck driver 

Games for kids are a great way for children and parents to have a fun time together, while learning about cars, trains and puzzles. Toddlers quickly learn to use App For Children by themselves.

All the puzzles aim to train your child's logical thinking as well as being really fun and entertaining.

LOTS OF PUZZLES & GAMES
This free game for kids contains 8 games and 8 jigsaw puzzles. The games contain cars, trains, police cars and other fun items and has been equally created for boys and girls.

CAREFULLY TESTED
App For Children has been tested by boys and girls of 1, 2, 3 and 4 years old. We think it is important that all kids games are tested on children during development.

KEY FEATURES
- Free kids games
- Puzzles and sounds specifically chosen for kids and toddlers 
- The app suits both boys and girls
- Cars, police cars, trains, buses and much more
- Free to download
- Aimed at toddlers 1, 2, 3 and 4 years old.

App For Children is brought to you by Tappy Happy, creators of fun apps and games for kids 1, 2, 3 and 4 years old. All our kids games are free and tailored to both boys and girls.

Jump into the World of Peppa Pig - educational games, videos and activities, all in one app! 
Snorts and giggles guaranteed!

Featuring the award-winning show's friendly characters, the World of Peppa Pig app offers your family a safe and ad-free environment, filled with lots of learning and fun! Tailored towards the development of preschoolers, there are plenty of interactive games, videos and activities for your little ones to enjoy and grow with.

The World of Peppa Pig is a subscription app. While the app contains lots of free content, subscribing will give you unlimited access to everything that the app has to offer. Start your free 7-day trial now to unlock all the content within the app, with new additions every 2 weeks. No need to worry - you can cancel at any time!

PLAY, LEARN, WATCH, CREATE, AND SING 
Join Peppa and friends in a journey through familiar locations, filled with exclusive content: 
â€¢ PLAY with tons of fun and educational games 
â€¢ LEARN through read-along stories, memory, counting and recognition games
â€¢ WATCH and download your favorite episodes and exclusive video compilations
â€¢ CREATE and paint, color in and dress up your favorite characters 
â€¢ SING along to your favorite Peppa Pig songs to encourage reading and memory
â€¢ And so much more!

SAFE AND AD-FREE
Trusted by millions of families across the globe, the World of Peppa Pig gives parents peace of mind with:
â€¢ Age-appropriate content tailored for preschoolers
â€¢ A safe and secure environment - NO ads!
â€¢ COPPA and kidSAFE certifications

SUBSCRIPTION DETAILS:
â€¢ Get UNLIMITED ACCESS to all games, videos and activities within the app with a monthly or yearly payment
â€¢ Users will get a FREE 7-DAY TRIAL at the time of signing up
â€¢ Cancel your subscription at any time (please note that you will not get a refund for any remaining period of a subscription)
â€¢ Your subscription can be used on any device registered with your Google Play account
â€¢ Payment will be charged to your Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase and subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled before the end of the current period
â€¢ Content downloaded into the app can be managed within the Account Settings page of the app
â€¢ Download videos for on the go offline entertainment 


* Requires an internet connection when first opening the app.
* Video content requires an internet connection to play but can be downloaded for offline viewing (subscribers only)

PEPPA PIG
Peppa Pig is the globally acclaimed animated TV show adored by pre-schoolers around the world.

Peppa is a loveable, but slightly bossy little pig who lives with Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, and her little brother George. The series has charmed children and their parents with its warmth, humor, familiarity and simplicity as it follows the family going about their everyday lives. Peppa likes playing with her friends, going to school, learning ballet, visiting Granny and Grandpa Pig and looking after George, but most of all she loves jumping in muddy puddles. 

ABOUT Entertainment One
Entertainment One (eOne) is a market leader in the creation, distribution and marketing of award-winning kids content that connects with families around the world. Inspiring smiles with the world's most beloved characters, eOne takes vibrant brands all the way from screens to stores.

Unicorn Icepop - Ice Popsicles Mania is the best ice cream game to make ice pops and popsicles. For ice cream games, making icepops, slushine, milkshake, ice cone, ice cream sandwich, helado are really fantastic. Summer is coming, you will have nice yummy treat with all kind of memo ice creams. In this ice lolly maker game, icepops are the best. Fruit icepop, unicorn icepop are offered, such as strawberry popsicles, cream icepop and juice icepops. Popsicles mania, come to join this ice dessert salon and make rainbow unicorn ice-cream.

IcePop & Ice Popsicles Mania Game Features
1. Wow, ice fever is already arriving. Welcome to ice cream bar and cook food with lollipop. Here is ice lolly maker game, say goodbye to bad ice cream, excellent icecream and icepop is calling you. 
2. Hot summer is coming, to be ice cream maker in sweet ice cream shop will help you break ice and Ice popsicles will calm you down then pop your stress. Pop maker! DIY your own icepops and popsicles.
3. For girls, strawberry are welcomed, such as strawberry ice cream, strawberry short cake or strawberry star, so fruit icepop is in demand; As for unicorn style, rainbow are forever, add unicorn element in this icecream food game must be a good idea.
4. If you are dessert maker, fruit might be your closed friend. In any food maker games, fruit is a good ingredients to get food. In ice cream truck, you can choose tons of fresh fruits. I recommend strawberry, I like strawberry ice cream or icepop.
5. Unicorn ice pop is so cute. Making creamy popsicles must be an extraordinary experience. Put on your ice cream stack, cook food in unicorn style immediately and cream the ice pop., you can make the best popsicles that ice cream shop ever sold.
6. Icy feeling is precious in summer, ice bucket is huge, If you like slushy maker, this quick ice maker is suitable for you. Making popsicles as soon as possible and get ice fever in this summer time.
7. Decoration time! In this pop maker game, diy your own unicorn popsicles, it is no longer a normal popsicles but a new ice levels. Join this super fun free games and make ice crean by yourself.
8. Ice pop is made by pop maker. Making food is not easy thing. In this ice cream game, food making become interesting, everyone could become desert maker and make memo ice creams. 
9. Are you ready for this ice popsicles mania? Make the excellent icepops in this food making games. Do you love this kids game with food?
10. Unicorn chef, popsicles chef, ice creams are prepared. Come to enjoy this yummy treat. 
11.Lovely girls, if you like this icecream food game, remember share it with your family and friend.

ë‹¹ì‹ ì´ ìƒê°í•˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì„ ì €í¬ì—ê²Œ ì•Œë ¤ì£¼ì‹­ì‹œì˜¤! ì§ˆë¬¸ì´ ìˆìœ¼ì‹­ë‹ˆê¹Œ? ì œì•ˆ? ê¸°ìˆ ì  ì§€ì›? 24/7 contact@funpop.com.cnì— ë¬¸ì˜í•˜ì‹­ì‹œì˜¤.

This game is for preschoolers and kids who want to learn basics of 11 languages. 

By Educational Fun Puzzles for Kids (Preschool) your child gets an extra portion of educational puzzles. There are +60 puzzles available in 6 different categories (Alphabet & Numbers, Colors and Shapes) in 11 languages: English, Arabic, Russian, Spanish, Portuguese, German, French, Polski, Dutch, Italian and Turkish. 

"Educational Puzzles for Kids (Preschool)" is a very rich, funny and education game for preschoolers with over than 150 puzzles of:
âœ” Letters: A-Z letters with sounds
âœ” Animals with names and the sounds they make
âœ” Numbers: 0-20 with sounds
âœ” Colors with sounds
âœ” Vegetables and fruits with sounds
âœ” Shapes: including square circle triangle and rectangle

We, at Forqan Smart Tech, have always sought to provide the best for your children through applications designed, and directed each age group separately, our belief in the feature each evolutionary stage passes by your son, but in order to lend life skills and the mentality to learn and grow and play correctly and properly, and to communicate with his peers and the environment surrounding it.

Educational Puzzles for Kids (Preschool) is for preschoolers and kids who want to learn basics of 11 languages: letters, numbers, vegetables, animals and more.

This application helps to practice drawing images with multi colors and write letters and numbers, this app makes you develop interest in painting and creative thinking.

Key Features of this Application

â€¢ This app design makes more attractive with kids
â€¢ Magic Slate drawing and writing board with multicolor
â€¢ A digital slate where you can write, draw and clear
â€¢ It's a free app and an off-line app
â€¢ Kids can learn drawing or writing alphabets and numbers
â€¢ Save your kids drawings in your mobile
â€¢ Kids can begin their study with this amazing application
â€¢ Multiple brush sizes are available to choose
â€¢ Share and print your kid's artwork with family and friends
â€¢ Eraser available to make correction
â€¢ Multicolored pallet available to choose and draw painting

í‹°ê¸€ë¦¬ì— ëŒ€í•´ì„œ
ì„¸ì„œë¯¸ ì›Œí¬ìˆ (Sesame Workshop)ì€ ìˆ˜ìƒ ê²½ë ¥ì´ ìˆëŠ” ìœ ì•„ë“¤ì„ ìœ„í•œ íƒœë¸”ë › ìŠ¤ë§ˆíŠ¸ ì¥ë‚œê° ì œì‘ì í‹°ê¸€ë¦¬ (www.tiggly.com) ì™€ í˜‘ë ¥í•˜ì—¬ Sesame Street ì•ŒíŒŒë²³ í‚¤ì¹œ â€“ ë…ì°½ì ì¸ ìŠ¤í† ë¦¬ë¼ì¸ê³¼ ì¿ í‚¤ ëª¬ìŠ¤í„° ì• ë‹ˆë©”ì´ì…˜ì´ í¬í•¨ëœ ì•±ì„ ì œì‘í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. 

Tiggly Words ì— ëŒ€í•´ì„œ
ì´ ì•±ì€ Tiggly Words ìŠ¤ë§ˆíŠ¸ ì¥ë‚œê°ê³¼ í˜¸í™˜ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤! í‹°ê¸€ë¦¬ ì¥ë‚œê°ì„ ì‹¤ì œ ì¿ í‚¤ ì»¤í„°ì²˜ëŸ¼ ì‚¬ìš©í• ìˆ˜ ìˆì–´ìš” â€“ í™”ë©´ì— ì°ì–´ì„œ ì¿ í‚¤ ëª¬ìŠ¤í„°ì™€ ê°™ì´ ë‹¨ì–´ ì¿ í‚¤ë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ìš”. ì´ ì•±ì€ í‹°ê¸€ë¦¬ ì¥ë‚œê°ê³¼ í•¨ê»˜ ì“°ì´ë„ë¡ ìµœì í™” ë˜ì—ˆì§€ë§Œ ì¥ë‚œê°ì´ ì—†ì–´ë„ ì¦ê±°ìš´ í•™ìŠµ ê²½í—˜ì„ ì œê³µí•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. 

ê°œì¸ ì •ë³´ ì •ì±…
ê°œì¸ ì •ë³´ ì •ì±…ì€ ì—¬ê¸°ì„œ ì°¾ìœ¼ì‹¤ ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: http://www.sesameworkshop.org/privacy-policy/

ì—°ë½í•˜ê¸°
ë‹¹ì‹ ì˜ ì˜ê²¬ì„ ë§¤ìš° ì¤‘ìš”í•˜ê²Œ ìƒê°í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ë§Œì•½ ë¬¸ì˜ë‚˜ ì½”ë©˜íŠ¸ê°€ ìˆìœ¼ì‹œê±°ë‚˜ ë„ì›€ì´ í•„ìš”í•˜ì‹œë©´support@tiggly.com ë¡œ ì—°ë½ì£¼ì„¸ìš”.

A fun application for activities matching both kids as well as adults.

This puzzles application is full with images of dinosaurs, their names and the sounds they make.

This Free jigsaw like puzzle game helps your kids develop matching, tactile and fine motor skills while playing 80 different dinosaur puzzles: pterodactyl, triceratops, archaeopteryx, suchomimus, ankylosaurus, stegosaurus,
tyrannosaurus rex, parasaurolophus, apatosaurus, spinosaurus. It is a fun and educational learning game for preschool children and toddlers including those with autism.

This game has a couple of activities in which the small kids will enjoy while learning:
1. Animals dressing.
2. Balloons popping.
3. Flying rockets.

Encouragement feedback will always encourages and praises your kids and motivate them to continue to build their vocabulary, memory, and cognitive skills while playing. The game is enriched with animations, pronunciations, sounds and interactivity for repeat playing & learning. It will keep your kids busy and yet you will never be worried about them losing any piece of the puzzles!

We, at Forqan Smart Tech, have always sought to provide the best for your children through applications designed, and directed each age group separately, our belief in the feature each evolutionary stage passes by your son, but in order to lend life skills and the mentality to learn and grow and play correctly and properly, and to communicate with his peers and the environment surrounding it.

This app is available in 7 languages: English, Spanish, Russian, Portuguese, French, German & Arabic.

Help baby cat Twinkle hatch from her magical egg! Show the kitty around the royal palace and take good care of her! Watch Twinkle, the unicorn cat princess, grow from a tiny baby kitty into a sweet cat girl!

Your little cat princess needs a lot of energy! Make sure to feed kitty Twinkle yummy food in the royal kitchen! Sing the unicorn kitten to sleep when sheâ€™s tired! Play super fun mini games for kids with little cat princess Twinkle! Slide down the rainbow! Jump on the clouds! Run, jump and fly! Play fun memory games with your unicorn cat princess!

With an internet connection the Starfall app provides a large sample of free activities. Then join and sign in as a Starfall member. Members have access to the full content within this app on their mobile devices as well as the www.starfall.com website from their computer. Young children will have fun learning reading, math, and more! Starfall offers a variety of activities for children in pre-k through first grade, plus second grade math. 


Features:
*Math Songs
*Numbers and Counting
*Geometry and Measurement
*Addition and Subtraction
*Multiplication and Division
*ABCs
*Colors
*Backpack Bearâ€™s Books
*Learn to Read
*Talking Library
*All About Me
*Groundhog Day 
*Pumpkin
*Turkey
*Gingerbread Boy
*Snowman
*Selected Nursery Rhymes
*Motion Songs
*Starfall Sing Alongs
*ABC Rhymes
*Historical Folk Songs


About Starfall: Starfall Education Foundation is a publicly supported nonprofit, 501(c)(3). We create free and low-cost experiences whereby children can successfully learn through exploration. With Starfall at home and in the classroom children have fun while learning in an environment of collaboration, wonderment, and play. We teach through positive reinforcement to ensure children become confident, intrinsically motivated, and successful.

ìš°ë¦¬ëŠ” ì´ëŸ¬í•œ ë¬¸ì œë¥¼ í•´ê²°í•˜ê¸° ìœ„í•´ ë…¸ë ¥í•˜ê³  ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

************ Jom bermain dan belajar bersama Didi & Friends! ************

Didi & Friends Playtown adalah gabungan 12 permainan berdasarkan lagu kanak-kanak Didi yang sangat popular. Setiap lagu mempunyai konsep permainan yang menarik dan penyampaian yang berbeza.

1. ABC
Belajar cara melengkapkan abjad dengan Drag & Drop bertemakan makanan kegemaran adik-adik! Terdapat 5 peringkat iaitu A-E, F-J, K-O, P-T, U-Z. 

2. Papaku Pulang Dari Kota
Wah! Adik-adik boleh mengawal kereta kecil warna merah dan menjalankan misi ke rumah nenek. Kumpulkan sebanyak bintang yang boleh sepanjang perjalanan untuk dapatkan ganjaran istimewa iaitu galeri watak rakan-rakan Didi yang menarik. Jom kumpulkan kesemuanya!

3. Rama-Rama
Konsep permainan adalah mengenal objek berdasarkan petunjuk yang diberikan. Pipah si rama-rama dengan misinya mencari Bingo, Tatak, Pak Atan, Jojo, Nana, dan Didi di dalam satu peta kawasan. Terdapat 6 lokasi carian yang perlu diterokai. Jom jalankan misi carian ini bersama Pipah!

4. Lompat Si Katak Lompat
Kawal Tatak dan lompat lebih tinggi hingga ke angkasa! Kumpulkan koin sebanyak yang mungkin dan dapatkan kesemua kostum Tatak yang menarik dan wow!

5. Bingo
Mari bermain bersama Bingo. Terdapat beberapa interaksi bersama Bingo iaitu bermain, memberi makan, dan bercakap bersama Bingo. Kumpulkan juga koin dan dapatkan bermacam aksesori menarik dan comel untuk Bingo!

6. Bunyi Haiwan
Jom belajar mengenal bentuk haiwan dan bunyinya. Konsep permainan adalah perlu Drag & Drop gambar haiwan pada petunjuk yang betul. 

7. Bintang-Bintang
Cantumkan bintang-bintang mengikut susunan nombordan hasilkan objek dengan latar belakang yang berbeza dan menarik. Terdapat 20 objek kesemuanya, jom cantum!

8. Air Pasang Dalam
Permainan kad memori watak rakan-rakan Didi. Padankan kad watak yang sama dengan masa yang diberikan. Terdapat 4 peringkat permainan kesemuanya.

9. Rasa Sayang
Mari mewarna bersama Didi! Padankan warna yang betul pada kanvas watak Didi & Friends dengan pilihan warna yang diberikan. Terdapat 6 watak kesemuanya untuk diwarna.

10. Kalau Rasa Gembira
Mari menari bersama Didi, Jojo, dan Nana! Konsep permainan adalah mempelajari langkah-langkah menari mengikut verse dalam lagu. Terdapat 5 langkah iaitu Tepuk Tangan, Kenyit Mata, Pusing-Pusing, Hentak Kaki, dan Hora Horey. Anda juga boleh melihat aksi mereka menari!

11. 12 Bulan
Pelajari 12 bulan bermula Januari hingga Disember dengan cara menulis nombor bulan tersebut. Terdapat poskad menarik mengikut tema bulan apabila berjaya menulis nombor dengan betul.

12. Tayar Bas
Jom jalan-jalan bersama Pak Atan dan basnya di kota London! Konsep permainan adalah mengawal bas dan menyelesaikan beberapa petunjuk dalam permainan. Terokai dan berinteraksi di setiap lokasi kawasan yang menarik!

ë‹¬ì˜ ìˆ˜ë¥¼ ì‘ì„±í•˜ì—¬ 1 ì›”ì—ì„œ 12 ì›” 12 ê°œì›”ì„ ì•Œì•„ë³´ì„¸ìš”. ì„±ê³µì ì¸ë¥¼ ì œëŒ€ë¡œ ì‘ì„±í•˜ë©´ ì¬ë¯¸ìˆëŠ” ì—½ì„œ ì£¼ì œë³„ ê°œì›” ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

ì˜ ëŸ°ë˜ì˜ ë„ì‹œì—ì„œ í•¨ê»˜ ë°• ATAN ë²„ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ê±¸ì–´ ë³´ì! ê²Œì„ì˜ ê°œë…ì€ ë²„ìŠ¤ë¥¼ ì œì–´í•˜ê³ , ê²Œì„ì—ì„œ íŒíŠ¸ë¥¼ í•´ê²°í•˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì´ë‹¤. íƒìƒ‰ ë° ê° ìœ„ì¹˜ ë§¤ë ¥ì ì¸ ì˜ì—­ì—ì„œ ìƒí˜¸ ì‘ìš©!

Idioma de vocalizaciÃ³n del nombre del animal: EspaÃ±ol e InglÃ©s.

Este juego estÃ¡ diseÃ±ado para que los mÃ¡s pequeÃ±os de la casa se entretengan a travÃ©s de unir puntos y descubriendo los animales que se ocultan tras el puzzle. 
El juego de unir puntos es fÃ¡cil, a travÃ©s de nÃºmeros y uniendo los puntos en orden ascendente, conseguirÃ¡s descubrir que animal se esconde detrÃ¡s del puzzle.
Los animales se han clasificado en tres tipos:
- Animales terrestres; donde a travÃ©s de unir puntos podremos descubrir el oso, gusano, girafa, leÃ³n, gato, pollito, elefante, mono, caracol, caballo, hipopÃ³tamo, cerdo, conejo, perro y cebra.

- Animales aÃ©reos; donde a travÃ©s de unir puntos podremos descubrir la mariquita, la mariposa, el pato, el loro, la abeja.

Este juego estÃ¡ lleno de colorido, y gracias a la prÃ¡ctica y dedicaciÃ³n de nuestros desarrolladores, conseguirÃ¡s que el niÃ±o preste su atenciÃ³n y aprenda de una manera interactiva y Ãºtil.

í–¥í›„ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸ì— ë” ë§ì€ ë™ë¬¼ì„ í¬í•¨ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤.


-----------------------------
C & C CarrionCastillo
-----------------------------
www.carrioncastillo.com

First words for toddlers and kids is an interactive picture book in English. It will entertain and help your toddler or young children to learn the names of things they encounter in their daily life. To increase the educational benefits from using this app for kids it also contains a memory game for learning the different words and how to pronounce them.

Features:
- Memory game with pronunciation in English with 3 different difficulty levels.
- Beautiful and eye catching pictures
- Professional pronunciation 
- Simple and intuitive navigation
- App to SD supported

The full version contains 100 images and words and no advertisement. 

A perfect sound touch kids book with pronunciation / voice for early learning using flash cards on your phone or tablet. The app is specifically designed with toddlers or babies in mind with a simple and intuitive navigation between the different pictures. Use this app to stimulate your child language skills and abilities.

The words are from these categories:
- Animals (zoo, farm and jungle)
- Cars and vehicles (on land, air and sea)
- Fruits and vegetables (normal and exotic)
- Music instruments (trumpet, guitar, drums etc.)
- Nature and things outside (lake, moon, beach)
- Kids toys (doll, car, train)
- Food (pizza, pasta, salad)
- Numbers 1 to 10
- Colors
- Clothes (shoes, trousers)

The app uses real pictures which is much easier for your baby to relate to compared to drawings or animated images.

We are continuously expanding the range of themes of learning apps and games for children. If you want to get the latest news on apps like us on http://www.facebook.com/kidstaticapps.

How does it work? Simple, even a baby can do it! Touch the screen with your finger and swipe to go to the next page of the book or use the big kid friendly buttons. The image will be shown and its name or sight will be played. The app is perfect for learning english as a secondary lanuguage ESL or might be used for children with signs of autism spectrum disorder.

Afterwards, click or tap the picture to hear the sound. Infants love to hear the sound and names of the different words.

We advise you to sit along with your child to enhance the learning experience or entertainment even more. Toddlers will learn the names associated with the images and stimulate their motor skills.

The app is not only for toddlers. Older kids loves to hear and learn more what is on the pictures and thereby increasing their vocabulary and possible the intelligence.

The app features carefully selected photos and has been tested on both toddlers, kids and parents.

Got any questions or ideas for improvement. Send a mail to contact@kidstatic.net. We want you to provide the best interactive learning app available.

Kidstatic aims at delivering educational apps and games for toddlers and kids in a simple and intuitive manner.

Your favorite #1 tank engine and his friends are on an all-new adventure exploring the world, discovering new cultures and learning different languages in this game built specifically for kids! Inspire your little conductorsâ€™ creativity and let their imagination run wild with possibilities when creating their own train track sets. Figure out how to solve problems by helping Thomas and his friends with tasks only the toughest engines can accomplish. Listen to directions, play fun games and build the ultimate track in each country for all your favorite trains to enjoy!

Fashion designer, some high heel stilettos cup cake is shining on the cake stand. Did you make the fashion sweet desserts in the food and fashion games and baking games for girls? Make the baking desserts and unicorn food in this bakery food games for girls with rainbow and fashion design! Unleash your DIY cooking skills in this cupcake mania game for girls and make the best fashion design high heel stiletto cupcake with life real cooking recipe in our make cakes and baking game. 

Cupcake Maker Game Features: 
1.The cupcake Mania is comming. Cupcake, are made of cup and cake, that is cup cake. Girls always love vanilla cupcakes, chocolate cupcakes, red velvet chocolates, pet cupcakes, colorful sprinkles cupcakes, rainbow cupcakes, and so on. But how about a trendy high heel stiletto cupcake? 
2. Cupcake wars. After eat cakes in the bakery games, bake a cake and design fashion cupcakes in this cupcakes games, kitchen game and also cake game.
3.As a cupcake maker, little chef often bake a cupcake in the kitchen, but in the girl games for free, you will make cakes in the make up room! Time for the cupcake delivery. 
4.You're the ms rainbow. What does a girlâ€™s makeup room look like? Although you are not playing in a candy makeup game, Such as cosmetic lip stick, makeup tools, make-up mirror seen in the makeover games and free make up games. 
5.First step to make high heel stiletto cupcakeria is baking cupcake. DIY fashion, show off you fabulous DIY talent in the cupcakes baking game. Little cake baker, your baking skill is gifted and full of creative not only in the baking game, bakery game, candy game, cake game, but also in the cooking game, kitchen game and other girl game and girly games.
6.Wow! The pirouette cookies and egg wafer cones will be the high heel, and chocolate wafer cookie will be the arc part of the shoe dessert. There are kinds of sweet flavors of those sweet desserts, choose your favorite one from the fashion design cake making games.
7.Make fashion design of those sweet dessert shoes with tasty muffins and colorful cone wafers for the fashionista inspired fashion designer with this girly baking game.
8.The fashion decorations are in the fashion design games for girls to dress up you high heel stiletto cupcake. Glitter cupcake liners,carnival foods, rainbow cake, colorful frosting, colorful sprinkles, sparkly diamond candies.
9.Make tons of high heel shoe cone cupcakes with biggest collection of amazing fashion designs and patterns, enjoy unique fun cooking process with our little chef, perfect for wedding party and birthday party.
10.Fashion designer, your high heel shoe cupcake menu are below: Pink Stiletto Cupcakes with fashion design cover, High heel love shoe cupcake with red color and edible chocolate hearts, Ice Cream Cupcake shoes with sweet wafer heels with rainbow colors and so on. Also we will update the cupcake menu with cosmetic box cupcakes, makeup cupcakes and cosmetic lip stick cupcakes. Stay tuned for our new makeover games, makeup cake games of baking cupcakes.
11.Bakery chef, show your friends the biggest collection of your high heel shoe cupcakes in this girls game with food of baking cakes and free makeup games.
12.Cupcake delivery! Put your DIY and fashion high heel shoe cupcake in the gift box decorated with fashion designs. 
Learn how to make cup cake and cake in real life TODAY! Get a stunning candy make up for cupcakes to show your baking skill in the cupcake wars!Download this cupcake fashion design game for girls NOW!

"Ğ¡Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¢Ñ€Ğ°ĞºÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€" ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ ÑĞ±Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¸Ğº Ğ¿ĞµÑĞµĞ½ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ĞµĞ¹ Ğ¸ Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ÑˆĞ¸Ğµ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ»ÑŒĞ¼Ñ‹ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»ĞµĞ½ÑŒĞºĞ¸Ñ… Ğ² Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ·Ñ€Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ğµ Ğ¾Ñ‚ 1 Ğ´Ğ¾ 5 Ğ»ĞµÑ‚.
Ğ£ Ğ½ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ ĞµÑÑ‚ÑŒ ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ ĞºĞ°Ğ½Ğ°Ğ» - Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ĞµĞ¹, Ñƒ ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ°Ğ¶ 1 Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ°Ñ€Ğ´ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²! ğŸ˜³ğŸ’¥
Ğ¢Ğ°Ğ¼ ĞµÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ÑĞºĞ¸Ğµ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ½ Ğ¸ Ğ¿ĞµÑĞµĞ½ĞºĞ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ĞµĞ¹ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ°ĞºÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹, Ğ¼Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ½ĞºĞ¸, Ğ³Ñ€ÑƒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¸ Ğ²ÑÑ‘ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ»ÑĞ±ÑÑ‚ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚Ğ¸. ğŸ˜ğŸ˜
ĞšĞ°Ğ¶Ğ´Ğ°Ñ ÑĞµÑ€Ğ¸Ñ Ğ½Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ Ğ²ĞµÑĞµĞ»Ğ°Ñ, Ğ½Ğ¾ ĞµÑ‰Ğµ Ğ¸ Ğ¾Ğ±ÑƒÑ‡Ğ°ÑÑ‰Ğ°Ñ! ĞĞ½Ğ° Ğ½Ğ°ÑƒÑ‡Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ²Ğ°ÑˆĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ñ€ĞµĞ±ĞµĞ½ĞºĞ° ÑÑ‡Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ, Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ñ†Ğ²ĞµÑ‚Ğ°, Ğ½Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¶Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµĞº, Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¶Ğµ Ğ²Ñ‹ÑƒÑ‡Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚ Ğ°Ğ»Ñ„Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚, Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ, Ğ²ĞµĞ´ÑŒ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ - Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ğ»ĞºĞ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ĞµĞ¹ + Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ÑĞºĞ¸Ğµ Ğ¿ĞµÑĞ½Ğ¸ (Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ÑĞºĞ°Ñ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ·Ñ‹ĞºĞ°) Ğ±ĞµÑĞ¿Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¾!

Ğ¡Ğ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ÑĞºĞ¸Ğµ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ½ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞºĞ¾ Ğ±ĞµĞ· Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞ½ÑŒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾, Ğ° Ğ²ÑĞµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ±Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ³ĞµÑ€Ğ¾Ğ¸ Ğ²ÑĞµĞ³Ğ´Ğ° Ğ²ĞµÑĞµĞ»ÑÑ‚ÑÑ, Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ Ğ¸ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ´ÑƒÑÑ‚ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ĞµĞ¹!
Ğ”ĞµÑ‚Ğ¸ÑˆĞºĞ¸ Ğ±ÑƒĞ´ÑƒÑ‚ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ±Ğ»ÑĞ´Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ·Ğ° Ğ»ÑĞ±Ğ¸Ğ¼Ñ‹Ğ¼ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚ Ğ³ĞµÑ€Ğ¾ĞµĞ¼, ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ²Ğ¼ĞµÑÑ‚Ğµ Ñ Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¸ ÑƒĞ·Ğ½Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾-Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğµ ĞºĞ°Ğ¶Ğ´Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ´ĞµĞ½ÑŒ! Ğ­Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ÑĞºĞ°Ñ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ·Ñ‹ĞºĞ°! ĞŸĞ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¿ĞµÑĞµĞ½ĞºĞ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ĞµĞ¹ Ğ²Ğ¼ĞµÑÑ‚Ğµ Ñ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸, ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¸ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ÑˆĞ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸Ğº (Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ±ĞµĞ· Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ½ĞµÑ‚Ğ° Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµÑ‚ÑŒ)!

Ğ—Ğ´ĞµÑÑŒ Ğ²Ñ‹ Ğ½Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ´ĞµÑ‚Ğµ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ±ĞµĞ· Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ½ĞµÑ‚Ğ° (ÑĞºĞ°Ñ‡Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ»ÑŒĞ¼Ñ‹ Ğ±ĞµÑĞ¿Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ñ€ÑĞ¼Ğ¾ ÑĞµĞ±Ğµ Ğ½Ğ° Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ĞµÑ„Ğ¾Ğ½), ,Ğ° Ñ‚Ğ°ĞºĞ¶Ğµ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚Ğµ ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ½! ĞŸÑ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¹Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»Ñ‹ÑˆĞµĞ¹ ğŸ‘¶ğŸ» ( Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ÑĞºĞ¸Ğµ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒÑ‡Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ² Ğ¸ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ´ĞµĞ²Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞº Ğ¸ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ÑĞºĞ¸Ğµ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ñ‹) - Ñ‚Ğ°Ğ¼ Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾ ĞºĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğº Ğ¸ Ğ¼Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´ÑĞºĞ°Ğ·Ğ¾Ğº, Ğ¸ ĞµÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿ĞµÑĞµĞ½ĞºĞ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ĞµĞ¹! ĞĞ½Ğ¸ ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ğ³ÑƒÑ‚ Ñ Ğ»ĞµĞ³ĞºĞ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒÑ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ»ÑĞ±Ğ¸Ğ¼Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸Ğº! Ğ’ĞµĞ´ÑŒ ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ½ĞºĞ¸ ( Ğ° ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»ĞµĞ½ÑŒĞºĞ¸Ñ…)Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ² Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¸Ğ³Ñ€ÑƒÑˆĞºĞ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ĞµĞ¹ Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞ½ÑŒ Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµÑ€ĞµÑĞ½Ğ¾! ğŸ˜ƒ

ĞÑ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ² Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¿Ğ¸ÑĞºÑƒ, Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ ÑĞ»ÑƒÑˆĞ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ»ÑĞ±Ğ¸Ğ¼Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¿ĞµÑĞ½Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»Ñ‹ÑˆĞµĞ¹ (Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ÑĞºĞ°Ñ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ·Ñ‹ĞºĞ°) Ğ¸ ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ½ (Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ÑĞºĞ¸Ğµ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ»ÑŒĞ¼Ñ‹ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»ĞµĞ½ÑŒĞºĞ¸Ñ…) Ğ³Ğ´Ğµ ÑƒĞ³Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ½Ğ¾: Ğ´Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ°, Ğ² Ğ¼Ğ°ÑˆĞ¸Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¶Ğµ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ³ÑƒĞ»ĞºĞµ! Ğ’ĞµĞ´ÑŒ ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ Ñ‚Ğ°Ğº ÑƒĞ´Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ½Ğ¾, ĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ´Ğ° Ğ»ÑĞ±Ğ¸Ğ¼Ñ‹Ğµ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒÑ‡Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ² ( Ğ¸ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½ĞµÑ‡Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ¶Ğµ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ÑĞºĞ¸Ğµ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ´ĞµĞ²Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞº) Ğ¸ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ÑĞºĞ¸Ğµ Ğ¿ĞµÑĞ½Ğ¸ Ğ±ĞµÑĞ¿Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¾ Ñ Ğ»ÑĞ±Ğ¸Ğ¼Ñ‹Ğ¼Ğ¸ Ğ³ĞµÑ€Ğ¾ÑĞ¼Ğ¸ Ğ²ÑĞµĞ³Ğ´Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´ Ñ€ÑƒĞºĞ¾Ğ¹! Ğ ĞµÑ‰Ğµ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ»ÑŒĞ¼Ñ‹ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»ĞµĞ½ÑŒĞºĞ¸Ñ… Ğ¸ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ÑĞºĞ¸Ğµ Ğ¿ĞµÑĞ½Ğ¸ Ğ±ĞµÑĞ¿Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ³Ñ€ÑƒĞ·Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ½Ğ° Ğ²Ğ°Ñˆ Ğ´ĞµĞ²Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ ÑĞºĞ°Ñ‡Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ±ĞµÑĞ¿Ğ»Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ¾Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¿Ğ¸ÑĞºÑƒ! ğŸ‘ğŸ¼ğŸ˜

Ğ Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»Ğ¸, Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ²Ğ°Ñ ĞµÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ñ„ÑƒĞ½ĞºÑ†Ğ¸Ñ "Ğ Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒÑĞºĞ¸Ğ¹ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒ"! ĞĞ½Ğ° Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑĞ¼ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ğ½Ğ°ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ°Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚ Ğ¿Ğ»ĞµĞ¹Ğ»Ğ¸ÑÑ‚Ñ‹, ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ±ÑƒĞ´ÑƒÑ‚ ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ´ĞµÑ‚Ğ¸, Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€ĞµĞºĞ»ÑÑ‡Ğ°ÑÑÑŒ, Ğ±Ğ»Ğ°Ğ³Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°Ñ€Ñ Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¾ĞºĞ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²ĞºĞµ ÑĞºÑ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ°! Ğ”ĞµÑ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ³ÑƒÑ‚ ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµÑ‚ÑŒ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ»ÑŒĞ¼Ñ‹ Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ»Ğ°Ğ¹Ğ½ Ğ¸ Ğ¿ĞµÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿ĞµÑĞµĞ½ĞºĞ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ĞµĞ¹, Ğ° Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒÑÑ, Ğ²ĞµĞ´ÑŒ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ ÑĞºĞ°Ñ‡Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ»ÑŒĞ¼Ñ‹! ğŸ‘§ğŸ»ğŸ‘¦ğŸ»

Ğ—Ğ°Ğ³Ñ€ÑƒĞ¶Ğ°Ğ¹Ñ‚Ğµ ÑĞ°Ğ¼Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ»ÑƒÑ‡ÑˆĞ¸Ğµ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ»ÑŒĞ¼Ñ‹ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ĞµĞ¹ Ğ¸ Ğ¿ĞµÑĞ½Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ»Ñ‹ÑˆĞµĞ¹ (Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ÑĞºĞ°Ñ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ·Ñ‹ĞºĞ°)! Ğ­Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ±ĞµĞ·Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ°ÑĞ½Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ¸ ÑƒĞ´Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ½Ğ¾Ğµ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ÑĞºĞ¾Ğµ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ-Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ğ¹ĞºĞ°, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ ÑĞ¼Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµÑ‚ÑŒ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ğ²Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ğ¸ĞºĞ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ĞµĞ¹! Ğ¡Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¹ Ğ¢Ñ€Ğ°ĞºÑ‚Ğ¾Ñ€ Ğ¶Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ Ğ²ÑĞµÑ… Ğ´ĞµÑ‚ĞµĞ¹! Ğ”ĞµÑ‚ÑĞºĞ¸Ğµ Ğ¼ÑƒĞ»ÑŒÑ‚Ñ„Ğ¸Ğ»ÑŒĞ¼Ñ‹ - ğŸ’™!

ĞĞ±Ñ€Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ‚Ğµ Ğ²Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾ Ğ¾Ñ„Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¼Ğ»ÑÑ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¿Ğ¸ÑĞºÑƒ, Ğ²Ñ‹ ÑĞ¾Ğ³Ğ»Ğ°ÑˆĞ°ĞµÑ‚ĞµÑÑŒ Ğ½Ğ° "ĞĞ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ".
"ĞĞ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ" Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¿Ğ¸ÑĞºĞ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¸ÑÑ…Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ°Ğ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğ°Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµÑĞºĞ¸, ĞµÑĞ»Ğ¸ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞºĞ»ÑÑ‡Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ ĞµĞ³Ğ¾ Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ¼ÑƒĞ¼ Ğ·Ğ° 24 Ñ‡Ğ°ÑĞ° Ğ´Ğ¾ Ğ¾ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‡Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ Ñ‚ĞµĞºÑƒÑ‰ĞµĞ¹ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¿Ğ¸ÑĞºĞ¸.
Ğ¡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¿Ğ¸ÑĞºĞ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸ "ĞĞ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğ¸" Ğ½Ğµ Ğ¼ĞµĞ½ÑĞµÑ‚ÑÑ Ğ¸ Ğ±ÑƒĞ´ĞµÑ‚ Ñ€Ğ°Ğ²Ğ½Ğ° ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¿Ğ¸ÑĞºĞ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ¿Ğ¾ĞºÑƒĞ¿ĞºĞµ.

ë‹¹ì‚¬ ì›¹ ì‚¬ì´íŠ¸ : https://devgameou.com/

Dalam aplikasi ini diperkenalkan huruf vokal dan konsonan dan cara mengeja kata yang mempunyai satu suku kata, dua suku kata, tiga suku kata dan contoh kalimat dan juga sebuah quiz untuk sarana berlatih anak dalam membaca. Dalam permainan ini disertai juga dengan gambar, suara dan animasi sehingga anak tidak merasa bosan untuk belajar membaca.
Disediakan juga mode sound on dan off untuk memudahkan belajar bagi putra-putri kesayangan. 
Untuk modul latihan, kami tambahkan modul quiz.Sebagai modul hiburan, kami tambahkan modul lagu anak dalam bahasa Indonesia dan bahasa Inggris yg diharapkan bisa dijadikan sebagai sarana edukasi juga.
Sebagai modul tambahan kami sertakan lagu anak anak sebagai sarana untuk belajar bernyanyi

- íƒêµ¬: ì¬ë¯¸ìˆëŠ” ê¹œì§ ì•„ì´í…œê³¼ ìˆ˜ìˆ˜ê»˜ë¼ê°€ í˜¸ê¸°ì‹¬ ë§ì€ ì„¸ìƒ íƒí—˜ê°€ë¥¼ ê¸°ë‹¤ë¦¬ê³  ìˆì–´ìš”. ì•„ì´ë“¤ì´ íƒœì–‘ì„ í„°ì¹˜í•˜ëŠ” ìˆœê°„ ì–´ë–¤ ì¼ì´ ë²Œì–´ì§ˆê¹Œìš”? êµ¬ë¦„ì„ í„°ì¹˜í•˜ë©´? ë“€í”Œë¡œ í”¼ê²¨ê°€ í™”ì¥ì‹¤ì— ê°„ë‹¤ë©´?

- ì—°ë ¹ëŒ€ì— ì í•©í•œ ì½˜í…ì¸ : ë°ì€ ìƒ‰ìƒì˜ ì• ë‹ˆë©”ì´ì…˜, ì•„ì´ì½˜, ì†ì‰¬ìš´ ê²Œì„ í”Œë ˆì´ íƒìƒ‰ - ì½ê¸°ë‚˜ ì“°ê¸° ê¸°ìˆ ì´ í•„ìš”ì—†ìœ¼ë©°, ìë™ ì €ì¥ ê¸°ëŠ¥ì´ ì§€ì›ë˜ë¯€ë¡œ ë†€ì´ ì‹œê°„ì´ ê¸¸ë“  ì§§ë“  ì™„ë²½í•œ í™˜ê²½ì´ ì œê³µë©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

ë‹¹ì‹ ì´ ì•„ì´ë¥¼ìœ„í•œ ëŸ¬ì‹œì•„ ì•ŒíŒŒë²³ì„ ì°¾ëŠ” ê²½ìš°ì—, ê°€ì¥ ì‘ì€ì„ìœ„í•œ ì•ŒíŒŒë²³, ABCëŠ” ê¸°ë³¸ ìƒ‰ìƒê³¼ ëª¨ì–‘, ìˆ«ì ë° ê³„ì •ìœ¼ë¡œ ì•„ì´ë¥¼ ìµíˆ í•  - ìš°ë¦¬ì˜ êµìœ¡ ì‘ìš© í”„ë¡œê·¸ë¨ì„ ì‹œë„!

Free educational game for toddlers aged 1 - 4 years from the series â€œLittle One Learns Wordsâ€!

Together with your child, you can watch wonderful images of different animals, all while learning their names and listen to the animalsâ€™ unique sounds!

These carefully selected photographs allow your child to not only learn the names of the various animals, but also glimpse into the animalâ€™s beautiful world and everything it offers! 

After your child looks over and experiences the animal flashcards, there is a fun game waiting for them, which tests how much theyâ€™ve understood. Regardless of the number of correct answers, the player earns stars and young talent is rewarded with thunderous applause and balloons!

In the free app, the animals are divided into three groups: â€œdomestic animals and petsâ€, â€œforest animalsâ€, and â€œanimals of the worldâ€ (animals that live in Asia, Africa, the Arctic, and Antarctic). Additional animals, like â€œbirdsâ€, â€œinsectsâ€, and â€œworld of waterâ€ (fish and water-thriving animals), are available in the full version of the application. 

A significant feature of this app is that there are no unrealistic drawings. Instead, full-length beautiful pictures are used that resemble actual animals (as they look in real life), which helps the child easily remember their names and features. 

Do you have older children in primary school? If so, this educational game will also come in handy for them because in addition to English, the app supports German, Spanish, French and some other foreign languages.

Playing these types of games with flashcards has been proven to aid students in quickly learning a foreign language. They can discover new words and are able to easily impress their teachers and classmates!

Your child doesnâ€™t even need to know how to read with this app! Its simple interface and voice prompts allow even the youngest kid to play and learn the names of the animals by themselves! After playing the game, be sure to visit the zoo or pet store with your child â€“ youâ€™ll be happy and impressed as they present their newly acquired knowledge of all the animals they see!

Experience has shown that for most children, viewing and learning from bright and vivid images becomes a favorite pastime and having them play this game often reinforces their knowledge. According to Glenn Doman, an American physical therapist and founder of the â€œThe Institutes for The Achievement of Human Potentialâ€, training just 5 - 10 minutes a day stimulates the development of various parts of the brain. This allows for the development of a photographic memory, which means your could can develop faster than her or his peers, and become more open to the vast knowledge of the world.

Doman is undoubtedly right! The younger the child, the easier they absorb new information. 

Donâ€™t delay!

The app can be used as a supplementary teaching aid in foreign language instruction. Supported languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Russian, Polish, Ukrainian.

- ì˜ì–´ (ë¯¸êµ­), ì˜ì–´ (ì˜êµ­) ë“± 15 ê°œ ì–¸ì–´ë¡œ ì‚¬ìš©í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.
- ì•„ì´ë“¤ì€ ë‹¤ë¥¸ ì–¸ì–´ë¡œ ë™ë¬¼ì˜ ì–¸ì–´ë¥¼ ë³€ê²½í•˜ê³  ë°°ìš¸ ìˆ˜ 5 ê°œ ì´ìƒì˜ ì„¸.
- ì‚¬ë‘ìŠ¤ëŸ¬ìš´ ê·¸ë˜í”½ê³¼ ë™ë¬¼ì˜ ì†Œë¦¬ë¥¼ ë°œê²¬í•˜ëŠ” ê²½í—˜ì„ í•¨ê»˜ ë”°ëœ»í•œ ëª©ì†Œë¦¬.
- ìƒˆë¡œìš´ í¥ë¯¸ë¡œìš´ ê¸°ëŠ¥ê³¼ ìƒìˆ˜ ì—…ë°ì´íŠ¸.

ë‹¹ì‹ ì´ ë” ë‚˜ì€ ë™ë¬¼ ì†Œë¦¬ë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ê¸° ìœ„í•´ ì•„ì´ë””ì–´ë¥¼ ê°€ì§€ê³  ìˆë‹¤ë©´, ì €í¬ì—ê²Œ ì—°ë½í•˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì„ ë§ì„¤ì´ì§€ ë§ë¼! ëª¨ë“  ì•„ì´ë””ì–´ì™€ ì œì•ˆì„ í™˜ì˜í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.
ìš°ë¦¬ì˜ ì›¹ ì‚¬ì´íŠ¸ : www.papumba.com
ì´ë©”ì¼ : info@papumba.com

ì§€ê¸ˆ ê·¸ê²ƒì„ ì‹œë„í•˜ê³  ë™ë¬¼ ì†Œë¦¬ì™€ ìŠˆí¼ ì¬ë¯¸ êµìœ¡ ê²½í—˜ì„ìœ„í•œ ì¤€ë¹„!

"Nighty Night!" is a lovely App for a daily go-to-sleep ritual with cute animals, sweet lullaby music and great narration. All around the house the lights go out, and in the barn even the animals are tired. But who puts them to bed? Who turns out the lights in their stalls? That is the task for small children aged 1-4. Watching all the animals go to sleep is a great way to set the mood for bedtime.

The interactive bedtime "Nighty Night" is brought to you by Oscar-Nominee Heidi Wittlinger (2002, best animated short) who put a lot of passion and effort in constructing little sets made of paper and combining them with 2D illustration and animation. 

Languages: English, German, Spanish, French, Italian, Dutch, Russian and Portuguese. 

PRESS: "4 stars out of 4 "There's bags of innovation happening right now around Apps for children, especially those that blend storytelling, animation and interactivity. Nighty Night! is one of the latest and greatest examples." // THE GUARDIAN UK 

"Overall this is my new top recommendation for bedtime books with interactivity." // Digital Storytime / 5 stars out of 5 

"Nighty Night is a truly gorgeous ebook to add to your literary stash - and lull the kids into the Land of Nod." // Kids Book Review 

"What I liked: Everything. Nighty Night is simple, subtle, and clever. It is an App that very young children will enjoy and demand to use again and again." // PadGadget / 5 stars out of 5 

"Nighty Night! is a must-have bedtime companion for your digital wunderkids!" // The ikids blog

Join Little Critter in this interactive book app as he shows us all the things he can do by himself! Explore pictures, learn new vocabulary, and follow along with three fun ways to read! From tying his shoes to pouring his own juice, find out how Little Critter doesn't do everything perfectly, but he always makes an effort to do the best he can!

Explore All By Myself - Little Critter:
- ENCOURAGE literacy skills with highlighted narration
- FOLLOW along with three fun ways to read!
- LEARN new vocabulary with tappable words
- TAP objects to hear their name read aloud 

Play a find-the-creature mini game! Can you can spot every creature throughout the story? Tap to tally them up!

Designed for children ages 2-5

ApySmarts.com : We like the concept, good variety of activities and fun interactions.

In â€œCricket Kids: School Day,â€ your child will love entering or rediscovering the world of school through 12 varied games.school through 12 varied games.

The small rituals and educational activities are presented in a playful, interactive way.

From one scene to the next, your child will experience entertaining, instructive situations inspired by the school day: playing with letters, numbers, and of course drawing, sports, naptime, lunchtime, singing, recess and more.

In following our two mischievous little Crickets, your child will learn and have fun at the same time:

* Learn to write letters
* Count pencils
* Play back a tune
* Jump rope
* Color a magic picture
* Swim in the pool
* Put a series of images in order
* Play with reflexes and test reasoning
* Tap, swipe, drag, tilt and many other games

â€œCricket Kids: School Dayâ€ is excellent for children aged 2 to 7.

Enjoy Slim Cricketâ€™s trademark optimal, intelligent use of the tablet!

Experience this magical moment of fun and learning with your child.

Thereâ€™s a quiz at the end of the application to assess what your child has learned.

* 14 interactive pages
* 13 games
* Available in 6 languages (English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Portuguese)
* 20 minutes of family fun
* Charmingly illustrated with colorful characters
* Numerous interactive elements extend playtime

Educational game for learning animal sounds. Very fun, ad-free, and perfect for any age from one to five. It's a game that your child will love, and most importantly, will teach them in a fun way.

Playing is so easy! With just a single tap, your child can have fun learning all the animal sounds from home, the farmyard and even the jungle. Even a baby can play without the help of an adult!

â˜… BENEFITS
- More than 80 animals to learn.
- Available in 15 languages, including English (US) and English (UK).
- Kids aged more than 5 can change the language and learn the animals in another language.
- Adorable graphics and a warm voice that accompanies the experience of discovering the animal sounds.
- Constant updates with new exciting features.

If you have an idea to make Animal Sounds even better, please do not hesitate to contact us! All ideas and suggestions are welcome.
Our Website: www.papumba.com
Email: info@papumba.com

Try it now and get ready for a super fun educational experience with Animal Sounds!

ìš°ë¦¬ì˜ ì›¹ ì‚¬ì´íŠ¸ : www.papumba.com

ì§€ê¸ˆ ê·¸ê²ƒì„ ì‹œë„í•˜ê³  ë™ë¬¼ ì†Œë¦¬ì™€ ìŠˆí¼ ì¬ë¯¸ êµìœ¡ ê²½í—˜ì„ìœ„í•œ ì¤€ë¹„!

With an internet connection the Starfall app provides a large sample of free activities. Then join and sign in as a Starfall member. Members have access to the full content within this app on their mobile devices as well as the www.starfall.com website from their computer. Young children will have fun learning reading, math, and more! Starfall offers a variety of activities for children in pre-k through first grade, plus second grade math. 


Features:
*Math Songs
*Numbers and Counting
*Geometry and Measurement
*Addition and Subtraction
*Multiplication and Division
*ABCs
*Colors
*Backpack Bearâ€™s Books
*Learn to Read
*Talking Library
*All About Me
*Groundhog Day 
*Pumpkin
*Turkey
*Gingerbread Boy
*Snowman
*Selected Nursery Rhymes
*Motion Songs
*Starfall Sing Alongs
*ABC Rhymes
*Historical Folk Songs


About Starfall: Starfall Education Foundation is a publicly supported nonprofit, 501(c)(3). We create free and low-cost experiences whereby children can successfully learn through exploration. With Starfall at home and in the classroom children have fun while learning in an environment of collaboration, wonderment, and play. We teach through positive reinforcement to ensure children become confident, intrinsically motivated, and successful.

ìŠ¤íƒ€ í´ ì†Œê°œ : ìŠ¤íƒ€ í´ êµìœ¡ ì¬ë‹¨ì€ ê³µê°œì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì§€ì›í•˜ëŠ” ë¹„ì˜ë¦¬, 501 (C) (3). ìš°ë¦¬ëŠ” ì•„ì´ë“¤ì´ ì„±ê³µì ìœ¼ë¡œ íƒì‚¬ë¥¼ í†µí•´ ë°°ìš¸ ìˆ˜ìˆê²Œëœë‹¤ ë¬´ë£Œ ë° ì €ë ´í•œ ë¹„ìš©ìœ¼ë¡œ ê²½í—˜ì„ ë§Œë“­ë‹ˆë‹¤. í˜‘ì—…, ë†€ë¼ì›€, ê·¸ë¦¬ê³  ë†€ì´ì˜ í™˜ê²½ì—ì„œ í•™ìŠµí•˜ëŠ” ë™ì•ˆ ì§‘ì—ì„œ êµì‹¤ì˜ ì•„ì´ë“¤ ìŠ¤íƒ€ í´ê³¼ í•¨ê»˜ ì¬ë¯¸ê°€ìˆë‹¤. ìš°ë¦¬ëŠ” ì•„ì´ë“¤ì´ ë³¸ì§ˆì ìœ¼ë¡œ ë™ê¸° ë¶€ì—¬, ìì‹ ê°, ì„±ê³µì´ ë  ìˆ˜ ìˆë„ë¡ ê¸ì •ì  ì¸ ê°•í™”ë¥¼ í†µí•´ ê°€ë¥´ì¹©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

Reading made easy!

Already enjoyed by over five million families, Learn to Read with Tommy Turtle is a delightful game that invites preschool-aged children to blend sounds into words, read and form simple words, identify spoken words and learn word families.

Its six sections include:

â˜… Magic Letter Bridge: kids learn to blend letter sounds into words by moving Tommy the Turtle across the letter bridge

â˜… Skateboards and Helmet: children practice reading as they are asked to fit Tommy's animal friends with skateboards and helmets
.
â˜… Turn the Blocks: kids make words in a way that's fun by turning real-looking blocks with letters on each side until the word is spelled out.

â˜… Word Ball: children learn to identify spoken words by helping Tommy bat the right ball (only available in full version)

â˜… Word Magic: kids learn about word families as they fill the corresponding pot with potion and watch magic happen (only available in full version)

â˜… Rocket Words: children get to practice word families as they assemble and launch a rocket into space (only available in full version)

If your children do not know the alphabet sounds yet, we recommend our Learn Letter Sounds with Carnival Kids app. And if your kids need to learn or practice the names of the letters, try our Learn ABC Letters with Captain Cat app.

Every section is designed to let children enjoy success time after time and receive positive reinforcement from the likable teacher, so they want to keep learning. Once your child is involved and happy, you can relax, with the assurance that he or she is having a great time - and learning.
ì½ê¸° ì‰½ê²Œ ë§Œë“¤ì–´!

http://www.77sparx.com/privacy

Did you know Hello Kitty loves riding her scooter? Join her in a journey around town and discover her favorite games. Over 30 fun educational games await you in the bakery, the theater, the bus, the library, and the park.

- Great content with more than 30 scholastics and arcade game for children ages 3 to 7.
- A mix of fun Math, Music, Direction, Perception, and Memory educational activities to help kids practice and improve their skills.
- Amazing arcade games.
- Dress Up game with outfits and accessories.
- Paintbox: paint and color using several backgrounds and stickers.
- Highly visual design features with fascinating details that the kids will love.
- Educational activities organized by level of difficulty.
- App approved and overseen by early childhood education professionals.
- Available in 7 languages: English, Spanish, French, Italian, German, Portuguese and Russian.

Every time you complete a game, Hello Kitty will give you a sticker to post on your album. Once you have collected all the stickers, you will win a SUPERGAME.

For more detailed information about our Hello Kitty App, please visit: http://www.taptaptales.com

Free download only allows access to some app sections, extra app sections may be purchased individually.
In Tap Tap Tales we care about your opinion. For this reason, we encourage you to rate this app and if you have any comments please send them to our e-mail address: hello@taptaptales.com.

Web: http://www.taptaptales.com
Google+: https://plus.google.com/+Taptaptalesapps/posts
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/taptaptales
Twitter: @taptaptales
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/taptaptales

Motivating and helpingÂ the kids to accomplish the tasks of the educational game.
Learning and growingÂ with our users, adapting to their needs andÂ sharing happy momentsÂ with them.
Helping parents and teachers in their educational and caring endeavorsÂ with young children, offering them top-quality, state-of-the-art learning applications.

ë‹¹ì‚¬ëŠ” ì‹¤ìš©ì ì´ë©´ì„œ ì§€ì‹ì— ëŒ€í•œ ì—´ì •ê³¼ ë…ì„œ ë° í•™ìŠµì— ëŒ€í•œ í¥ë¯¸ë¥¼ ë¶ˆì–´ë„£ì–´ ì¤„ ì•±ì„ ë§Œë“¤ê¸° ìœ„í•´ ìµœì„ ì„ ë‹¤í•˜ê³  ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ë‹¹ì‚¬ì˜ ì•±ì€ íƒ€ì ê´‘ê³ ê°€ ì—†ìœ¼ë©° "ê°€ì¡±ìš©" í‘œì¤€ì„ ì¤€ìˆ˜í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

â€¢ ê²°ì œ ë‚´ì—­ì€ êµ¬ë§¤ ë‚´ì—­ í™•ì¸ í›„ ê·€í•˜ì˜ êµ¬ê¸€ í”Œë ˆì´ ê³„ì •ìœ¼ë¡œ ì²­êµ¬ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

â€¢ ë¬´ë£Œ ì‹œí—˜ ê¸°ê°„ ì¤‘ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì§€ ì•Šì€ ê¸°ê°„ì€ ì‚¬ìš©ìê°€ êµ¬ë…ì„ êµ¬ë§¤í•˜ì‹  ê²½ìš° ëª¨ë‘ ë¬´íš¨ì²˜ë¦¬ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

êµìœ¡ìë¥¼ ìœ„í•´: 

codeSpark AcademyëŠ” êµì‚¬, ì‚¬ì„œ, ê·¸ë¦¬ê³  ë¹„ì˜ë¦¬ êµìœ¡ê¸°ê´€ì—ê²Œ ë¬´ë£Œë¡œ ì œê³µë˜ê³  ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. codeSpark AcademyëŠ” ì „ì„¸ê³„ ì²œ ê°œ ì´ìƒì˜ êµìœ¡ ê¸°ê´€ì—ì„œ ì´ë¯¸ ì‚¬ìš©ë˜ê³  ìˆìœ¼ë©°, êµì‚¬ì™€ ì‚¬ì„œë“¤ì´ ë½‘ì€ ìµœê³ ì˜ ì´ˆë“±í•™ìƒìš© ì»´í“¨í„° ê³µí•™ í•™ìŠµ ì•±ìœ¼ë¡œ ì„ ì •ë˜ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ë˜í•œ ì €í¬ì˜ êµì‚¬ìš© ë¬´ë£Œ ëŒ€ì‹œë³´ë“œëŠ” êµì‚¬ë“¤ì´ í•™ìƒì˜ ì§„í–‰ ë‚´ì—­ì„ ì‰½ê²Œ í™•ì¸í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. 


CODESPARKì˜ ë°°ê²½ ì •ë³´ :

codeSparkëŠ” ìš°ë¦¬ CEOê°€ ì–´ë¦° ë”¸ ë“¤ì—ê²Œ ì»´í“¨í„° ê³µí•™ì˜ ê¸°ì´ˆ êµìœ¡ì„ ê°€ë¥´ì¹˜ê³  ì‹¶ì—ˆìœ¼ë‚˜, ì—¬í•™ìƒë“¤ì—ê²Œ ì í•©í•œ ìë£Œë¥¼ ì°¾ì§€ ëª»í•˜ì ì–´ë¦°ì´ë“¤ì—ê²Œ ì»´í“¨í„° ì–¸ì–´ì˜ ê¸°ë³¸ ì»¨ì…‰ì„ ì‰½ê³  ì¬ë¯¸ ìˆê²Œ ê°€ë¥´ì¹˜ê³  ì‹¶ì–´ ë§Œë“  ì•±ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.

Already enjoyed by over five million families, Learn to Read with Tommy Turtle is a delightful game that invites preschool-aged children to blend sounds into words, read and form simple words, identify spoken words and learn word families.

Its six sections include:

â˜… Magic Letter Bridge: kids learn to blend letter sounds into words by moving Tommy the Turtle across the letter bridge

â˜… Skateboards and Helmet: children practice reading as they are asked to fit Tommy's animal friends with skateboards and helmets
.
â˜… Turn the Blocks: kids make words in a way that's fun by turning real-looking blocks with letters on each side until the word is spelled out.

â˜… Word Ball: children learn to identify spoken words by helping Tommy bat the right ball

â˜… Word Magic: kids learn about word families as they fill the corresponding pot with potion and watch magic happen

â˜… Rocket Words: children get to practice word families as they assemble and launch a rocket into space

If your children do not know the alphabet sounds yet, we recommend our Learn Letter Sounds with Carnival Kids app. And if your kids need to learn or practice the names of the letters, try our Learn ABC Letters with Captain Cat app.

Every section is designed to let children enjoy success time after time and receive positive reinforcement from the likable teacher, so they want to keep learning. Once your child is involved and happy, you can relax, with the assurance that he or she is having a great time - and learning.

ì•ŒíŒŒë²³ ì•„ì§ ì†Œë¦¬ ìë…€ê°€ ì•Œ ìˆ˜ì—†ëŠ” ê²½ìš°, ìš°ë¦¬ëŠ” ìš°ë¦¬ì˜ ì¹´ë‹ˆë°œ í‚¤ì¦ˆ í¸ì§€ ì†Œë¦¬ë¥¼ ì•Œì•„ ì‘ìš© í”„ë¡œê·¸ë¨ì„ ì¶”ì²œí•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ìë…€ê°€ ë°°ìš°ê±°ë‚˜ ë¬¸ìì˜ ì´ë¦„ì„ ì‹¤ì²œí•´ì•¼í•˜ëŠ” ê²½ìš°, ìš°ë¦¬ëŠ” ì„ ì¥ ê³ ì–‘ì´ ì‘ìš© í”„ë¡œê·¸ë¨ê³¼ í•¨ê»˜ ABC í¸ì§€ë¥¼ ì•Œì•„ë³´ì‹­ì‹œì˜¤.

ëª¨ë“  ì„¹ì…˜ì€ ì•„ì´ë“¤ì´ ì‹œê°„ ì´í›„ ì„±ê³µ ì‹œê°„ì„ ì¦ê¸¸ ìˆ˜ ìˆë„ë¡í•˜ê³ , ë°”ëŒì§í•œ êµì‚¬ ê¸ì •ì  ê°•í™”ë¥¼ë°›ì„ ìˆ˜ ìˆë„ë¡ ì„¤ê³„, ê·¸ë˜ì„œ ê·¸ë“¤ì€ í•™ìŠµì„ ìœ ì§€í•˜ë ¤ë©´ëœë‹¤. í•™ìŠµ - ìë…€ê°€ ì°¸ì—¬í•˜ê³  í–‰ë³µí•˜ë©´, ë‹¹ì‹ ì€ ê·¸ ë˜ëŠ” ê·¸ë…€ê°€ ì¢‹ì€ ì‹œê°„ì„ ë³´ë‚´ê³  ìˆë‹¤ëŠ” í™•ì‹ ì„ ê°€ì§€ê³ , íœ´ì‹ì„ ì·¨í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

Small but Mighty
This All-in-One Pack is a tiny app (only 2 MB) that allows users to subscribe and download the full premium versions of all of the current and future Intellijoy's apps.

Subscription Rate
You will need a subscription to access any content in this application.

Choose one of the following three plans:
â€¢ $2.99/month (comes with a 7 days FREE trial)
â€¢ $11.99/year (comes with a 7 days FREE trial) - save 66% compared to monthly!
â€¢ $21.99/forever - save 61% compared to buying apps individually (it would cost $56.76 to buy the apps separately)

7 Days FREE Trial
Both Monthly and Yearly subscription (but not the Forever option) comes with a free 7 day trial. So if you cancel within 7 days, you will not be charged.

Subscribers Get Unlimited Access to All Our Existing and Future Premium Apps
As long as you're subscribed, you will be able to download and use any of Intellijoy's premium full-version apps at no charge.

Currently Includes 24 Apps
Currently, there are 24 apps already available for download through this All-in-One app.

1) Kids ABC Letters
2) Kids ABC Phonics
3) Kids ABC Trains
4) Kids Learn Colors
5) Kids Shapes and Colors
6) Kids Learn about Animals
7) Kids Counting
8) Kids Numbers and Math
9) Kids Preschool Puzzle
10) Kids Learn to Read
11) Kids Sight Words
12) Tap and Color
13) Kids Painting
14) Kids Learn about Music
15) First Grade Math Word Problems
16) Kids Telling Time
17) Kids Connect the Dots 
18) Kids Learn Shapes 2
19) Kids Professions Dressing Game
20) Kids Draw with Shapes
21) Kids Learn to Sort
22) Alive Alphabet: Letter Tracing
23) Kids Kindergarten Math 
24) Kids Shape Puzzles Halloween

One Subscription Spans All of Your Android Devices
As long as you are logged in with the same Google account, your subscription will allow you to use this pack on any of your devices, at no additional charge.

Future Apps
Furthermore, we are constantly working on new apps. As soon as they are released, new apps become included in this All-in-One subscription at no extra charge to you.

Use this App to Download, Launch and Update the Apps
This All-in-One app will also allow you to launch all the apps from within it and to keep the apps updated.

For those using the Restricted Profiles feature
All-in-One now supports Restricted Profiles feature (if your device offers it). Just be sure to download the apps from within All-in-One using the main profile and then share them (and the All-in-One app itself) with one or more of the restricted profiles.

(ë‹¹ì‹ ì˜ ì¥ì¹˜ë¥¼ ì œê³µí•˜ëŠ” ê²½ìš°) ì˜¬ì¸ì› ì´ì œ ì œí•œëœ í”„ë¡œí•„ ê¸°ëŠ¥ì„ ì§€ì›í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ê·¸ëƒ¥ ëª¨ë“  -ì— - í•˜ë‚˜ì˜ ì£¼ìš” í”„ë¡œí•„ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì—¬ ë‚´ì—ì„œ ì‘ìš© í”„ë¡œê·¸ë¨ì„ ë‹¤ìš´ë¡œë“œ í•œ ë‹¤ìŒ (ê·¸ë¦¬ê³  ëª¨ë“  -ì— - í•˜ë‚˜ì˜ ì‘ìš© í”„ë¡œê·¸ë¨ ìì²´) ì œí•œëœ í”„ë¡œí•„ ì¤‘ í•˜ë‚˜ ë˜ëŠ” ê·¸ ì´ìƒì˜ì„ ê³µìœ í•´ì•¼í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

Learn Letter Names and Sounds with ABC Trains invites preschool-aged children to learn and become familiar with the English letters using trains and railroads as their tools.

With Learn Letter Names and Sounds with ABC Trains Lite, kids can:
1. Learn alphabet letters: As children build railroads, they learn the names and shapes of the letters in the alphabet.
2. Write the letters: Using their train car, children trace upper and lower case letters on its railroad track.

In the full version, children will also get to:
3. Identify alphabet letters: Children aim their engines to find the correct letter on a garage door. When correct, their engine drives inside and pulls out a surprise!
4. Identify letter sounds: In the phonics cargo train, children identify first-letter sounds of words with pictures on cargo boxes, and then load the correct cargo boxes onto the train.
5. Match lower and upper case letters: Children match letters before the trains move away.

3. ì•ŒíŒŒë²³ ë¬¸ìë¥¼ ì‹ë³„ : ì–´ë¦°ì´ê°€ ì°¨ê³  ë¬¸ì— ì˜¬ë°”ë¥¸ í¸ì§€ë¥¼ ì°¾ê¸° ìœ„í•´ ìì‹ ì˜ ì—”ì§„ì„ ëª©í‘œë¡œí•˜ê³  ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ë•Œ ì˜¬ë°”ë¥¸, ê·¸ ì—”ì§„ì€ ë‚´ë¶€ ë“œë¼ì´ë¸Œì™€ ë†€ë¼ì›€ì„ êº¼ë‚´ì„œ!

5. ì¼ì¹˜ í•˜ë¶€ ë° ìƒë¶€ì˜ ê²½ìš° ë¬¸ì : ê¸°ì°¨ëŠ” ë©€ë¦¬ ì´ë™í•˜ê¸° ì „ì— ì•„ì´ë“¤ì€ ë¬¸ìì™€ ì¼ì¹˜í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

Attention all students! Say hello to your new best friend this school year, Campus Student. Campus Student puts your school information at your fingertips. Real-time access to announcements, assignments, attendance, grades, schedules and much more.

LOGIN INSTRUCTIONS 
1. Download the App
2. Search for your district name and state
3. Select your district
4. Enter your username and password (provided by your school/district)

NOTIFICATIONS
Receive alerts for grades, assignment scores, attendance changes and more.

SUPPORT
Visit: www.infinitecampus.com/appsupport 
Please note: Due to privacy concerns, Infinite Campus does not maintain individual login information. Please contact your school/district. 

APP REQUIREMENTS
- Your school district must use Infinite Campus student information system
- An active Infinite Campus account is required

WATCH THE VIDEO
Link coming soon

Halloween is coming! Play with Sweet Baby Girl and have the most adventurous and fun Halloween celebration! Get Sweet Baby Girlâ€™s home ready for Halloween night: carve a pumpkin and decorate her house with jack-oâ€™-lanterns, bats and ghosts. Create your dream Halloween look: make a stunning witch costume or mix and match spooky outfits to create your own gown, and finish with a scary vampire makeup!

Now that youâ€™re all set for the night of witchcraft, magic and fun, play the best Halloween games for kids and toddlers! Visit the House of Secrets and test your memory, try to catch as many ghosts as you can, ride a broomstick like a real witch and go trick-or-treating!

**GAME FEATURES**

PUMPKIN DECORATION
Clean up and carve a pumpkin! Help Sweet Baby Girl make a scary jack-oâ€™-lantern - the symbol of Halloween!

HOUSE DECORATION
Time to decorate Sweet Baby Girlâ€™s dream house for Halloween! Choose from house decorations in 4 categories and design your own Halloween home. Free your imagination and decorate the house with pumpkins, glowing eyes, bats and ghosts!

HALLOWEEN COSTUME
Craft the most fantastic witch costume! Sew a hat, a mask and a dress. Have you ever seen a witch without a broomstick? Of course no, so make it too!

DRESS UP
Choose from tons of scary Halloween costumes! Who you wanna be tonight: a witch or a zombie, a cat or an angel? Mix and match Sweet Baby Girlâ€™s clothes, shoes and accessories, and create the most frightening outfit!

MAKEUP
Sweet Baby Girl is going trick-or-treating and she needs a scary makeup. Get your Halloween makeup kit and give her a spooky Dracula vampire makeover!

HOUSE OF SECRETS
The haunted House of Secrets looks scary but itâ€™s all about Halloween fun! Train your memory and find two matching cards. Can you complete this game in just one minute? 

HIDE AND SEEK
In this hide-and-seek game other players are not kids and toddlers like you butâ€¦ whooping ghosts, vampire bats and hairy monsters! Test your reaction and catch them all!

WITCH RIDE
Halloween is the night when everyone turns out into mysterious creatures. Itâ€™s the time when you can be whatever you want! Grab your broomstick, dress up in your witch costume, and fly above the city and forest to get as many pumpkins as you can!

MOVIES
Test your courage and watch the scariest horror movies! Accept this challenge and get coins!

TRICK OR TREAT
Get a yummy Halloween candy for each completed level!

About TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games foster kidsâ€™ creativity and help them learn while playing the games they love. Fun and educational TutoTOONS games strive to bring meaningful and safe mobile experience to millions of children worldwide.

This app is free to download and play, but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money. By downloading this app you agree to TutoTOONS Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

ê·¸ë¦¬ê³  ìš°ë¦¬ì˜ ì¬ë¯¸ ë° YouTubeì—ì„œ êµìœ¡ ë¹„ë””ì˜¤ë¥¼ ì²´í¬ ì•„ì›ƒ! https://www.youtube.com/user/BabyFirstTV

Kids educational games is all we do! Phonics made easy!

â˜…â˜…â˜… This lite version has the first four out of the eight activities (see below). â˜…â˜…â˜…

â˜…â˜…â˜… Preceded by: â˜…â˜…â˜…
Kids ABC Letters and followed by Kids ABC Trains
Learn Letter Sounds with Carnival Kids is the second app in our Reading Curriculum Series.

âœ° Have Suggestions or Issues?
Email questions@intellijoy.com and you'll get a prompt response.

â˜…â˜…â˜… Intended for: â˜…â˜…â˜…
Kids ages 2-7 (Yes, parents tell us even two-year-olds are using it!) 

â˜…â˜…â˜… "I couldn't get my phone back!" â˜…â˜…â˜…
This delightful game invites preschool-aged children to listen and learn the ABCs in ways that enchant them. 

â˜…â˜…â˜… What will my children learn? â˜…â˜…â˜…
With Learn Letter Sounds with Carnival Kids, your kids will learn the alphabet letter sounds â€“ guaranteed!

â˜…â˜…â˜… What won't my children learn? â˜…â˜…â˜…
Learn Letter Sounds with Carnival Kids teaches letter sounds and the basics of blending, but does not teach the next step, which is fluency in actual reading. Developing reading skills is a separate educational goal, which is covered in a separate game, called Kids Learn to Read, which was featured at the Google I/O on May 11th. Including in-depth reading skills in Learn Letter Sounds with Carnival Kids would detract from the focus of this game and make it too complex to invite and delight children.

â˜…â˜…â˜… What activities are included in this game? â˜…â˜…â˜…

This lite version has the first four out of the following eight wonderfully child-friendly sections.

- Learn Letter Sounds. Kids hold and turn a picture-filled letter block and hear the ABC phonics being pronounced.

- Build Letter Blocks. Children have fun building phonics recognition skills by making their own ABC blocks.

- Pop Letter Bubbles. Kids love to pop bubbles. But don't be fooled. By the time children are done with this game, they will know what letter goes with which sound by heart.

- Make Words. While putting puzzles together, kids learn the basics of phonics blending. These skills will be further exercised and expanded in the upcoming Kids Reading game.

- Let's Get Rhyming. Children roll the bowling ball and learn to clearly distinguish word-ending syllables.

- Ride the Ferris Wheel. Kids get more practice for the ending sounds.

- Squirt the Duck. Children learn the concept of vowels.

- Wack-a-Mole. This old time favorite is a new way to practice letter sounds.

Every section is designed so children enjoy success time after time and receive positive reinforcement from the likable lady teacher. So they want to keep learning.
ì–´ë¦°ì´ êµìœ¡ ê²Œì„ì€ ìš°ë¦¬ê°€í•˜ëŠ” ëª¨ë“  ì¼ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤! íŒŒë‹‰ìŠ¤ëŠ” ì‰½ê²Œ ë§Œë“¤ì–´!

â˜…â˜…â˜…ì´ ë¼ì´íŠ¸ ë²„ì „ 8 ê°œ ê°œì˜ í™œë™ ì¤‘ ì²˜ìŒ ë„¤ìˆë‹¤ (ì•„ë˜ ì°¸ì¡°). â˜…â˜…â˜…
