BRIOëŠ” ì•„ì´ë“¤ì´ ì•ˆì „í•˜ê³  ì¬ë¯¸ìˆê²Œ ê°€ì§€ê³  ë†€ ìˆ˜ ìˆëŠ” í˜ì‹ ì ì´ê³ , ê³ ê¸‰ìŠ¤ëŸ½ê³ , ì„¸ë ¨ëœ ë‚˜ë¬´ ì¥ë‚œê°ì„ ë§Œë“œëŠ” ìŠ¤ì›¨ë´ì˜ ì¥ë‚œê° ë¸Œëœë“œì…ë‹ˆë‹¤. BRIOëŠ” 1884ë…„ì— ì„¤ë¦½ë˜ì—ˆìœ¼ë©° í˜„ì¬ 30ê°œêµ­ì—ì„œ íŒë§¤ë˜ê³  ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ë” ìì„¸í•œ ë‚´ìš©ì€ www.brio.netì—ì„œ í™•ì¸í•˜ì„¸ìš”.

* Please note: This game is not playable on Nvidia Tegra 2 based devices (some tablets and phones released around 2011) *

Phonogram learning app that gets you practicing and mastering the 70 essential phonograms for the SWR "Spell to Write and Read" program. 

SWR Modes...
Single Letter(26 phonograms, 38 sounds)
Multiple Letters(44 phonograms, 69 sounds)
All (70 phonograms, 107 sounds)
Custom (4 customizable lists);

SWR Features...
Rules - enable or disable rules specific to phonograms (exist for Multiple Letters)
Play Speed - Slow, Medium, Fast
Play Order - Sequential, Random
Step Mode - Requires a manual user press to advance to next letter
Replay Loops - Infinite, 1-99

This is the official SWR curriculum app for "Spell to Write and Read" program created by Wanda Sanseri.

App created and supported by cgvelocity.com

Learning letters and sounds of ABC Alphabet phonics in educational kids games! We have put together the most effective methods to learn writing ABC & letters for kids!ğŸ­ğŸ¤—

ğŸˆWhile playing with funny food, your child will quickly and easily become familiar with all the letterst, learn how to write them and make the first steps in learning to read!

ğŸ¥¥Every task the alphabet sounds learning app gives your child is a fun and engrossing game! Entertaining stories, active gameplay and excellent usability will ease your child into the learning process. With the numerous hints and clear interface, children can play without help from adults.

ğŸ“With preschool games for kids 5 years free, getting ready for school is easy and fun!

To make learning letters more interesting, we created a magical world for each of our mini kids learning games free. In these magic worlds your child will experience delightful adventures which will encourage them to play again and again.ğŸ 

Our different worlds are:

ğŸ­Factory. Press buttons on the control panel and operate different machinery! Bake delicious letter shaped cookies for your funny friends. 

ğŸš—Gas station. Write a letter, and the magic gas station will be open for business!. Instead of filling up the airplaneâ€™s tank with jet fuel, fill it up with bubbles, fire, or even rainbows and send the plane into a magic flight. watch the plane take off on a magic adventure!

ğŸ¦Chameleon. Funny food is hiding in the grass and catching letters with its long sticky tongue. Help it catch the right letters. 

ğŸ•¶Superhero. Food-superhero rescues letters from mysterious inhabitants of the night city. The superhero needs your help! Find the right letter!

ğŸIsland. Participate in a race on the tropical island. Find the hidden letters. Fill up your car and finish the race first. 

â˜ƒï¸Snowball cannon. Letâ€™s have a snowball fight! Only the most accurate shooter can shoot a snow letter and hit the target. 

ğŸ­Caramel rope. Turn the gadget from side to side, swing the yummy letter on the caramel rope and feed the jolly character. 

Playing just a few minutes a day will help your child to acquire the needed knowledge and skills crucial for every preschooler such as:

Funny letter-shaped people help your child learn how to read and write. They handily transform boring study into a super-entertaining activity! 


Set off colorful fireworks, send the jolly ABCD characters on an elevator ride and launch a rocket into deep space! While playing with the fun characters, children themselves do not notice they are learning to read. ğŸ“š

Super Phonics uses its own unique phonics-based methodology. Children learn to recognize sound-spelling relationships and word families such as CAT, BAT, HAT, & FLAT. Over the course of the game, children see the repeating combinations of letters and remember the sounds that each produces. Every letter and sound in the game is the product of professional voice work, helping children to develop pronunciation. ğŸ¤—

No child will get bored with these charming little letters! They serve as guides to new and entertaining adventures in a variety of lively mini-games:

ğŸŒŸ Fireworks â€“ Launch bright fireworks into the sky by collecting letters in short words!
ğŸŒŸ The Elevator â€“ Help the letters find the right floor and set up a fun dance party!
ğŸŒŸ Rocket Ship â€“ Put together a team of brave letter astronauts so they can set out on a lively journey into space!

Going through the mini-games level by level, children recall how to read and write simple words. A well-developed system of hints allows even the youngest children to take the first steps in reading independently.

ğŸ’¥ The Super Phonics app for children includes: ğŸ’¥

ğŸ‘‰ A unique play-based methodology for learning to read
ğŸ‘‰ Spelling games for kids kindergarten
ğŸ‘‰ Super-entertaining mini-games for boys & girls free
ğŸ‘‰ A wide variety of difficulty levels
ğŸ‘‰ A colorful game interface
ğŸ‘‰ Memory and attention training
ğŸ‘‰ Development of fine motor skills
ğŸ‘‰ Parental controls
ğŸ‘‰ No third-party advertising

Download educational ABC learning games for kids from the Bini Bambini creative group. Play and learn to read with our free apps for toddlers! ğŸ™‚ğŸ“

Smart Kidz Club is a digital library of books that inspires young children to read so they can discover the world and develop strong literacy skills. The app allows children easy access to narrated and illustrated books â€” in an environment free of ads, animation, videos and games â€” for endless hours of reading and learning. Smart Kidz Club has created original nonfiction books that teach children about their world with interactive resources, activities, and quizzes that can enhance learning. It is an ever-expanding catalog sorted by age/grade and content area that grows with your child. 

This app is great for parents of children between the ages of 2-11 who want their children to:

1. Get ahead in reading and learning 
2. Catch up in reading and grade-level content 

Regular monthly subscription: $9.99
You can spin to win up to 80% off when you first install the app

Try free for 7 days. Cancel anytime.

All the books have â€œread by myselfâ€ and â€œread it to meâ€ formatting. Additional key features are: 

â€¢ Narration with word-by-word highlighting to build word recognition 
â€¢ Read-aloud aids in pronunciation to help your child learn new words 
â€¢ Built-in dictionary to learn words in context or to discover new ones
â€¢ New books and resources every week
â€¢ Offline access
â€¢ One of the largest non-fiction collection for kids
â€¢ Globally relevant content
â€¢ Books for special needs category

Key Areas Covered:

Alphabet, Amazing Earth, Animals, Calendar, Character Education, Colors, Countries of the World, Dialogic Reading, Dog Breeds, Ecosystems, Extreme Earth, Famous Explorers, Famous People, Friendship, Health and Wellness, History, Holidays and Festivals, Indigenous People, Life Cycles, Numbers and Math, Phonics, Physics for Kids, Poetry, Professions, Rhyming, Riddles, Science, Senses, Spanish, Sight Words, Sing Along Songs, Space and Astronomy, Story Time, Travel, US States, Vocabulary, Word Recognition, US Landmarks, Sing Along Songs

Kids meal or children meal is a fast food combination for boys and girls. Kids meal party is a food court with delicious buger, crispy fries and sweet candy soda. In the free cooking games, burger shop is the most popular food stand for happy kid; while frituren French fry is the most famous street food in kids kitchen, and soda pop is the essential soft drink in cooking games for kids. So, little chef, how about cooking kids food in the free kid games for girls by yourself? Letâ€™s play the cooking game to have fun food fest right now!

Kids Meal Party Game Features: 
1.Kids meal is famous as street food, fast food, fair food, carnival food, and also school food among kids, children and toddlers. Although your mom said it was easy to gain fat sometime, this famous food is still the trendy food game fever in the free kids games for girls.

Features:
- A cool & fun cooking game with TONS of BUBBLE GUM CAKE flavorsï¼

- Tons of realistic cooking tools to play: refrigerator, egg white separator, agitator, flour sieve, oven, shovel, cake mould, stir bar, spoon, bowl, and more!
- Tons of food materials and decorations to try: icing, yeast, fruits, candies, sprinkles, milk, flour, salt, sugar, butter, eggs, ice cream, cream, water, chocolate, cookies, caramel and so much more.

- Use interactive controls to play the game
- Try different tools to make your foods
- Mix various ingredients to create the unique flavor and color of your foods
- Decorate your foods with beautiful sprinkles, candies, fruits, plates
- Eat desserts to trigger the rainbow magic

Wear your apron and rush to your Italian pasta food making kitchen to satisfy your hunger but hang on you are a crazy kid! So how is that possible? Here comes the drill, cook tasty Italian food in your virtual world healthy food kitchen and prove your skills to be the best pasta making chef in your healthy food kitchn.

Grab the healthy and tasty ingredients and make yummy and tasty Italian pasta delicious meal with the help of your very own healthy pasta maker chef from scratch. Yes! In your kitchen food making options pick the right healthy food ingredients and start making yummy pasta for yourself. Show your pro-skills by maintaining your Italian pasta making kitching. With this Italian food kitchen you not only make the yummy tasty Italian pasta meal but open up new varieties of pasta as well with the gradual increase in your score board. 

If you love cooking and love to be the best pasta chef maker then you are right here. Try the delicious recipes of making food at pasta making food kitchen and be the cool italian food maker to make pasta at food making kitchen with fun surroundings of food kitchen cooking. Italian pasta chef maker helps you out to make the best pasta food to satisfy your hunger. Buckle up and enjoy the tasty pasta making recipes as here you will have a perfect chance of doing everything as a crazy kid. 

Tasty make pasta cooking will interact you with yummy healthy ingredients to make pasta cooking in a small pasta making kitchen to increase the taste to make your pasta tastier and healthier. Letâ€™s make the tasty Italian food, try out your favourite pasta making food to make healthy and tasty Italian pasta and become an excellent crazy pasta maker food. Italian pasta making take you to the exciting food kitchen cooking challenge to make pasta making food recipe to enjoy the tasty Italian pasta making and be the kitchen expert to make pasta.


Features

Select food items of your choice to customize your favorite pasta.
Pick your favorite noodles to make tasty pasta.
Variety of ingredients for delicious meal.
Fantastic vibrant and attractive animation of all ingredients and utensils.
Making food at pasta making kitchen take you to the fun and cool cooking world.
Small attractive kitchen environment for pasta cooking.
Get points for a perfect and tasty pasta.
With coins open up new gadgets for your pasta making food kitchen.

Features:
- A cool & fun cooking game with TONS of WATERMELON SLIME flavorsï¼
- The coolest Slime ever!
- Tons of realistic cooking tools to play: watermelon spoon, microwave oven, amount spoon, refrigerator, agitator, shovel, stir bar, spoon, bowl, and more!
- Tons of food materials and decorations to try: gummy, watermelon, glitter, icing, chocolate and so much more.

How to play:
- Use interactive controls to play the game
- Try different tools to make your slimes
- Mix various ingredients to create the unique flavor and color of your slimes
- Decorate your slimes with beautiful stickers, text, pencils
- Eat desserts to trigger the rainbow magic

This application will help your child get to know the names of different animals and their sounds . 

Which is the cow sound? The horse sound? Teach your child the noises and sounds each animal makes. 

Main features: 
- Helps children learn the names of different animals thanks to the images of each animal. 
- There are a lot of different animal noises so your child can learn each animal sound. 
- A big collection of animals separated by category: wild animal sounds, farm animals, domesticated animals, birds, reptiles, amphibians, mammals, insects, etc. 
- Learn by playing: its a fun game with animal sounds for kids, where they can play by guessing which animal corresponds to each image or sound.

Introduce your preschool child to easily understand math by playing Baldino Class, the 1st grade cool math games.

This splash math learner app includes many coolmath games: Counting, Addition, Subtraction, Arrangement, Comparing...

Your toddler will spend hours of fun learning.

This is a prodigy math game. Your prodigy child will gradually develop math logic skills and reflex by playing these cool math games.

The most important part is that this splash math learner game is totally free.

*** Beauty Coloring Book For Kids - ART Game ***

Beauty Coloring Book For Kids - ART Game is the best book painting game for girls. Beauty coloring pages help you to make beautiful drawing and fashion coloring.
You can use many brushes, colored pencil and lipstick to make beautiful make up paint coloring and drawing. This beauty drawing help your girls to feel better and learn how to draw and paint well with our free girl game. Beauty color is also for adult coloring books.
You can fill the colors in prepared image outlines and can also create your own original drawings. It is so simple and easy even the youngest kids can play it. The game includes a lot of beautiful images of famous and beloved beauty products, clothes, hats, sunglasses, jewelry, bags and wallets.

The game includes the following features:
âœ” 65 coloring pictures of makeup, rings, clothes, wallets, bags and other accessories.
âœ” 30 bright and beautiful colors to use for drawing and filling.
âœ” A free-drawing game for creating original drawings.
âœ” Filling an entire region with color, drawing with a pencil or a brush, and using an eraser.
âœ” Beauty coloring book game for makeup fashion.
âœ” Princess coloring games for girls.
âœ” Save and share your pictures with friends.

This Beauty Coloring games have many coloring pages for kids about makeup kit,makeup brushes,eye makeup,cosmetics for kids,lipstick,makeup products,eyeliner,mascara and outfits for kids. A free-drawing game for creating original drawings. Beauty Color & Cosmetics Coloring pages play offline, This coloring book don't need internet connection. You can play anywhere and anytime for your want when you need relax time and reduce stress.

- How to play Beauty Coloring Fashion Drawing Game :
* download Beauty Coloring Fashion Drawing Game from Google Play
* open and select one coloring page of Beauty Coloring Pages
* color Beauty with 5 built-in palettes
* zoom in, zoom out for coloring of small details of Beauty 
* select another one picture in Beauty Coloring Pages
* Ñolor Beauty and recolor as many time as you want
* Ñreate your own color combinations in this awesome Beauty coloring game
* all coloring fashion are saving in gallery of fashion Coloring Pages automatically
* share your coloring fashion with your friends and family in Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, WatsApp and other social networks 

Beauty Coloring Pages - The best coloring makeup therapy game ever!

It is the time to have fun with our wonderful Beauty Coloring Pages!

ì„œìš¸ì‹œ ë™ì‘êµ¬ ìƒë„ë™ 511 ìˆ­ì‹¤ëŒ€í•™êµ ì°½ì‹ ê´€ 108í˜¸ (ì£¼)í‚¤ê¸€

+827073333333

Whether you are learning English at the popular USA Learns Web site (www.usalearns.org) or trying to learn English on your own, you will want this app! The four USA Learns English Apps are your "on the go" learning tools for when you cannot sit in class or be at home using a computer. 

This first app, USA Learns English 1, has many new and exciting learning tools that teach beginning English vocabulary words to adults. The app includes videos, photos, audio, voice recording, vocabulary words, and more! Internet access is necessary in order to use the app.

The USA Learns English App 1 includes these five units:
â€¢ Unit 1: First English Class
â€¢ Unit 2: In the Classroom
â€¢ Unit 3: Numbers
â€¢ Unit 4: Around the Clock
â€¢ Unit 5: The Calendar

Additional USA Learns units are available for purchase separately. 

To watch a video about the apps, please visit http://usalearns.org/apps.

WHY YOU WILL LOVE THIS APP

â€¢ Watch videos of adults in classrooms learning English.
â€¢ Record your voice to practice speaking English - instantly compare your voice with a native English speaker!
â€¢ Practice listening with a new multiple choice activity.
â€¢ Learn many important vocabulary words!
â€¢ â€œStarâ€ a word, like a flashcard, so you can practice it more.
â€¢ See a photo of each word and hear its pronunciation.
â€¢ Check your learning by keeping track of your scores.
â€¢ Play the matching game.
â€¢ Share your success on Facebook!

WHAT DO YOU NEED?

â€¢ An Internet connection while downloading.
â€¢ An Internet connection when using the app. You must be connected to the Internet in order to use the app.

WHAT IF YOU WANT MORE ENGLISH PRACTICE?

â€¢ Download the other USA Learns English Apps for more practice. Each app contains five units:
â€¢ USA Learns English App 2: Places to Go, Countries and Nationalities, Celebrations, Family and School 
â€¢ USA Learns English App 3: Clothes and Colors, Money and Shopping, Places in the Neighborhood, Food and the Body
â€¢ USA Learns English App 4: Doctors and Medicine, Finding a New Home, Furniture and Appliances, Transportation, Recreation and Weather
â€¢ Visit the free USA Learns Web site (www.usalearns.org) for many more learning activities, including videos, reading, listening, spelling, writing and speaking practice. The site is not recommended for phones or tablets.
â€¢ Get even more English practice on our Facebook page at www.facebook.com/usalearns!

WHO CAN LEARN WITH THIS APP?

â€¢ Any speakers of languages other than English, learners of English as a Second Language (ESL), or anyone who wants to improve their English reading, writing and speaking skills can learn with this app. 

HAVE QUESTIONS OR NEED HELP? 

Please feel free to email questions and support issues to usalearnsapp@gmail.com.

Concentrate, think and swipe to connect all letters into words! An escape to the mind and a way to help stimulate the growth of your English vocabulary and spelling skills!

Walk through the beautiful hand-drawn landscapes of Word Vista while you work your brain to think and connect all the letter in each level. The harder you think, the better you play and the higher your Tree of knowledge will growth.

Word Vista is word puzzle game that will help you relax, concentrate and see the word genius that is always inside of you.

Some word games may drain your brain but Word Vista remains good balance of fun and difficulty.

Word Vista are fun and even better with the shaping tree minigame.

Word games for the young, word games for the smart, word games for the fun.

Word puzzle games uplift your literacy; word puzzle games improve your memory; above all, word puzzle games kill your boring time.

Quantum TicTacToe is a fun game to explore quantum physics concepts. On top of classical TicTacToe you can turn up the quantumness to enable new moves! Put your squares in superpositions or entangle them with other squares, and what you thought was a lost game might just turn out to be a win. By playing the Quantum version of TicTacToe, you will be able to build intuition for the strangeness of the quantum realm.

The full version will include (in a future release!) online play! 
Unlock the full version to get access to a strong quantum AI, to remove ads in between games, and to the online version once it's ready.

If you're interested in using Quantum TicTacToe for educational purposes, please contact me.

Learn how to recognize, write, and transcribe the glyphs of the Kulitan script!

READ - Identify glyphs using flashcards that become more difficult to answer over time!

WRITE - Practice writing by tracing glyphs in the correct stroke order âœï¸

TRANSCRIBE - Can't read something? Transcribe it using the two-way transcriber with a custom-made Kulitan keyboard! âŒ¨ï¸

LEARN - Are you just curious about Kulitan? The information page provided contains glyph tables, the history of Kulitan, and writing guides ğŸ“–

This app was developed in partial fulfillment of the requirements for Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, presented to the Institute of Computer Science, University of the Philippines Los BaÃ±os. The accompanying paper for this app was presented at the 2019 ICS Undergraduate Research Symposium. It can be viewed at https://bit.ly/LEARNKULITANPAPER

The information and data in this app was verified by SÃ­nÃºpan Singsing: Center for Kapampangan Cultural Heritage in Angeles City.

SO MANY DIFFERENT PLACES

Join Akili on an adventure through night and day, as she visits different places and finds that the world is full of wonderful things! 

Where will Akili go next? The forest? The ocean? Back home? With this interactive book, itâ€™s YOUR decision. And donâ€™t forget to make the birds flap, the monkeys play and the boats race along the way!

From the fluffy clouds up above to the shimmering ocean down below, explore the world with this uplifting story. 


KEY FEATURES

* READ from a choice of three levels of difficulty
* EXPLORE words, pictures, and ideas through different interactive features 
* LISTEN to the full story as well as individual words
* CHOOSE where Akili goes next-- make the story your own
* AKILI narrates the whole story herself
* HAVE FUN learning to read


FREE TO DOWNLOAD, NO ADS, NO IN-APP PURCHASES!
All content is 100% free, created by nonprofits Curious Learning and Ubongo. 


THE TV SHOW - AKILI AND ME

Akili and Me is an edutainment cartoon from Ubongo, creators of Ubongo Kids and Akili and Me - great learning programs made in Africa, for Africa.
Akili is a curious 4-year-old who lives with her family at the foot of Mt. Kilimanjaro, in Tanzania. She has a secret: every night when she falls asleep, she enters the magical world of Lala Land, where she and her animal friends learn all about language, letters, numbers, and art while developing kindness and coming to grips with their emotions and rapidly changing toddler lives! With broadcast in 5 countries and a massive international online following, kids from around the world love going on magical learning adventures with Akili!

Watch videos of Akili and Me online and check the website www.ubongo.org to see if the show airs in your country. 

ABOUT UBONGO

Ubongo is a social enterprise that creates interactive edutainment for kids in Africa, using the technologies they already have. We entertain kids to LEARN & LOVE LEARNING!

We leverage the power of entertainment, the reach of mass media, and the connectivity provided by mobile devices to deliver high-quality, localized edutainment and educational 


ABOUT CURIOUS LEARNING

Curious Learning is a non-profit dedicated to promoting access to effective literacy content for everyone who needs it. We're a team of researchers, developers, and educators dedicated to giving children everywhere literacy education in their native language based on evidence and data.

ABOUT THE APP

Read With Akili - So Many Different Places! was created using the Curious Reader platform developed by Curious Learning for making engaging, interactive reading experiences.

APP ì†Œê°œ

Akilië¡œ ì½ê¸° - ë§¤ìš° ë‹¤ë¥¸ ê³³! í¥ë¯¸ ì§„ì§„í•œ Learningì´ ê°œë°œ í•œ Curious Reader í”Œë«í¼ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì—¬ ë§¤ë ¥ì ì¸ ë…ì„œ ê²½í—˜ì„ ë§Œë“¤ì—ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

This try for free app that teaches children of all ages on the Autism spectrum or with learning delays to identify pictures and words using exciting animations to reward the child's progress. The app uses the ABA DTT (Discrete Trials Training) principles to encourage the child to progress through the different images and labels. First, the child has just one choice to make to identify an image by touching the image, then two and so on until s/he masters the image by getting it correct eight times. The app then moves to the next image. You can decide how often to give the rewards. The prompts and labels can be switched on or off. Also the frequency of the rewards can be adjusted depending on the capability of the child. The app features dozens of everyday objects and actions that children comes across. Great start to a child's learning journey! This app was designed and produced by a father of a child with Autism using the ABA principles and the same images he used in his own child's development! As a side note, the boy diagnosed with Autism at two years of age underwent intensive ABA therapy for three years before entering mainstream school. He is now working, driving and is practically indistinguishable from his peers. I would encourage any parent of a child with Autism to begin ABA therapy as early as possible. You child is most likely highly visual and will learn readily from images and sounds.

This is a New Ladybug Mirac Coloring & Drawing Book For Kids is an educational beautiful new coloring book for all nature lovers! 
You will enjoy painting these lovely images of miraculou.

Explore the secret garden created in beautifully detailed illustrations and drawings and bring them to life 
using those colorful palettes with your imagination.

Features:
---------------
- +30 High quality color pages with amazing graphics.
- Save & Share your Coloring Book For Ladybug.
- Kids beginner friendly drawing
- Support all types of devices : mobile, phone or tablet.
- Basic skills: Attention, memory & thinking
- The app even works offline & 100% FREE!
- Both girls and children will love it!!

NOTE:
All images used in this app are believed to be in public domain. If you own rights to any of the images and do not wish them to appear here, 
please contact us and they will be removed it from the application.

We at Cestone Golf Academy are here to help you enjoy golf and â€œPlay Better Golfâ€.

Our Mission - "To Provide golfers of all abilities the necessary golf lessons and golf coaching to achieve their goals."

In 2010 Michael Cestone opened Cestone Golf Academy in Pennsylvania, before relocating Cestone Golf Academy to Tampa Florida in June 2015 to pursue his passion of coaching golf. He is proficient at coaching students to reach their goals. He is certified with TrackMan, USGTF, WGCA, Callaway Club Fitting, SCOR Golf club fitting (Now Ben Hogan), Golf Genius Tournament Software. 

Michael has extensive knowledge working with junior golfers, and high school program. He coached his sons to over 30 wins on various junior golf tours. The most notable of those wins are a Pa State Junior Championship in the 14 and under division. 

Michael has his hands on the pulse of junior golf with his sons competing on the AJGA, Florida Junior Tour, PGA Junior Tour, Junior amateur qualifiers, junior state tournaments, USGA tournaments, US Kids, First Tee of Tampa Bay Tournaments, etcâ€¦ He continues to help junior golfers pursue their dreams of playing high school golf, college golf and beyond. 

Michaelâ€™s mission is to provide golfers of all abilities the necessary lessons and coaching to achieve their goals.

What you get when you download this application:

An engaging community in a familiar social Feed
Training with On-Demand access to a library of lessons and drills updated frequently
1-on-1 streamlined personal communication 
Custom swing library to track progress - known as Swing Locker
Lesson booking directly from the app.

Also links to Cestone Academy shop, and other products.

Are you striving hard enough to fend off your infants from your cell phone?
Or do you agree as a parent that use of cell phones should be productive for toddlers?

Well! Here is a mind-blowing kids educational games app for your little tots!

Kids Academy: Kids Preschool Learning Games is an all-in-one convenient app intended for little preschoolers. It helps parents to let them learn ABC, basic Maths while playing math games for kids,instruct kids to perceive colors and shapes and to focus.

Preschool Education is a time full of fun as well as learning with loads of learning exercises. This time can be utilized at the most by incorporating kids preschool games.

Our kids educational games for kids train them to have a love for learning. We have tons of exciting categories of preschool learning exercises and activities to improve motor skillsâ€“ all through kinsthetic learning model.

Now, help your children learning an exciting way! Use this creative and imaginative application for preschools and kindergarten kids. Play kids preschool learning games that help you have story-telling with your kids. 

Let them learn ABC in a fun-filled way like never before!Learn to differentiate animals, fruits, birds, vehicles, etc. Play various quizzes to differentiate letters, vegetables, learning including math games for kids for children in a progressively fun manner to lift up preschool children brain skills and IQ at home. 

Your cell phone can turn into the Best Kids Academy for your children!

Kids Academy: Kids Preschool Learning Game includes various Categories :
Kids Academy Have Main 4 Categories:

1: Starter

â˜… Preschool Learning Kids Shapes
â˜… Preschool Kids Learning Month

â˜… Preschool Kids Learning Numbers

â˜… Preschool Kids Learning Subtraction
â˜… Preschool Kids Learning Quantity

â˜… ABC Tracing & Phonics Game
â˜… Preschool Learning Letters
â˜… Learn ABC Alphabets with Tracing 
â˜… Preschool Kids Learning Spelling Game
â˜… Upper & Lower Alphabet Matching

4: Game Mode

â˜… Tap Alphabets & Learn ABC with Fun Game
â˜… Connect Dot & Learn 123 Game
â˜… Kids Learn with Educational Games

With multiple interesting games and quizzes, kids preschool games will enable your kid to improve his\her oral abilities and augment his\her vocabulary in hues, vegetables, creatures, body parts, and days, months etc. Everything important that a preschools and kindergarten kid must know!

Every toddler is great at some skills and needs to be assisted in others. Likewise, every kid learns at his or her own pace. Kids educational games like this, allows parents and teachers to focus on skills of a kid that needs to be polished. 

Kids Academy: Kids Preschool Learning Games is a free phonics and letters recognition app! It is important to have a basic knowledge of tally cash, quantities, how to tell time and learn ABC (big or small) from tots right to preschool and kindergarten kids.

Canciones y videos infantiles de la granja chuchuwa

Bienvenido


Hola, te damos la bienvenida a nuestra aplicaciÃ³n de canciones y videos infantiles de la granja chuchuwa, en ella podras encontras miles y miles de horas de diversiÃ³n sin parar.

Sabemos que te gustan nuestros videos y por esto hemos decidido ahora llevarlos a las pantallas de los moviles, con tan solo un click, podras descargar esta maravillosa aplicaciÃ³n.

Chuchuwa es uno de los videos mas vistos en internet, por esto ahora queremos que lo lleves contigo a todo lado, no importa si estas en el auto, en la casa o si vas de compras, podras disfrutas de nuestro contenido siempre y en todo lugar, ya que esta aplicacion funciona sin necesidad de conexion a internet para ver los videos, solo tendras que descargarlos una unica vez y ya permaneceran siempre en tu movil o dispositivo celular.

Nuestra aplicaciÃ³n esta optimizada tambien para tabletas, por lo cual podras disfrutarla en cualquier movil con sistema operativo android.

Canciones infantiles de la granja chuchuwa, te dara horas y horas de diversion para que compartas en todo momento y en todo lugar, podras cantar, bailar, reir y pasar siempre mucho tiempo al lado de nuestros personajes; pero eso no es todo, nuestras aplicaciones tambien ayudaran a que te formes y pongas en practica tus conocimientos, traemos para ti, retos matematicos, sumas, restas, multiplicaciones, tambien podras reforzar tu lectura y aprender a leer y mucho mÃ¡s.

â–â–â–â–â–â–â–â–

Look, a little panda is lying on the bed. Hmm, she looks hungry and wants to eat some food. So there is the question, what food does a panda eat? Bamboo? Yes, itâ€™s right. But can you think that a panda eating the hot pot? The spicy one. And okay, could you help to take care of the little panda now? Wanna to help? Letâ€™s go started.

Feed the panda
- The panda is hungry and she needs some bamboo. Go get some bamboo for her.
- Choose a knife to get the bamboo. You can use the one which is very fast.
- Go the the bamboo field and cut the bamboo. Bring it back to the room and drag it to the panda.
- The panda is enjoying the food and if she is happy, she will be willing to grow up a little.

After eating, the panda is thirsty. Go get some water please.
- Pick a bucket as the tool to get some water.
- But where is the water? Letâ€™s go to the river. Throw the bucket into the river to get the water.
- Bring the water back to the room and feed the panda.

Sleep time
- The panda is tired and she needs to sleep.
- Turn off the light.
- Play mini games with the panda in her dreams.

Look, after all the caring, the panda is growing up. And she can stand now. Really cute.
Letâ€™s continue to take care of her.

Have fun with the panda
- You know Chinese characters? Never mind, you can recognize today with the panda.She can write now. Learn with her.
- The panda is growing up and she can get the food by herself now. But we need to keep her safe. Look, she wants to climb the apple tree to get some apples, letâ€™s help her not to fall down.

Hot pop time
Have you heard of Chinese hot pot? Yes the spicy one. Think about the panda eating hot pot. 
- Choose some food for the hot pot. Veggies, meat, seafood and do not forget the drinks.
- Put all the foods into the hot pot to cook, when they are done, use the chopsticks to feed the panda.

Features:
- A cool & fun cooking game with TONS of UNICORN CHEESECAKE flavorsï¼
- Cook yummy cakes such as unicorn cheesecake with tons of delicious topings!
- Tons of realistic cooking tools to play: agitator, electromagnetic furnace, oven, quick-freeze machine, shovel, cake mould, stir bar, spoon, bowl, and more!
- Tons of food materials and decorations to try: cheese, fairy floss, vanilla essence, fruits, candies, sprinkles, milk, flour, salt, sugar, butter, eggs, ice cream, cream, water, cookies, caramel and so much more.

How to play:
- Use interactive controls to play the game
- Try different tools to make your foods
- Mix various ingredients to create the unique flavor and color of your foods
- Decorate your foods with beautiful sprinkles, candies, fruits, straws
- Eat desserts to trigger the rainbow magic

Elevate ê´€ë ¨ ì—°êµ¬ 

ElevateëŠ” ì‹ ê²½ ê³¼í•™ ë° ì¸ì§€ í•™ìŠµ ì „ë¬¸ê°€ì™€ í˜‘ë ¥í•˜ì—¬ ì„¤ê³„ëìœ¼ë©° ë‹¤ì–‘í•œ ê³¼í•™ ì—°êµ¬ì— ê¸°ë°˜ì„ ë‘ê³  ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. Elevateì˜ ë‘ë‡Œ í›ˆë ¨ ì•Œê³ ë¦¬ì¦˜ì€ ê¸°ì–µ í•™ìŠµ ì—°êµ¬ë¥¼ ë°”íƒ•ìœ¼ë¡œ ê° ì‚¬ìš©ìë³„ ë§ì¶¤í˜• í›ˆë ¨ í”„ë¡œê·¸ë¨ì„ ê°œë°œì„ ìœ„í•œ í•™ìŠµ ê²½í—˜ì— ì§‘ì¤‘í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. 

*********** 

Elevate is a brain training program designed to improve focus, speaking skills, processing speed, memory, math skills, and more. Each person is provided with his or her own personalized training program that adjusts over time to maximize results. 

The more you train with Elevate, the more youâ€™ll improve critical cognitive skills that are proven to boost productivity, earning power, and self-confidence. Users who train at least 3 times per week have reported dramatic gains and increased confidence. 

FEATURES 

* 30+ games for critical cognitive skills like focus, memory, processing, math, precision, and comprehension 
* Detailed performance tracking 
* Personalized daily workouts that include the skills you need most 
* Adaptive difficulty progression to ensure your experience is challenging 
* Workout calendar to help you track your streaks and stay motivated 
* And more! 

IN THE NEWS 

CNET 
â€œElevate comes out aheadâ€ in the battle of the brain training apps. 

Washington Post 
Elevate is a â€œcognitive pick-me-upâ€ with games that are â€œgood for mental breaks throughout the workday.â€ 

RESEARCH BEHIND ELEVATE 

Elevate's games are designed in collaboration with experts in neuroscience and cognitive learning and are based on extensive scientific research. Elevateâ€™s brain training algorithms further focus the learning experience by drawing from research in memory studies to develop a personalized training program for each user.

ê°œë°œì ì—°ë½ì²˜ :
Email: game@adop.cc
Tel: 02-2052-6256

Counting money is one of the mathematics milestones of young children. Kids, who learn how to count money, are able to manipulate and play with objects so that they can develop clear links between their own environment and the math concepts which they are being taught. 

Learning to count money by solving paper worksheets could become boring for young learners. At this virtual One Dollar Store, children can have fun counting money and learning the value of different US coins (pennies, nickels, dimes and quarters) when they pay for a toy. They must use the exact amount because the cashier does not have change.

â€¢ â€œPicture Match, Preschool Memory Games for Kids,â€ is an educational game that provides a fun and easy way to learn and memorize Alphabet, Numbers and Colors.
â€¢ Three different game modes included in this memory game; they are Easy, Medium and Hard.
â€¢ Itâ€™s suitable for the ages of preschool and kindergarten. It helps kids to learn Alphabet, Numbers and Colors.
â€¢ Pronunciation sounds at the correct match will help kids to improve their recognition skills.

How to play:
â€¢ Just tap the two cards to flip and match the pair of respective cards in the easy, normal and hard levels
â€¢ Complete the current level by uncovering all cards in the level.

Features:
â€¢ A simple and easy to understand the game.
â€¢ Three different types of memory matching.
â€¢ The Player can play in either 'Play Mode.'
â€¢ Supports all screen sizes.
â€¢ 100+ Objects to match.
â€¢ Different game modes are available for different ages of kids.
â€¢ Pronunciation sounds for each card.
â€¢ Easy to use and navigate.
And last but not least ***All puzzles are available for FREE***

Privacy Disclosure:Â 
â€¢ Does not contain links to social networks
â€¢ Does not collect personal data
But yes, it does contain advertising as thatâ€™s our means of providing the app free of cost to you â€“ the ads placed carefully such that the kid is least likely to click on it while playing.

Coloring Roses and Flowers while learning numbers and colors Pixel Art Game.

Color all Pixels with the right color by number until you finish full Flower Pixel Artworks. Share each completed picture with your friends or even create you own Pixel Art Levels by taking Photos.

ì „ì²´ ê½ƒ í”½ì…€ ì‚½í™”ë¥¼ ì™„ë£Œ í•  ë•Œê¹Œì§€ ë²ˆí˜¸ë³„ë¡œ ì˜¬ë°”ë¥¸ ìƒ‰ìƒì˜ ëª¨ë“  í”½ì…€ì„ ìƒ‰ì¹ í•˜ì‹­ì‹œì˜¤. ì™„ì„± ëœ ê° ì‚¬ì§„ì„ ì¹œêµ¬ì™€ ê³µìœ í•˜ê±°ë‚˜ ì‚¬ì§„ì„ ì°ì–´ ìì‹  ë§Œì˜ í”½ì…€ ì•„íŠ¸ ë ˆë²¨ì„ ë§Œë“¤ ìˆ˜ë„ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

ìƒ‰ìƒê³¼ ìˆ«ìë¡œ ë‡Œë¥¼ í›ˆë ¨í•˜ë©´ì„œ ëª¨ë“  ë‚œì´ˆì™€ ì¥ë¯¸ì˜ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ë¥¼ í˜ì¸íŠ¸í•˜ì‹­ì‹œì˜¤!

Whether you are learning English at the popular USA Learns Web site (www.usalearns.org) or trying to learn English on your own, you will want this app! The four USA Learns English Apps are your "on the go" learning tools for when you cannot sit in class or be at home using a computer. 

This second app, USA Learns English 2, has many new and exciting learning tools that teach beginning English vocabulary words to adults. The app includes videos, photos, audio, voice recording, vocabulary words, and more! Internet access is necessary in order to use the app.

The USA Learns English App 2 includes these five units:
â€¢ Unit 6: Places to Go
â€¢ Unit 7: Countries and Nationalities
â€¢ Unit 8: Celebrations
â€¢ Unit 9: Family
â€¢ Unit 10: School

Additional USA Learns units are available for purchase separately. 

To watch a video about the apps, please visit http://usalearns.org/apps.

WHY YOU WILL LOVE THIS APP

â€¢ Watch videos of adults in classrooms learning English.
â€¢ Record your voice to practice speaking English - instantly compare your voice with a native English speaker!
â€¢ Practice listening with a new multiple choice activity.
â€¢ Learn many important vocabulary words!
â€¢ â€œStarâ€ a word, like a flashcard, so you can practice it more.
â€¢ See a photo of each word and hear its pronunciation.
â€¢ Check your learning by keeping track of your scores.
â€¢ Play the matching game.
â€¢ Share your success on Facebook!

WHAT DO YOU NEED?

â€¢ An Internet connection while downloading.
â€¢ An Internet connection when using the app. You must be connected to the Internet in order to use the app.

WHAT IF YOU WANT MORE ENGLISH PRACTICE?

â€¢ Download the other USA Learns English Apps for more practice. Each app contains five units:
â€¢ USA Learns English App 1: First English Class, In the Classroom, Numbers, Around the Clock, and the Calendar
â€¢ USA Learns English App 3: Clothes and Colors, Money and Shopping, Places in the Neighborhood, Food, and the Body
â€¢ USA Learns English App 4: Doctors and Medicine, Finding a New Home, Furniture and Appliances, Transportation, Recreation and Weather
â€¢ Visit the free USA Learns Web site (www.usalearns.org) for many more learning activities, including videos, reading, listening, spelling, writing and speaking practice. The site is not recommended for phones or tablets.
â€¢ Get even more English practice on our Facebook page at www.facebook.com/usalearns!

WHO CAN LEARN WITH THIS APP?

â€¢ Any speakers of languages other than English, learners of English as a Second Language (ESL), or anyone who wants to improve their English reading, writing and speaking skills can learn with this app. 

HAVE QUESTIONS OR NEED HELP? 

Please feel free to email questions and support issues to usalearnsapp@gmail.com.

ì–¸ì œë“ ì§€ usalearnsapp@gmail.comìœ¼ë¡œ ì§ˆë¬¸ ë° ì§€ì› ë¬¸ì œë¥¼ ì´ë©”ì¼ë¡œ ë³´ë‚´ì£¼ì‹­ì‹œì˜¤.

Help toddlers, preschoolers, and kindergartners learn sight words with colorful animated cards and fun quick quizzes.

Kids Learning Apps provides 100 animated sight word flashcards, with unique animations and colors for each card.


Sight words is a common term in reading that has a variety of meanings. When it is applied to early reading instruction, it typically refers to the set of about 100 words that continues to appear on almost every page of text. â€œthe, and, at, was, does, their, me, beâ€ are some examples.

In addition to their being very frequent, many of these words cannot be â€œsounded out.â€ Preschoolers and Kindergartners are expected to learn them by sight (strickly memorization and no sounding out).

Sight words account for almost 75% of the words used. This specifically starts when children are in Preschool.

Features:

- 100 sight words

- Quick quizzes, 5 words at a time.

- Ability to control the volume of the background music

- Ability to control the volume of the sound and voice 

- Turn on card swipe for easy navigation

- Create another game by turning on the random feature

- 100 ê°œì˜ ì‹œì„  ë‹¨ì–´

- ë¹ ë¥¸ í€´ì¦ˆ, í•œ ë²ˆì— 5 ë‹¨ì–´.

- ë°°ê²½ ìŒì•…ì˜ ë³¼ë¥¨ì„ ì¡°ì ˆí•˜ëŠ” ê¸°ëŠ¥

- ì†Œë¦¬ ë° ìŒì„±ì˜ ë³¼ë¥¨ì„ ì¡°ì ˆí•˜ëŠ” ê¸°ëŠ¥

ì‡¼íŠ¸ ë¸Œë ˆë“œ, ì¹´ë¼ë©œ ë° ì½©íŠ¸ - 3 ë§ˆë¦¬ì˜ ê³ ì–‘ì´, 3 ë§ˆë¦¬ì˜ ê¼¬ë¦¬! 3 ë§ˆë¦¬ì˜ ê³ ì–‘ì´ëŠ” ì•„ë‹ˆì§€ë§Œ 2 ë§ˆë¦¬ì˜ ê³ ì–‘ì´ Â¼ Compote and Shortbreadì™€ 1 ë§ˆë¦¬ì˜ ê·€ì—¬ìš´ ìƒˆë¼ ê³ ì–‘ì´ ìºëŸ¬ë©œ.

ìš°ë¦¬ëŠ” ìš°ë¦¬ì˜ ì‘ìš© í”„ë¡œê·¸ë¨ì„ ë” ì˜ ë§Œë“¤ë ¤ê³  ë…¸ë ¥í•˜ê³  ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ìš°ë¦¬ê°€ ë‹¹ì‹ ì„ ë„ì™€ ì¤„ ìˆ˜ ìˆë‹¤ë©´ ìš°ë¦¬ëŠ” ê°ì‚¬ í•  ê²ƒì…ë‹ˆë‹¤. ì˜ê²¬ì„ ë‚¨ê¸°ì‹œê³  ì œì•ˆ ì‚¬í•­ ë° ì˜ê²¬ì„ kc@trilobitesoft.comìœ¼ë¡œ ë³´ë‚´ì£¼ì‹­ì‹œì˜¤.

Shapes is a educational games for the age group start from 3 up to the age 10 ,this unique educational game has something to offer to toddlers,to preschool kids,to kindergarten child,to the children of std 1,std2,std3,std4 and std 5.

This game has 24 Levels,each level is different from others and has unique features. 

The game teaches to Identify 2D and 3D shapes by using various teaching techniques,also teaches to count the side of the shape,identify congruent shapes,select the shape,count side and vertices,compare sides and vertices 

This game also teaches to identify 3D shapes,select 3d shapes,count edges,vertices and face of 3D shapes and also compare the edges,vertices and faces for the 3D shapes.

The other unique feature of this educational game which make him totally different from all other shapes games is the concept of learning comparison operator(greater then,less then,greater then and equals to,less then and equals to,equals to and greater then and less then) and arithmetic's operator(plus,minus,multiply,divide) by using shapes.

Following is the brief overview of each level ....

Level 1: Name the 2D shapes.

Level 2: Identify the 2D shapes.

Level 3: Select the 2D shapes.

Level 4: Identify congruent shapes.

Level 5: Count sides and vertices(2D Shapes).

Level 6: Compare sides and vertices(2D Shapes).

Level 7: Name the 3D shapes.

Level 8: Identify the 3D shapes.

Level 9: Select the 3D shapes.

Level 10: Count edges,vertices and faces.

Level 11: Compare edges,vertices and faces.

Level 12 and Level 13: Comparison shapes [greater then].

Level 14 and Level 15: Comparison shapes [less then].

Level 16: Comparison shapes [is equals to].

Level 17: Comparison shapes [greater then and equals to].

Level 18: Comparison shapes [less then and equals to].

Level 19: Comparison shapes [greater then and less then].

Level 20: Shape arithmetic's addition of shape sides.

Level 21: Shape arithmetic's subtraction of shape sides.

Level 22: Shape arithmetic's multiplication of shape sides.

Level 23: Shape arithmetic's division of shape sides.

Level 20: Coloring of 2D shapes.

our games don't feature fun at the expense of education â€“ or education at the expense of fun,We also know games that are too complicated donâ€™t involve and delight kids.Hope you enjoy this app and have fun!.

The game is designed for both one and two players with the option of choosing custom names and piece choice: X or O for each player. The single player mode has multiple difficulty levels with the hardest being impossible to win for the user. Have fun!

Prepare for the most magical time of the year with the pony sisters' family. Bake cookies, decorate the house, sing a famous Christmas song and style adorable winter holiday outfits!

The big and beautiful pony family needs your help to get ready for Christmas. Give a hand to pony sisters Molly and Zoe and make a colorful and tasty gingerbread house. Feed an adorable and hungry baby pony. Learn how to play Jingle Bells on the piano and sing with the pony-pianist. Decorate a Christmas tree, choose bright fairy lights and add cool ornaments. Open all the Christmas gifts by the fireplace, play the guitar with Britney, help Rosie decorate a doll house, do puzzles and much more!

Play family Christmas games for kids with their favorite pony sisters:
Â· Get ready for Christmas with 5 beautiful pony sisters and the cutest baby pony!
Â· Style, design and create a pony sisters family outfit for the special occasion!
Â· Decorate a Christmas tree, sit with pony sisters by the fireplace and make a wish!
Â· Bake yummy cookies and build the most delicious gingerbread house ever!
Â· Mix a baby formula, feed the charming pink baby pony and make her happy!
Â· Learn how to play the piano and sing Jingle Bells with the best pony sisters!
Â· Help adorable little birds in winter: fix and paint the feeder and add grains!
Â· Open all the gifts, decorate a doll house, do puzzles, color with pencils and more!

TutoPLAY is an all-in-one app pack of the most wanted TutoTOONS kids games.

We hand-selected and added the best TutoTOONS games for girls and boys to one app. Full premium game versions inside with new games added regularly. Enjoy dozens of kids' favorite games in one app! Just tap and play!

TutoPLAY Subscription
Play ALL the games for unlimited time! Choose from our subscription plans (monthly, yearly or forever) to unlock more levels and remove ads!
TutoPLAY subscription is a one-time purchase that you can cancel any time, fast and easy. No hidden fees, full game versions only, no other in-app purchases after you subscribe. Subscribers will also get all upcoming TutoPLAY content at no extra charge!

Helping Kids Learn with Games They Love
TutoTOONS games help children explore the world while playing what they like the most:
- Dress-ups are great to learn colors and clothes but they also develop kidsâ€™ art skills and self-expression.
- Cooking games show how to use kitchen tools or help parents at home.
- Cleanup games turn kidsâ€™ daily chores into super fun play and build good habits like keeping things tidy and organizing your toys.
- Pet and baby care games foster kidsâ€™ kindness, caring and sharing skills.
- Creativity, kindness, care and love â€“ these are just a few of the personal skills that kids can build playing TutoTOONS games!

TutoPLAY is a safe, secure and kid-friendly environment for kids to play in:
- No ads (after you subscribe)
- No in-app purchases
- No violence or inappropriate content

About TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games foster kidsâ€™ creativity and help them learn while playing the games they love. Fun and educational TutoTOONS games strive to bring meaningful and safe mobile experience to millions of children worldwide.

This app is free to download and play, but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money. By downloading this app you agree to TutoTOONS Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Baby Tiger Care game for kids is a perfect Christmas gift for girls and boys who love cats! Adopt and raise a cute virtual pet cat - baby tiger Lili! 

Lili is the most adorable baby tiger, and now she can be your pocket virtual pet! Take care of tiny Lili: wash, dress up, feed, play cat games and do crafts with her! Donâ€™t forget that sheâ€™s still a baby cat and needs a lot of sleep!

We saw how much kids loved baby tiger Lili from Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel and created this adorable little pet care game for kids! Now girls and boys can have Lili as a virtual pet cat! Take care of the tiny tiger, watch her stats and enjoy her unbearable cuteness!

CUSTOMIZE
Change Liliâ€™s fur to black, silver (so Christmassy!), pink or even purple! Mix and match! Add some fun accessories and cute clothes for kids! Create a truly unique look for your virtual pet cat!

FEED
Lili needs to fill her tummy with yummy cat food! Offer her what you have in the fridge and watch how she reacts to different foods! Broccoli? Eww! Confetti cake? Yum! Donâ€™t forget to take Lili to the Cafe from time to time and treat her with her favorite pizza or ice cream!

WASH
Just as any other baby, sometimes tiger Lili gets messy and dirty. Wash her at home with lovely shampoo and a soft sponge or visit the Spa for extra cleanliness and stress relief. Donâ€™t forget to potty train baby cat Lili too!

SLEEP
Baby Lili needs a lot of energy for more adventures! Sing her to sleep in her cozy baby cat bed. Enter the magical world of Liliâ€™s dreams where fluffy clouds, colorful ice cream and adorable sheep live! Save the baby tiger from her nightmares!

PLAY & DIY
Go for a walk with baby Lili and visit the Play House. Solve jigsaw puzzles, play memory games and express your creativity while coloring! Design unique PJâ€™s for tiger Lili: cut, sew, choose colors and patterns! Explore the street and find a hidden poop game for kids!

Play the best baby tiger pet care game for kids and toddlers, boys and girls:
Â· Take care of the cutest tiny tiger Lili!
Â· Customize your virtual petâ€™s look!
Â· Wash her and take her to the Spa!
Â· Feed Lili with her favorite and not so yummy food!
Â· Sing her to sleep and dive into her sweet dreams!
Â· Play mini games and do crafts with baby Lili!
Â· Pet Lili and watch her adorable reactions!
Â· Explore Liliâ€™s world and find more fun games in the most unexpected places!
Â· Play every day and collect unique plushie prizes!
Â· Unlock all super cute interactive ice cream collectibles!

About TutoTOONS Games for Kids

The most popular and kidsâ€™ all-time favorite cleaning game Sweet Baby Girl Cleanup now with tons of new cleaning fun inside!
Play messy house makeover, clean up a pony stable and doghouse, and get ready for a super cool BBQ pool party!

Sweet Baby Girl Cleanup 4 is here to help kids learn how to clean up, do their daily chores, build good habits, keep their clothes, toys and things tidy, take care of their pets and help parents at home.

Sweet Baby Girl and her friends are in the Dream House waiting for you to join their super fun spring cleaning and home makeover party. Messy kitchen, bedroom, bathroom, laundry room, car, swimming pool, water slide, pony stable, doghouse, treehouse, fence, barbecue grill and fridge need your care and attention. Get ready to clean up, vacuum, wash, bath, mop, wipe, scrub, fix and more!

Play the cutest house and horse stable cleaning games for kids:
Â· Wash dishes and tidy up the kitchen!
Â· Scrub the tub, sink, toilet and floor in the bathroom!
Â· Put things to their places, clean the window, wipe the dust and vacuum the floor in the bedroom!
Â· Take care of dirty clothes in the laundry room: sort, wash, dry and iron!
Â· Clean up in the garage: wash and polish the car, collect trash and clean the inside of the car!
Â· Clean the swimming pool: skim tree leaves with a net, clean the water with pool vacuum and fix the broken tiles!
Â· Wash, clean up, fix and color the old water slide and have tons of water slide fun with Sweet Baby Girl!
Â· Make over the outdoor fridge: throw away old food and meals, scrub and shine the fridge, then fill it with fresh fruits, vegetables and groceries!
Â· Get ready for a BBQ party: scrape and scrub the grill, prepare it for cooking and make the best burgers for Sweet Baby Girl and her friends!
Â· Clean up spider webs and dirt in the pony stable, wash, groom and shower the cutest little pet pony, and play with it in the yard!
Â· Make Sweet Baby Girl pet puppy happy: clean up, decorate, fix and color the doghouse, then feed, style and dress up the puppy!
Â· Collect trash, vacuum the floor, repair the bean bag and wipe the table in the treehouse!
Â· Paint and decorate the tree house fence with your favorite decorations!
Â· Play every day, get extra coins and collect gifts!

Dive into the magical underwater world and learn about the secret life of cute and friendly mermaidsâ€¦ and a merboy! Explore the ocean and play fun games for girls with adorable dolphins, exotic fish, crabs and other sea creatures! Dress up, style, make food and clean the ocean from nasty rubbish!

Merboy Justin lives in The Cold Sea. It is a bit freezing here, but local creatures are really warm-hearted! Help penguin parents organize a birthday party for their adorable chubby baby! Make a cake and decorate the room with balloons and accessories! Baby penguin is so happy now! Look - a polar bear sells some colorful ice cream! Choose among tons of flavors, toppings and sprinkles! Yummy! Oh no! Justinâ€™s pet seahorse disappeared! Can you help find it in the coral reefs?

Mermaid Mei lives in The Asian Sea with her friends: a crab and a shark! Little crabby is sad because his home is dirty and full of rubbish from The Land. Letâ€™s help the crab clean up his once beautiful underwater place. The shark is hungry and wants a burger! Prepare the yummiest meal: choose needed ingredients and put them in the right order! Oh no, Meiâ€™s hair is such a mess! Help her make it pretty again and create the most beautiful ocean princess tiara!

Mermaid Kiaraâ€™s home is The African Sea. How colorful and magical this sea is! But it was also polluted by people from The Land! Letâ€™s help the ocean friends clean up and make everything nice and shiny again! Remove trash and rescue a pink dolphin from chains, nets and plastic! Clean up and decorate Kiaraâ€™s house! The cutest baby octopus was drawing and its little tentacles got tangled and covered in paint! Letâ€™s help the underwater cutie! Now, meet the most beautiful fish in The African Sea! Sheâ€™s a very popular singer here and a real fashionista! Prepare the fish for her concert: create perfect makeup and fashion looks!

About TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games foster kidsâ€™ creativity and help them learn while playing the games they love. Fun and educational TutoTOONS games strive to bring meaningful and safe mobile experience to millions of children worldwide.

Important Message to Parents
This app is free to download and play, but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money. By downloading this app you agree to TutoTOONS Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Play house makeover and messy playground cleaning game for kids! Help sweet baby girl Chloe clean up her messy house before Christmas and New Year! Clean up the kitchen, tidy up the stinky toilet, wash the dishes, fix and design your dream playground! Now with new activities inside: super cute new swimming pool toys for summer, baby house decoration and baby girl Chloeâ€™s dress up game!

Have tons of fun playing the best playground and kitchen cleaning games for kids and toddlers, girls and boys! Learn how to clean up your room, do laundry, clean the bathroom and wash the dishes in the kitchen. Play outside the baby house - design your dream playground, clean up your puppy's doghouse, wash the car and more!

About TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games foster kidsâ€™ creativity and help them learn while playing the games they love. Fun and educational TutoTOONS games strive to bring meaningful and safe mobile experience to millions of children worldwide.

ê¹œì§ ë‹¬ê±€ ì¬ë¯¸ìˆëŠ” ê²Œì„ì„ ì§€ê¸ˆ ì‚¬ìš©í•´ë³´ì‹­ì‹œì˜¤!

Preschoolers must exercise their thinking skills to find the matching pair for each object. We evaluated teaching object-picture matching to improve concordance between preference assessments using objects and pictures of the same objects. Choose an item from one of the groups and to find its match in the other group.

Look at these amazing features this free game provides for you:

- Match the shadow with its correct objects
- Identify the name of body parts and connect with its picture
- All in one preschool & kindergarten learning game
- Animal Matching with their voice
- Small picture vs Big picture
- Connect baby to their child
- Preschool-Kindergarten matching pair activities game
- Connect to learn the shapes with their names
- Small Alphabet vs big alphabet
- Alphabet Letter with objects
- Vehicle Matching with their voice
- Music instrument Matching with their sound
- Match the colors with its name
- Random matching
- Montessori learning
- All Levels are Free
- Prepare children for reading and writingâ€”with lots of practice in problem-solving! 
- Development Milestone emerges from age 3 to 6 year
- Counting score on each level free

Matching is a very important basic early math skill for preschoolers. Through matching, children learn to identify simple relationships as they learn to recognize similarities of things or objects in the environment. It also helps children to develop their logical thinking abilities. the child learns in this area is to coordinate visual skills with motor skills. In its simplest form, this is the ability to look at an object, reach for it, and grab it. 

Test your memory and see how quickly you can clear the board by matching up the pairs. simple and interactive pair matching game for preschool kids and kindergarten.

Enjoy all level

About TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games foster kidsâ€™ creativity and help them learn while playing the games they love. Fun and educational TutoTOONS games strive to bring meaningful and safe mobile experience to millions of children worldwide.

â€¢ ABCs: Saying your ABCs is fun! Itâ€™s even more fun with Elmo!

â€¢ Happy Habits:Healthy habits are more fun when you do them with Elmo. 
â€¢ Laugh with Elmo: Elmo just wants to say hi! 
â€¢ Playdate with Elmo: Play and pretend with Elmo!

â€¢ ë‹¹ì‹ ì˜ ì…ë ¥ì€ ìš°ë¦¬ì—ê²Œ ë§¤ìš° ì¤‘ìš”í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. sesameworkshopapps@sesame.org : ë‹¹ì‹ ì€ ì§ˆë¬¸, ì˜ê²¬ì´ ìˆê±°ë‚˜ ë„ì›€ì´ í•„ìš”í•˜ë©´ ì—°ë½ ì£¼ì‹œê¸° ë°”ëë‹ˆë‹¤.

Try before You buy! Award winning, praised by parents, teachers and kids alike â€” Pepi Bath 2 now available to download for free!

Pepi Bath 2 is a role playing game, a toy and a little helper â€” depends on what are you looking for. It's a fun way to experience bathroom routines and take care of cute, little friends. We took boring things and made them fun to encourage learning through play.

Pepi Bath 2 is a sequel to fan favourite and critically praised game Pepi Bath. Same at it's core, but also expanded in every possible direction. Pepi Bath 2 offers updated graphics, smooth animations, four cute characters, new scenes and loads of fun!

Pepi Bath 2 has seven different scenes â€” each of them covering different bathroom situation:
- at the sink,
- in the bath,
- going to a toilet,
- taking care of clothes,
- dressing up,
- laundry room,
- play time.

Pepi Bath 2 can be played both as a set process of cleaning or without any pre-set sequence, kids are free to choose what they do. We also encourage parents to play together. As a parents we get into frustrating situations now and then â€” kids won't allow to brush their hair, protest any attempt to clean their nose or cut the nails. PEPI BATH 2 is here to help. Play together, talk about activities and learn that there's nothing scary in keeping yourself tidy. It's actually fun, especially when bubbles gets involved!

Recommended ages: 2-6

*Proud winner of Parents' Choice Silver Award!
*PEPI BATH 2 received numerous important awards, such as â€” Parents' Choice
Silver Award, Children's Technology Review (Editors choice), TechWithKids.com and many more!

Become the best sugary unicorn chef with fun Cooking Donut Game- Food Making Game for girls and boys,kids and toddlers.In the donut game,little kids can cook kinds of colorful sweet donuts!Build your own bakery empire in this baking game.Unicorn rainbow donuts with colorful wings bring children like in the fairy tale;Cute pet donuts include yellow duck donut,black white cow donut,pink pig donut,lovely panda donut and so on;Also festival donut is very popular among girls and boys,so you can make Christmas donuts in this free girl games to design as Santa,deer,and any other Christmas decorations! Wanna to be a best little chef as donut maker?Be the donuts maker and play the baking doughnuts for kids right now. Now start the fun kitchen food maker game and baking games now.

1.Look! Donut dush!A super fun cronuts bakery stands here!The donut shop sells sweet unicorn food,coloured donuts and even Christmas donut!Such a sweet maker game and bakery food games.

4.Donut dush!See what a colored donut you have cooked!Make it a trendy unicorn rainbow donut right now!Add glitter horns,colorful sprinkles,colorful candies,fun faces,sparkly wings, sweet cream on it.The good donuts look so beautiful! Now eat cakes and donuts!
5.Be the sugary chef,DIY donut sounds exciting!I want puppy donut,cat donut ,bunny donut,pig donut....lots of unicorn donuts in making games kids. 
6.Baking doughnuts and bake cakes now!Roll donut dough for making food like pet donuts.Then cut the doughnut to fry in the grease.Wow!You cook the best donut food in the cake baker and baking games for girls. 
7.Jingle bell,Santa,Reindeer,Christmas Stockings,Christmas tree,and piles of colorful Christmas surprise gift boxes over there show that we will make Christmas donut in this cake bakery games. 
8.Donut shop is open.The best Christmas gift would be your DIY Christmas donut! You will be the best sweet maker in the christmas game for girls.
9.The smell of tasty donuts,the beautiful colors of designs, all the sweet donuts that you made, take your first bite for the unicorn kid in our baking game. 
10.Time to let your colorful imagination run wild when you make and decorate the finest donut around the cake making games. 
11.Try strawberry frosting with sprinkles and colorful candy or maple with chocolate.You will learn lots of dessert making in the food make game with lots of fun .
12.Play this baking game&make cakes and share with your friends and family.
13. Best Childrens games and chef food maker ever and play free children games now.

Kids Computer is an educational application with multiple types of entertaining games that help children learn. 

Kids Computer teaches the alphabet with objects that have the letter of the alphabet, for example A is for Apple, B is for Bee, C is for Cat, etc. Kids Computer also teaches your child to write alphabets words letter by letter in an easy way with our smart keyboard. Your child can learn to draw abc letters in Kids Computer.
Different types of objects such as:
-Animals
-Fruits
-Vegetables
-Musical instruments
-Everyday objects

The game also has beautiful colors, funny faces, educational sounds, a beautiful voice and multiple languages â€‹â€‹(Spanish, English, Portuguese).

-Select the sound game and your child will learn the word and sound of the object that appears on the screen.
-The car game, here your child will play an easy game but very entertaining. Select a car to explore through a wonderful road.
-Learn to count with the fun and easy game of the jumping frog. The game will always be counting to stimulate your brain and will always give advice to your child.
- Simple numbers and operations: learn the numbers from 1 to 10.
- Paint and color: the most fun drawings to paint with colors. 
-The clock game, in this game your child will learn to read a clock.

The computer for children is a game for the whole family, and very educational for children from 6 to 8 years old.

About Minibuu:
Minibuu is a company that develops fun and educational games for children. For us, children are the main source of inspiration, so we work to help them develop their imagination, creativity and knowledge.

Tips: In the search bar, type "Minibuu" to find all our games.

Privacy Policy
At Minibuu we understand the importance of the privacy of all our users. Get more information about our Privacy Policy by clicking on: http://minibuu.com/privacy-policy

Jungle animals are about to go wild on stage tonight! But first, you need to style and makeover the furriest animal rock star band for a crazy cool music show!

Four furry jungle friends - leopard Amy, panda Pandora, Pomeranian puppy Pepper and giraffe Rachel - are waiting for you in the backstage. Style and dress up rock star animals in their dressing rooms and get ready to rock on stage like a real star. Crazy hair colors, wild hairstyles, cool tattoo designs, shimmery makeup, hundreds of stage outfits and more rock star fun inside!

Meet the band, your new furry Animal Hair Salon clients! Leopard Amy, the teen lead singer, always looks classy and loves rainbow color hair. Panda Pandora is a crazy cute and talented guitar girl. Tiny and precious Pomeranian puppy Pepper plays drums and loves tattoos. Piano player giraffe Rachel wants her day spa treatments and a new punk outfit. Don't keep them waiting and let the rock star beauty salon fun begin!

Rock Star Animal Hair Salon games for kids:
Â· Choose a rock star animal you want to play with - leopard Amy, panda Pandora, giraffe Rachel or Pomeranian puppy Pepper!
Â· Cut, color, shave, comb, dye, wash, shampoo, trim and style hair. Make a wild hairstyle for every animal in the band!
Â· Do crazy cool tattoos, sparkly glitter makeup and classy nail design!
Â· Dress to impress! Mix and match the coolest clothes and accessories to design the most chic stage outfits for all the animals!
Â· The rock concert begins! Get on stage to play guitar, drums, piano and more musical instruments. Rock like a super star with jungle animals!
Â· More rock star fun inside: collect music awards & watch cool videos for kids!

About TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games foster kidsâ€™ creativity and help them learn while playing the games they love. Fun and educational TutoTOONS games strive to bring meaningful and safe mobile experience to millions of children worldwide.

This app is free to download and play, but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money. By downloading this app you agree to TutoTOONS Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Princess Computer is an educational application with multiple types of entertaining games that helps children to learn.

From the creators Kids Computer and Baby Princess Phone the incredible baby phone simulator, now we present the amazing Princess Computer. Princess Computer teaches the alphabet with objects that have the letter of the alphabet for example A is for Armour, B is for Butterfly, C is for Carriage, D is for Dress, etc. Princess Computer also teaches your child how to write the alphabets words letter by letter in a easy way with our smart keyboard.

Different types of objects like: 
-Animals
-Fruits
-Vegetables
-Instruments 
-Everyday princess objects, like gloves, horses, mirror, shield, flowers, etc.

The game also have beautiful colors, funny faces, educational sounds, a cute voice, and multiple languages (Spanish, English).

-Select the sound mode and your kid will learn the word and the sound of the object that appears in screen. 
-The car game, here your boy or girl will play an easy game. It is a car that jumps and collects hearts the child will enjoy touring the wonderful enchanted forest trying to overcome his record.
-The game of colors, in this game your child will learn the colors of the objects. Coloring entertaining images.
-The restaurant of hamburgers will help the child to streamline his mind, identifying the necessary sequence of ingredients, such as tomato, onion, lettuce, cheese, meat.
-The games of make pairs and assembling puzzles will challenge the child to complete these mental challenges.
-Let's go shopping at the mall with princess cash register! You can play as both the shopper and cashier. Use your pretty pink cash register. Move money in and out of the cash register. Give your customer the right amount of change. Have fun and use your imagination with this princess cash register.

This game was created so that the children learn and play at the same time.
Try this fantastic game with many animations and colors to keep your child entertained.

About Minibuu:
Minibuu is a company that develops fun and educational games for children. For us, children are the main source of inspiration, so we work to help them develop their imagination, creativity and knowledge.

Tips: In the search bar, type "Minibuu" to find all our games.

Privacy Policy
At Minibuu we understand the importance of the privacy of all our users. Get more information about our Privacy Policy by clicking on: http://minibuu.com/privacy-policy

Would you like to have fun playing with Masha and the Bear? Well, then you can share a whole day playing and learning with them in this funny App with more than 20 games.

Good morning, Masha! Itâ€™s time to wake up... today is gonna be an exciting day full of games and activities to test your abilities and knowledge.

Share a whole day with Maya and her friends and discover her favorite games, like riding a bike, looking for animals, fishing, playing checkers or making cakes. More than 20 games where, apart from having fun, you will learn to tell the time, to add, to trace letters, to recycle and many other educational activities.

Now, with A DAY WITH MASHA AND THE BEAR you can play and have fun with the most complete and varied app, the best option for fans of Masha and the Bear.

CONTENTS OF THE APP

Dawn: Time to wake up...
- Learn the hours with Mashaâ€™s alarm clock.
- Arrange her cuddly toys memorizing where they are and putting each one in the right place.
- Ride the tricycle to the Bearâ€™s house collecting strawberries and avoiding the obstacles that you will find in your way. 
- Identify the animals in the forest by their tracks.

Morning: Time to learn in the school of the Bear
- Solve the additions that the Bear has prepared for you.
- Learn to write tracing the letters.
- Do you know all the body parts?
- Do you know the sound of each animal?
- Learn how to separate the garbage in this recycling game.

Afternoon: Have fun!!!
- Play soccer and shoot penalties against Masha.
- Help the Bear to plant carrots in his garden.
- Help Masha to find her way out of this maze so she can get to the lake.
- Have fun fishing with Masha in a funny arcade game.
- Help Masha and the Bear to collect the fruits that fall from the trees.
- Memorize the ingredients that you need to make a cake.

Night: The Bearâ€™s house
- Help Masha and the Bear to cook a cake with all the ingredients.
- Win the Bear in a game of tic-tac-toe... or have fun playing checkers.
- Itâ€™s time to go to bed, but before Masha has to brush her teeth.
- Masha is so sleepy... End the day with a funny platform game counting sheep.

* BESIDES these activities you can complete an album with the stickers that you will win each time you finish a game.

GENERAL FEATURES 
- Interactive and educational games for children 3-6 years old.
- All activities contain explanations and visual support.
- It encourages learning through a system of rewards and gamification.
- It helps autonomous learning.
- App approved and supervised by specialists in pre-school education.
- Parental control.
- Available in 8 languages: English, Spanish, Latin Spanish, French, Italian, German, Russian, Turkish and Portuguese.

For more detailed information, please visit: http://www.taptaptales.com

Tap Tap Tales also has other applications such as Hello Kitty, Maya The Bee, Caillou, Vic The viking, Shaun the Sheep, and Heidi.

In Tap Tap Tales we care about your opinion. For this reason, we encourage you to rate this app and if you have any comments please send them to our e-mail address: hello@taptaptales.com.

Web: http://www.taptaptales.com
Google+: https://plus.google.com/+Taptaptalesapps/posts
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/taptaptales
Twitter: @taptaptales
Pinterest: https://www.pinterest.com/taptaptales


Our Mision
Bringing joy to children and contributing to their development through the creation and publication of amazing interactive adventures full of fun educational activities.
Motivating and helping the kids to accomplish the tasks of the educational game.
Learning and growing with our users, adapting to their needs and sharing happy moments with them.
Helping parents and teachers in their educational and caring endeavors with young children, offering them top-quality, state-of-the-art learning applications.

Our Privacy Policy

Ride the railways with Wilson, Brewster, Koko and newest Chugger: Chief of Chug Patrol, Jackman, in this interactive kids train game! Read the story, complete challenges, and use your new skills to win special Chug Patrol badges. This is no ordinary train travel!

Chug Patrol: Ready to Rescue looks and feels just like a real book. Watch and listen as Jackman narrates the story, then turn the page to see each stunning 3D pop-up scene magically unfold! Do you have what it takes to be a Chug Patroller? Take part in the action to find out! Packed with games and activities: 

GAMES
â— Keep the railroad track safe from collision by clearing logs. Drive the train - but safety first! 
â— Help Wilson catch runaway wagons on the railways with Chug Patrol 1, the Claw Car - hone your traffic skills!
â— Rush to rescue Koko from the collapsing mine tunnel. 
â— Lay track with Brewster and the Chuggineers. 
â— Learn how to be a high speed Chugger with Koko and leader of Speed Fleet, Hanzo . 
â— Clean up messy train travel Chuggers in the Chug Wash. 
â— Launch coloured flares up into the air under the watchful eye of Jackman. Watch out, they're loud! 
â— Rescue a derailed Emery with Chug Patrol 4, the Stretch Car. 
â— ...and much, much more! Wowzer! 
_______________________________

FEATURES
Are you ready to rescue? In Chug Patrol: Ready to Rescue railroad game, you can join the trainees as they move up to advanced training and set out on their most exciting railroad adventures yet. Put your bravery to the test and become a trainee Chug Patroller just like Wilson. Explore the railways with Koko as she trains for Speed Fleet, and help Brewster prove he has the strength and determination to become a hard-working Chuggineer. 

Get ready Chug Patrollers! YOU are in control and ready to roll! 

Â· The official kid train app of the Chug Patrol: Ready to Rescue extended episode 
Â· Features the newest Chuggers of Chuggington â€“ Jackman, Zack and Hanzo 
Â· Full 3D experience â€“ itâ€™s just like a real book 
Â· 21 pages of exciting story, animation and illustrations 
Â· 9 stunning 3D pop-up scenes with interactive games and activities 
Â· Positive reinforcement for reading and playing along. Win a Chug Patrol badge when each game is completed!
Â· Read to Me, Read it Myself and Autoplay modes 
Â· Features a fantastic musical score and lots of traintastic sound effects 
Â· Say goodnight with your favourite trainees â€“ Wilson, Brewster and Koko

ì‘ì€ ì•„ì´ëŠ” ì¢…ì¢… ë¬¸ì œê°€ ì‹ë³„ ë° ìƒ‰ìƒì˜ ì´ë¦„ì„ ì§€ì •í•´ì•¼í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ì´ ê²Œì„ì€ ìì‹ ì˜ ìƒ‰ìƒì„ ë°°ìš¸ë¿ë§Œ ì•„ë‹ˆë¼, ë‹¤ë¥¸ ê°œì²´ì™€ ì´ë“¤ì˜ ìƒê´€ ê´€ê³„ë¿ë§Œ ì•„ë‹ˆë¼ ë¯¸ì·¨í•™ ì•„ë™ì„ í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ì´ ìƒ‰ìƒ ì‚¬ì´ì˜ ì‹œê°ì  ì°¨ì´ë¥¼ ì•Œ ìˆ˜ì—ì„œ 3 ì„¸ ì–´ë¦°ì´ë¥¼ìœ„í•œ ë§¤ìš° ì¤‘ìš”í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ê·¸ë“¤ì—ê²Œ ìƒˆë¡œìš´ ì •ë³´ë¥¼ ê¸°ì–µí•˜ëŠ” ë° ë„ì›€ì´í•˜ëŠ” ê°€ì¥ ì¢‹ì€ ë°©ë²•ì€ ê²Œì„ì„í•˜ê³  ë°ì€ ì‚¬ì§„ì„ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì…ë‹ˆë‹¤. ë¶€ëª¨ë¥¼ìœ„í•œ ì¢‹ì€ ì•„ì´ë””ì–´ê°€ í™”ë©´ì— ë³´ì—¬ì§€ëŠ” ê°ì²´ì˜ ìƒ‰ìƒì„ ì´ì•¼ê¸°í•˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì…ë‹ˆë‹¤. ì˜ˆë¥¼ ë“¤ì–´, ë§, "ê·¸ë ˆì´ ë§ˆìš°ìŠ¤ëŠ” íšŒìƒ‰ ë§í•  ìˆ˜ìˆëŠ”, íšŒìƒ‰?"ê·¸ëŸ¼ ë‚˜ì¤‘ì— ë¬¼ì–´, "ë¬´ìŠ¨ ìƒ‰ê¹” ë§ˆìš°ìŠ¤ì…ë‹ˆê¹Œ?"ë‹¹ì‹ ì€ì´ ìš´ë™ ê·¸ ë°˜ëŒ€ì˜ ì‘ì—…ì„ ìˆ˜í–‰ í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤ ì„¸ ê°œì˜ ê·¸ë¦¼ì„ë³´ê³  ì•„ì´ë¥¼ ë¬¼ì–´ ìì‹ ì˜ ìƒ‰ ì´ë¦„ì„ ì§€ì •í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.
