Kidomi is the all-in-one super app for kids ages 3-8! Kidomi satisfies kids endless curiosity with thousands of hours of play, hundreds of activities and new content to discover daily. 

Your Kidomi subscription: 
- Gives your child access to a diverse set of games, learning activities, and creativity platforms
- Get a new activity to discover and play every day with the Kidomix!
- Kidomi's parent tools give insights to everything your child is playing and learning 
- Provides easy parent tools to manage screen time 
- Easily search for activities and add them to your child's playlist
- Get activity recommendations based on your child's interests to get them started

Subscribe to Kidomi today for only $1.99 a Week or $29.99 a year. With the all new weekly subscription you can pay as you go and cancel the auto-renewing subscription at anytime.

Subscription Details:

â€¢ Subscribe to Kidomi and you aren't billed for the first 7 days. Then, itâ€™s only $1.99 per week or $29.99 a year for unlimited access to hundreds of engaging activities!
â€¢ The first payment will be charged to your account on the first day following your 7th day, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the trial period.
â€¢ The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
â€¢ Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Your account will identify the cost of the renewal.
â€¢ Subscriptions are managed by the user and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.
â€¢ Cancellation of the current subscription is not allowed during active subscription period. Cancelling the subscription will disable auto-renewal at the end of the current cycle.
â€¢ Any unused portion of the initial 7 day period, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

Please note: 
- Kidomi is compatible with devices running OS 5.0+
- An Internet Connection is required to play, offline play is not supported

**Parents' Choice Silver Honor**
**Tech for Kids - Best Pick App**
**Children's Technology Review - Editor's Choice**

â€œWhen you have to go potty, stop and go right away. Flush and wash and be on your way.â€

Daniel Tiger and his friend Katerina Kittycat are like a lot of young children - they donâ€™t always want to stop playing when they have to go to the bathroom. It can be hard to stop when theyâ€™re having so much fun. But when they start to wiggle, itâ€™s time to Stop & Go Potty!

With Daniel Tigerâ€™s Stop & Go Potty app, children will practice stopping their play when they have to go potty and learn about their important bathroom routines at the potty and sink.

FEATURES
Â·Help Daniel and Katerina at the potty and sink. Practice bathroom routines like wiping, flushing, and washing & drying hands before returning to play.
Â·Build blocks with Daniel and move the dump truck back and forth. When Daniel starts wiggling, help him stop playing and go to the bathroom.
Â·Play with Katerina at the water wall. Controlling where the water goes reminds children of how they are working on their own self-control, especially about stopping and going potty.
Â·Stack rings with Baby Margaret. Children can even help Mom Tiger change Margaretâ€™s diaper.
Â·Four select videos from the award-winning PBS KIDS program, â€œDaniel Tigerâ€™s Neighborhood.â€
Â·Helpful information for parents about â€œLearning to Use the Pottyâ€ from Fred Rogers.

â€œIt can be hard for children to stop what they are doing to go to the bathroom. It helps them to know that what they were doing will be there when they return.â€
-Fred Rogers

Daniel Tigerâ€™s Stop & Go Potty was developed by Schell Games for PBS KIDS and The Fred Rogers Company. It is based on the hit PBS KIDS series â€œDaniel Tigerâ€™s Neighborhood,â€ produced by The Fred Rogers Company.


ABOUT PBS KIDS
Daniel Tigerâ€™s Stop & Go Potty app is part of PBS KIDSâ€™ ongoing commitment to helping kids build the skills they need to succeed in school and in life. PBS KIDS, the number one educational media brand for kids, offers all children the opportunity to explore new ideas and new worlds through television and digital media, as well as community-based programs.

Privacy
Across all media platforms, PBS KIDS is committed to creating a safe and secure environment for children and families and being transparent about what information is collected from users. To learn more about PBS KIDSâ€™ privacy policy, visit pbskids.org/privacy.

21 interactive educational games for your preschool and kindergarten kids! These games and lessons are used by millions of parents and teachers to help educate and entertain young kids. As your pre-k child progresses through the lessons they earn stickers to add to their board, rewarding them for learning and playing! This is a perfect collection of educational games for little kids.

Helpful voice narrating, colorful graphics, and fun sound effects will help your pre-k child learn letters, spelling, math, and more! Designed using real world preschool and kindergarten curriculums and uses common core state standards. Kindergarten and preschool kids love these games! Includes 2 free games, unlock all 21 games through a simple in-app purchase. 

Educational Games: 
- Shapes and Colors: Identify shape and color differences
- Letters: Learn letters with helpful pictures and voices
- Counting: Count with helpful voice narration to learn numbers
- Memory: Flip and match cards to help improve memory and attention
- Alphabet: Pop bubbles while learning the alphabet
- Addition: Add fruit together to learn addition
- Puzzles: Fun and colorful puzzles, with cute animals
- Spelling: Spell hundreds of words with helpful voice narration
- Subtraction: Pop fruit to help learn subtraction, an important kindergarden skill
- Positions: Learn left, right, and center. Important for preschool and kindergarten
- Nouns and Verbs: Identify the difference between nouns and verbs, a building block for reading
- Counting Down: Count down from 10 and launch a rocket
- Months: Sort the months and put them in the correct order
- Upper and Lower Case: Match upper and lower case letters by dragging them together, an important step for reading
- Missing Numbers: Find the missing number in the sequence
- Phonics: Match a picture to the phonic sound
- Quantity: Learn what a number actually means
- Measure: Compare short and tall objects, and heavier vs light objects
- Patterns: Identify repeating patterns using a fun animal
- More, Less, Equal: Play with marbles and learn the concept of more, less, and equal
- Vowels and Consonants: Identify vowels and consonants in words and the alphabet

Advanced Features in the Full Version Include:
- Detailed Progress Reports to help track your child's development
- Lesson Builder to create specific plans for your toddler to follow and play
- Multiple User support so up to 6 kids can play on the same app
- Avatars, stickers, and backgrounds for your toddler to unlock as they learn

Perfect for pre-k children, toddlers, kids, and students in kindergarden who need a fun and entertaining educational game to play. Keep your preschool and kindergarten age child entertained while they are learning, with cute animals, sounds, and music. These games are loved by little kids all over the world!

Ages: 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, or 7 year old kindergarden children. Ideally suited for 5 year old or 4 year old children.

=====================================

ALREADY PURCHASED?
If you have purchased the games already and they are now showing locked you can tap the Parents icon in the upper right corner, and then tap 'Restore Purchase' to unlock the games again for free!

PROBLEMS WITH THE GAME? 
If you are having issues with the sound stopping, or any other problems with the game, please email us at help@rosimosi.com and we will get it fixed for you ASAP.

LEAVE US A REVIEW!
If you're enjoying the game then we'd love for you to leave us a review! Reviews help small developers like us keep improving this game.

ë‹¹ì‹ ì´ ê²Œì„ì„ ì¦ê¸°ê³  ìˆë‹¤ë©´, ìš°ë¦¬ëŠ” ë‹¹ì‹ ì´ ìš°ë¦¬ì—ê²Œ ë¦¬ë·°ë¥¼ ë‚¨ê¸¸ ì‚¬ë‘í•´! ë¦¬ë·°ëŠ” ìš°ë¦¬ì™€ ê°™ì€ ì†Œê·œëª¨ ê°œë°œìê°€ì´ ê²Œì„ì„ ê³„ì† ê°œì„  í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆë„ë¡ ë„ì™€ì¤ë‹ˆë‹¤.

â˜…â˜†Meow Meow Star Acres was chosen among the Best Games of 2014 on Google Playâ„¢â˜†â˜…

Meow Meow Star Acres is an island simulation game that can be played by simply swiping the screen. The gameplay is simple and intuitive so children and adults can both enjoy it.

Explore Star Acres and help the cats cultivate the fields and raise farm animals. You can use your crops to make butter, bake a cake, and learn all kinds of other recipes. Share the food you make with your feline friends and they will give you coins and stars. You can then buy new tools and decorations with your coins to make your island unique!

The cats in Star Acres cannot wait to spend time with you!

-----
Meow Meow Star Acres Official Facebook Page:
https://www.facebook.com/MeowMeowStarAcresOFCL
-----

FEATURES

â– Just swipe the screen
Not only adults, but small children can play as well. Gathering all your crops with one drag of the finger is effortless!
â– Watch the cute cats as they work and play
They cultivate the fields, cook, skip work, and sometimes get angry. Just try to resist their cute mannerisms!
â– Learning recipes is fun
Baking cakes, squeezing juice, making cheese . . . When you level up, the cats learn a new recipe!
â– Experience their heartwarming island lifestyle
Till the fields, raise chickens and cows, and make your island beautiful. This warm, laid-back paradise is waiting for you!
â– Sail to other islands
Hop on a ship to visit and explore your friends' islands. If you are lucky, you may even find items there!
â– Android tablet compatibility
â– Can transfer data
Recover your game data or transfer it to a new phone by way of advanced user registration.
â– Safety measures to prevent accidental in-game purchases
â– Can be played offline
Only certain features require a network connection.

-----
Meow Meow Star Acres is free to download. No complicated registration is required!

ğŸ† 1st place in â€œEntertainmentâ€ in Runet Rating 2018!
ğŸ† 1st place in â€œApp For Kidsâ€ in Golden App 2016!
ğŸ† 3rd place in â€œEntertainmentâ€ in Golden App 2017!

ğŸ“– The â€œLittle Storiesâ€ series present bedtime fairy tales for children, in which your kid plays the main part. It's quite simple â€“ just enter your kid's name and gender in the settings window and enjoy reading books about your son or daughter.

ğŸµ To make it even cooler, we've added beautiful melodies and wonderful pictures to help you raise your child by giving him or her only positive examples.

ğŸŒ™ These stories have a positive impact on the development of your child. We recommend reading them aloud to your children before bed to help the lessons contained in them soak in better. Even though female and male versions of the fairy tales have the same plot, there are some differences between the texts. This has an educational goal in view making right accents in child-rearing depending on a childâ€™s gender.

â˜€ï¸ Our great illustrated story books give a child an opportunity to become a hero who can solve various problems and make right deeds. Children are excited with our fairy tales! Donâ€™t be surprised when your baby will ask you to read these story books for kids over and over again.

ğŸ‘ In our turn, we do our best to make the reading books for kids as great as possible. All illustrations are in the best possible quality; the melodies are calm and beautiful, the plots of the stories are kind and educative. The reading books for children are quite short to make it easy for a child to listen till the end of the story, which is rather important. Our bedtime story books for kids are very interesting as they narrate about animals, insects, princes and princesses, etc. They teach love, respect, kindness, self-confidence. After having the book downloaded, you will need no online connection.

ğŸ’¯ We spend hundreds of working hours on each story book, only because we love children. We dream of growing a healthy and genial generation of kids, therefore we do our best to make some of our bedtime reading books for kids available for free. However, a good deal of success depends on your support. We work for the youngest pioneers to help them change life on Earth for better in the future. We strongly believe that childhood memories of your children will be very vivid.

* Please note: This game is not playable on Nvidia Tegra 2 based devices (some tablets and phones released around 2011) *

Baby ABC for kids who want to learn letters and sounds of the whole alphabet! Kindergarten education with free learning games for toddlers age 3 - 5!

âœï¸ğŸ‘†ğŸ“š Learning to read is extremely interesting and very exciting with Super-fun game. Playing with amusing Super letters for kids, your children will get familiar with the baby alphabet for toddlers. Your children will learn how to write and pronounce letters, as well as develop beginning reading skills.

ğŸ‘¶ There are many educational and fun games:

ğŸ“Œ GETTING ACQUAINTED WITH LETTERS AND SOUNDS:
"Pop up Bubbles with Letters!" Collect the correct letters in a bucket of paint.

ğŸ“Œ LEARNING TO WRITE LETTERS:
"Write a Super Letter!" - write your animated letters with the help of the magic paint. Educational games for children.

ğŸ“Œ LEARNING TO READ WORDS:
"Letters in Boxes!" - catch running letters and make words out of them. Assemble a cute character from construction pieces and watch it come to life!

ğŸ“Œ REMEMBER THE LETTERS:
"Smart jumps"- tap on the correct steps to help the letter reach the goal! 

ğŸ“Œ REINFORCING LEARNED MATERIAL:
"Puzzle-hide and seek with Super Alphabet!" - find characters that start with the given letter and put them onto their correct places.
"Friendly Chase!" - catch all the right letters for the character.

Super ABC! Free Learning games for kids! Preschool apps:

ğŸ”µ An entertaining form of tracing abc!
ğŸ”µ Funny animations & amazing music!
ğŸ”µ Hilarious sound effects!
ğŸ”µ A large variety of free learning games for toddlers age 3!
ğŸ”µ Parental control
ğŸ”µ No outside ads

There is only a part of the content available in the free version of the application. To gain access to the full version, you will need to make a built-in purchase.

Educational games for children whose parents are interested in developing attention span, fine motor skills, creativity and imagination. Learning letters and sounds.

We are in absolute confidence that alphabet will help your kids learn to read kindergarten, learn letters and sounds for kindergarten, and establish a solid foundation for good reading skills! Baby ABC for kids Learn alphabet for toddlers!

This tracing ABC kids app has been created by Bini Bambini, a software company which develops educational games for preschoolers Our app is distinguished by high quality content with particular attention to design. The purpose of all our games are aimed for all-round development. Kids games for toddlers help preschoolers to develop memory, attention span, vocabulary and speech, as well as logic and fine motor skills.

As a company we strive to make our games for kids 3 years free practical. Our apps are oriented on all-round development.

ìš°ë¦¬ëŠ” ì•ŒíŒŒë²³ì´ ìœ ì¹˜ì› ì½ê¸°, ìœ ì¹˜ì›ì— ëŒ€í•œ í¸ì§€ ë° ì†Œë¦¬ ë°°ìš°ê¸°, ê·¸ë¦¬ê³  ì¢‹ì€ ë…í•´ ê¸°ìˆ ì„ìœ„í•œ í™•ì‹¤í•œ í† ëŒ€ë¥¼ ë§ˆë ¨í•˜ëŠ” ë° ë„ì›€ì´ë˜ëŠ” ì ˆëŒ€ì ì¸ í™•ì‹ ì„ ê°€ì§€ê³  ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤! ì•„ì´ë¥¼ìœ„í•œ ì•„ê¸° ABC ìœ ì•„ë¥¼ìœ„í•œ ì•ŒíŒŒë²³ì„ ë°°ìš°ì‹­ì‹œì˜¤!

ì´ ì¶”ì  ABC ì–´ë¦°ì´ ì•±ì€ ë¯¸ì·¨í•™ ì•„ë™ì„ìœ„í•œ êµìœ¡ìš© ê²Œì„ì„ ê°œë°œí•˜ëŠ” ì†Œí”„íŠ¸ì›¨ì–´ íšŒì‚¬ ì¸ Bini Bambiniê°€ ì œì‘í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.ì´ ì•±ì€ ë””ìì¸ì— íŠ¹íˆì£¼ì˜ë¥¼ ê¸°ìš¸ì—¬ ê³ í’ˆì§ˆ ì½˜í…ì¸ ë¡œ êµ¬ë¶„ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ëª¨ë“  ê²Œì„ì˜ ëª©ì ì€ ëª¨ë“  ê°œë°œì„ ëª©í‘œë¡œí•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ìœ ì•„ë¥¼ìœ„í•œ í‚¤ì¦ˆ ê²Œì„ì€ ë¯¸ì·¨í•™ ì•„ë™ë“¤ì´ ê¸°ì–µë ¥, ì§‘ì¤‘ë ¥, ì–´íœ˜ë ¥ ë° ì–¸ì–´ ëŠ¥ë ¥ê³¼ ì •ë°€í•œ ìš´ë™ ëŠ¥ë ¥ì„ í‚¤ìš¸ ìˆ˜ ìˆë„ë¡ ë„ì™€ì¤ë‹ˆë‹¤.

íšŒì‚¬ë¡œì„œ ìš°ë¦¬ëŠ” 3 ë…„ê°„ ë¬´ë£Œë¡œ ì•„ì´ë“¤ì„ìœ„í•œ ê²Œì„ì„ ë¬´ë£Œë¡œ ë§Œë“¤ë ¤ê³  ë…¸ë ¥í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ìš°ë¦¬ì˜ ì• í”Œ ë¦¬ì¼€ì´ì…˜ì€ ëª¨ë“  ë¼ìš´ë“œ ê°œë°œì„ ì§€í–¥í•˜ê³  ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

From the multi award-winning animators and producers of BAFTA nominated pre-school learning favourites Alphablocks and Numberblocks, we bring you Numberblocks Hide and Seek.

As seen on CBeebies.

This app helps your child get to grips with addition, number bonds and other key number skills. Find the hidden Numberblocks, add them together and see what happens. 

â— Every time you get to Ten, you win something new to play with.

â–º Play hide and seek! Tap on the Numberblocks when they poke their heads out.

â–º When you have found two Numberblocks, drag one on top of the other to start the number magic. 

â–º Predict what will happen when you add them together - if you donâ€™t know, take a guess.

â–º Make the number magic happen yourself: drag both Numberblocks into the white shape. Watch the number magic happen. 

â–º Keep finding more Numberblocks and adding them on until you make a Ten. 

â–º An animation plays to celebrate every time you make Ten. 

â–º You will also discover a new interactive plaything in the park. Try playing with it!

As you keep playing, the sums get gradually harder and the Numberblocks try out new number shapes. This helps children get better at recognising amounts on sight. If a Numberblock looks unfamiliar, try counting their blocks!

Keep going to fill the park with playthings. After discovering all 20, you can restart the game and play again. Repeat play is a great way to get better at your number bonds and predicting which Numberblocks you will make.

ê²Œì„ì„ ê³„ì†í•˜ë©´ì„œ í•©ê³„ëŠ” ì ì  ë” ì„¸ê²Œ ë‚˜ì˜¤ê³  Numberblockì€ ìƒˆë¡œìš´ ìˆ«ì ëª¨ì–‘ì„ ì‹œë„í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ì´ë ‡ê²Œí•˜ë©´ ì•„ì´ë“¤ì´ ì‹œë ¥ì— ë§ëŠ” ì–‘ì„ ì¸ì‹í•˜ëŠ” ë° ë„ì›€ì´ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤. Numberblockì´ ìµìˆ™í•˜ì§€ ì•Šì€ ê²½ìš° ë¸”ë¡ì„ ì„¸ì–´ë³´ì‹­ì‹œì˜¤.

ë†€ì´ ê³µì›ìœ¼ë¡œ ê³µì›ì„ ì±„ìš°ì‹­ì‹œì˜¤. 20 ê°œê°€ ëª¨ë‘ ë°œê²¬ë˜ë©´ ê²Œì„ì„ ë‹¤ì‹œ ì‹œì‘í•˜ê³  ë‹¤ì‹œ ê²Œì„ì„ ì‹œì‘í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ë°˜ë³µ ì¬ìƒì€ ë²ˆí˜¸ ì±„ê¶Œì„ ê°œì„ í•˜ê³  ì–´ë–¤ ë²ˆí˜¸ ë¸”ë¡ì„ ë§Œë“¤ì§€ ì˜ˆì¸¡í•˜ëŠ” ì¢‹ì€ ë°©ë²•ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤.

***Awarded as Most Innovative Game: Best Of 2017 by Google Play***

Kidlo Coding for Kids is a fun coding game to teach kids the very basics of programming, a very essential skill in today's world. It teaches coding with fun games like firefighting and playing a dentist. Kidlo Coding helps kids improve their problem-solving skills, boosts memory and increases logical thinking skills.

Kidlo Coding is a winner of:
* 2018 Academics' Choice Smart Media Award
* Tillywig Brain Child Award
* Mom's Choice Gold Award

Using this app, kids will learn basics of programming with sequencing, loops and functions with coding games. There are 11 coding games for kids:

â˜… Little Firefighter - Kids can learn sequencing, function and loops with firetrucks & cute firefighter games with 50 levels
â˜… Monster Dentist - Learning good manners is made super easy with Dentist coding games. Little ones will learn how to take care of their teeth while they can enjoying eating yummy treats
â˜… Chomp The Fruit - Complete the levels by finding the right path to reach the yummy fruits to feed the chomping monsters
â˜… Garbage Truck - Code & help the little Kidlo Star to collect all of the garbage. Play & keep the city clean
â˜… Pop The Balloons - Popping balloons has always been so much fun! But here is a game to brain train while having fun
â˜… Ice Cream Time - Memorize what the little monster wants and code to feed it. Educational memory games for kids
â˜… Smoothie Maker - Learn colors and make colorful smoothies with this coding games section
â˜… Music Jam - Learn sounds of different musical instruments and see the cute character dancing to its beats
â˜… Connect The Dots - Join the dots to complete all levels with your all time favorite game
â˜… Build Your House - Build a house by coding the correct position shown in the image
â˜… Dress Up Occupations - Collect all the items in the game and learn new professions with new levels & many more games!

There are 700+ interesting levels in all, which can be solved by sequencing, loops and functions.

What does this app offer to teach kids basic programming concepts?

Sequence - Learn Sequencing With Coding Games
Sequence is the first step and most important part of coding. Here the command is executed exactly in the same order of events given by the coder.

Loops - Learn Loops With Coding Games
Loop is a concept for repeating a set of commands.

Functions - Learn Functions With Coding Games
Functions are a set of commands which can be used anytime as per the coders wish or requirement.

What will kids learn with these coding games?
* Recognize patterns to complete all levels
* Order actions in a logical sequence
* Learn to implement patterns in their day to day life
* Easy instructions to apply in their daily lives
* Discover the right actions needed to solve each level

Subscription Details:
- Subscribe to get access to full content. Subscription options: Monthly, Yearly and Half-Yearly.
- Cancel subscription renewal anytime via Google Play.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period.
- Use the subscription in any Android Phone/Tablet registered with your Google account.

Kids can easily learn to code with educational games. Download these Kidlo Coding App For Kids to train their brain in a fun and easy way!

DOWNLOAD AND LEARN THE ALPHABET

Looking for an engaging and educational preschool app to learn ABCâ€™s, tracing and letter sounds?

Meet ABC Phonics and Tracing - early literacy app from Dave and Ava! Whether mastering phonics or building vocabulary, Dave and Ava will keep young learners busy with fun activities for hours. This app is perfect for children, ages 1-6. 

HANDS-ON, MINDS-ON APPROACH 

- Interacting with letters to learn cute sounds they make 
- Revealing the hidden objects to develop fine motor skills and sparkle the imagination
- Feeding hungry bugs with yummy fruits while learning to trace the letters of the English Alphabet 
- Working on letter recognition skills

SPECIAL FUN REWARDS 

Dave and Ava prepared lots of surprises to keep preschool-aged learners motivated. 
Wonderful animations help to learn letters and their sounds in a fun and engaging way! 
Interactive elements make ABC Phonics and Tracing app easy to use even for toddlers.â€¨

KID-FRIENDLY AND SAFE 

No third-party advertising.
Parent control feature supports a completely safe environment - there is no ability for an external party to contact your kids. 
We provide the tool to encourage your childâ€™s natural desire to discover!

You can download the app for free to get 3 letters. The additional purchase will be applied to access all the letters of the English Alphabet. 

NOTE: This app requires Android 4.4 or later

Watch all Dave and Ava videos for free on YouTube â€“ youtube.com/daveandava

Have questions or suggestions? We are here to help. Email us at app@daveandava.com

Pups Take Flight is now PAW Patrol Air and Sea Adventures! Kids take to the sky and sea with the PAW Patrol pups in a game featuring the Air and Sea Patrollers and the teamâ€™s new flight suits! The PAW Patrol Air and Sea Adventures app teaches children pre-k math skills with the help of their PAWsome pup heroes from the Nick Jr. TV show!

All the game controls are made just for kids, so your preschooler can:
â€¢ Fly the skies with 6 pups in 3 different locations
â€¢ Explore and dive into the sea with the pups in Adventure Bay
â€¢ Avoid obstacles, collect pup treats, and unlock fun tricks
â€¢ Develop counting and shape recognition skills
â€¢ Earn special badges

Build Pre-K Math Skills:
The PAW Patrol Air and Sea Adventures app helps prepare preschoolers for kindergarten by fostering important early math skills for 3 â€“ 7 year olds. Kids will be exposed to concepts including:
â€¢ Shape recognition
â€¢ Number recognition 
â€¢ Counting and enumeration

Game Features:
â€¢ Play with characters from the TV show, PAW Patrol: Chase, Marshall, Skye, Rocky, Rubble, & Zuma!
â€¢ Control the pups with easy swipe and finger-trace gestures!
â€¢ Over 30 levels to explore!
â€¢ Difficulty increases with each level!
â€¢ Complete mini-games, unlock special moves and make the pups do amazing tricks!
â€¢ Earn badges for completing a mission, collecting pup treats, and unlocking new moves!

PAW Patrol Air and Sea Adventures collects personal user data as well as non-personal user data (including aggregated data). User data collection is in accordance with applicable law, such as COPPA. User data may be used, for example, to respond to user requests; enable users to take advantage of certain features and services; personalize content and advertising; and manage and improve Nickelodeon's services. For more information regarding Nickelodeonâ€™s use of personal user data, please visit the Nickelodeon Group Privacy Policy below. Our Privacy Policy is in addition to any terms, conditions or policies agreed to between you and Google, Inc., and Nickelodeon and its affiliated entities are not responsible for Google's collection or use of your personal user data and information. Additionally, this App may use â€œlocal notifications.â€ Local notifications are sent directly from the App to your device (you donâ€™t need to be connected to the Internet) and may be used to notify you of new content or events within your App, among other reasons. Use of this app is subject to the Nickelodeon End User License Agreement.

PAW Patrol Air and Sea Adventures offers in-app purchases and charges real money for additional in-app content. You may lock out the ability to purchase in-app content by adjusting your deviceâ€™s settings.

For users residing in the EU, PAW Patrol Air and Sea Adventures may include the use of persistent identifiers for game management purposes and installation of this app constitutes your permission to such usage of persistent identifiers for all users on your device.

â€¢ Sesame Workshopâ€™s mission is to use the educational power of media to help children everywhere grow smarter, stronger, and kinder. â€¢ ë‹¹ì‹ ì˜ ì…ë ¥ì€ ìš°ë¦¬ì—ê²Œ ë§¤ìš° ì¤‘ìš”í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. sesameworkshopapps@sesame.org : ë‹¹ì‹ ì€ ì§ˆë¬¸, ì˜ê²¬ì´ ìˆê±°ë‚˜ ë„ì›€ì´ í•„ìš”í•˜ë©´ ì—°ë½ ì£¼ì‹œê¸° ë°”ëë‹ˆë‹¤.

Fun and educational games for toddlers and kids. Ages 18 months and up! Great for preschool and kindergarten aged kids

20 games in one! Colorful graphics, animal sound effects, helpful voice narrating, and lots of fun! Have your kids learn counting, shapes, colors, and the alphabet while being entertained! Perfect for preschool and kindergarten ages.

Includes two games games for free. Unlock all 20 through a simple in-app purchase:
Fun Games: 
- Tap Farm: Fun animal sounds and animations at the farm, including cows, dogs, pigs, cat, and more
- Tap Zoo: More animal sounds and animations at the zoo, including elephants, bears, lions, monkeys, and more
- Tap Ocean: Interact with playful and interesting ocean life, make them swim, play, do flips, or more!
- Shapes and Colors: Learn shapes and colors with helpful voice narration, a requirement for kindergarden
- Alphabet Bounce: Teach your kids the alphabet with colorful bouncing balls, the first step towards reading
- Farm Puzzles: Drag and drop animals to construct fun farm puzzles 
- Two Step Directions: Help your toddler learn to listen better and follow multi-step directions
- Categories: Learn to group similar objects into categories, an important kindergarden skill
- Balloon Burst: Great for hand eye coordination and keeping kids entertained
- Animal Find: Help kids identify animals and their sounds
- Counting Jumble: Help with counting to 10, important for preschool and kindergarten
- What's Missing: Help your toddler pay attention and notice things that are missing
- Animal Memory: Improve memory in this matching game for children
- Number Order: Go beyond counting by learning what comes before and after each number
- Fruit Slingshot: Just plain fun for toddlers and kids
- Shadow Matching: Improve your child's critical thinking by identifying a shadow and outline
- Toy Box Numbers: Helps kids learn numbers and counting while putting toys away
- Butterfly Catch: Have fun catching colorful butterflies while improving color recognition
- Color and Size Sorting: Children follow directions and identify different sizes and colors
- Alphabet and Number Bingo: Helpful voices call out numbers and letters to identify, important math and reading skills!

Advanced Features in the Full Version Include:
- Detailed Progress Reports to help track your child's development
- Lesson Builder to create specific plans for your toddler to follow and play
- Multiple User support so up to 6 kids can play on the same app
- Avatars, stickers, and backgrounds for your toddler to unlock as they learn

Perfect for kids, children, and toddlers who need a fun and entertaining educational game to play. Great for kids entering preschool or kindergarten!

If you're having any trouble with our games, please email us at help@rosimosi.com and we'll get back to you ASAP.

And if you and your preschool kids love the games then be sure to leave us a review, it really helps us out!

ìš°ë¦¬ ê²Œì„ì— ë¬¸ì œê°€ ìˆìœ¼ë©´ help@rosimosi.comìœ¼ë¡œ ì´ë©”ì¼ì„ ë³´ë‚´ì£¼ì‹­ì‹œì˜¤. ìµœëŒ€í•œ ë¹¨ë¦¬ ì—°ë½ ë“œë¦¬ê² ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

ë„ˆì™€ ë„ˆì˜ ì·¨í•™ ì „ ì•„ì´ê°€ ê²Œì„ì„ ì¢‹ì•„í•œë‹¤ë©´, ìš°ë¦¬ì—ê²Œ ë¦¬ë·°ë¥¼ ë‚¨ê²¨ì£¼ì„¸ìš”. ì •ë§ ë„ì›€ì´ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤!

18 fun games to help your child learn First Grade lessons! Teach 1st grade lessons like reading, spelling, math, fractions, STEM, science, compound words, contractions, geography, dinosaurs, fossils, animals, and more! Whether they are just starting first grade, or need to review and master the subjects, this is a perfect learning tool for your kids aged 6-8. Math, language, science, STEM, and critical thinking skills are all tested and practiced in these games.

All 18 games are designed using real 1st Grade curriculums and use core curriculum state standards, so you can be sure these games will help give your child a boost in the classroom. Plus your student or child will stay entertained with help voice narration, colorful images and animations, and lots of fun sounds and music. Improve your child's homework with these teacher approved lessons, including science, STEM, language, and math.

Includes 2 games provided for free, unlock all 18 through a simple in-app purchase. 

Games: 
â€¢ Patterns - Learn to identify repeating patterns, a critical skill for first grade
â€¢ Ordering - Place objects in order based on size, numbers, and letters
â€¢ Word Bingo - Help your first grader with reading and spelling skills in a fun bingo game
â€¢ Compound Words - Combine words to build compound words, important for 1st Grade!
â€¢ Advanced Counting - Skip count by 2's, 3's, 4's, 5's, 10's and more
â€¢ Add, Subtract, and Advanced Math - Help learn advanced math skills like additional and subtraction with fun falling fruit
â€¢ Contractions - Teach your 1st Grader how to combine words to make contractions
â€¢ Spelling - Learn how to spell hundreds of words with helpful voice assistance
â€¢ Fractions - Fun way to learn the visual representation of fractions
â€¢ Verbs, Nouns, Adjectives - Your child will learn different types of words like verbs, nouns, and adjectives
â€¢ Sight Words - Learn how to spell and recognize important 1st grade sight words
â€¢ Compare Numbers - Advanced math topic that compares numbers to see what is greater or less than
â€¢ 5 Senses - Learn the 5 senses, how they help us understand the world, and which body part each uses
â€¢ Geography - Identify the oceans, continents, and various types of landforms
â€¢ Animals - Classify and learn about a variety of animals, such as mammals, reptiles, birds, fish, and more
â€¢ Body Parts - Learn and identify all the body parts on the human body, and learn how diagrams work
â€¢ Photosynthesis - Help the plant conduct photosynthesis and learn about the process vital for all plant life
â€¢ Dinosaurs and Fossils - Identify different dinosaurs and learn about how we can learn about dinosaurs from fossils

Perfect for 1st grade children, kids, and students who need a fun and entertaining educational game to play. This bundle of games lets them learn important math, fraction, problem solving, sight word, spelling, science and language skills while having fun! First Grade teachers around the country use this app in their classroom to help reinforce math, language, and STEM subjects. Keep your first grade age child entertained while they are learning!

Ages: 6, 7, and 8 year old children and students.

=====================================

PROBLEMS WITH THE GAME? 
If you are having issues with the sound stopping, or any other problems with the game, please email us at help@rosimosi.com and we will get it fixed for you ASAP.

LEAVE US A REVIEW!
If you're enjoying the game then we'd love for you to leave us a review! Reviews help small developers like us keep improving this game.

Transform screen time into a fun learning experience with Mother Goose Club!

We've developed a great app using song, rhyme, play and dance, to bring preschool to the world. From babies to young children this is the ideal first app, with:

â€¢ Exclusive books, games and activities promoting early literacy, math and much more!
â€¢ Learn with exclusive interactive books and games.
â€¢ 100s of nursery rhymes, songs and animations children will adore.
- Prepare for bedtime for stories and rhymes
â€¢ Live action videos with real kids being kids, encouraging movement as well as quiet time. 
â€¢ Make your own video playlists and save your favorites.
â€¢ Animated videos with fresh takes on classic nursery rhymes.
â€¢ Always age appropriate and safe.
â€¢ View everything offline in a safe, ad-free environment.

Children will love learning while singing and dancing along to their favorite Mother Goose Club songs and videos.

Try ALL our content with our free trial!

Mother Goose Club Rhymes (mobile app) is certified by the kidSAFE Seal Program. To learn more go to www.kidsafeseal.com.

This is a subscription service which gives complete access to all our activities, books, lessons, songs and videos with exclusive new content every month:
- Choose to subscribe on a monthly or annual basis.
- You can cancel your subscription anytime, no hassles or fees.
- Payment will be charged at confirmation of purchase.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- Subscriptions are managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.

Read our privacy policy and terms of use here:

TutoPLAY is an all-in-one app pack of the most wanted TutoTOONS kids games.

We hand-selected and added the best TutoTOONS games for girls and boys to one app. Full premium game versions inside with new games added regularly. Enjoy dozens of kids' favorite games in one app! Just tap and play!

TutoPLAY Subscription
Play ALL the games for unlimited time! Choose from our subscription plans (monthly, yearly or forever) to unlock more levels and remove ads!
TutoPLAY subscription is a one-time purchase that you can cancel any time, fast and easy. No hidden fees, full game versions only, no other in-app purchases after you subscribe. Subscribers will also get all upcoming TutoPLAY content at no extra charge!

TutoPLAY games for girls and boys, preschool and older kids:
1) Jungle Animal Hair Salon
2) Pony Girls Horse Care Resort
3) Power Girls Super City
4) Rock Star Animal Hair Salon
5) Baby Tiger Care
6) Amy's Animal Hair Salon
7) Kiki & Fifi Pet Hotel
8) Space Animal Hair Salon
9) Jungle Animal Hair Salon 2
10) Sweet Baby Girl Summer Fun 2
11) Miss Preschool Math World
12) Sweet Baby Girl Daycare 5
14) Princess Gloria Horse Club
15) Sweet Baby Girl Pop Stars
16) Kitty Meow Meow - My Cute Cat
17) Baby Animal Hair Salon 2
20) Crazy Twins Baby House
21) Sweet Baby Girl Cat Shelter
and more cute games for kids!

Helping Kids Learn with Games They Love
TutoTOONS games help children explore the world while playing what they like the most:
- Dress-ups are great to learn colors and clothes but they also develop kidsâ€™ art skills and self-expression.
- Cooking games show how to use kitchen tools or help parents at home.
- Cleanup games turn kidsâ€™ daily chores into super fun play and build good habits like keeping things tidy and organizing your toys.
- Pet and baby care games foster kidsâ€™ kindness, caring and sharing skills.
- Creativity, kindness, care and love â€“ these are just a few of the personal skills that kids can build playing TutoTOONS games!

Kids Safety Comes First
TutoPLAY is a safe, secure and kid-friendly environment for kids to play in:
- No ads (after you subscribe)
- No in-app purchases
- No violence or inappropriate content
- Hand-selected and premium games only, crafted and play-tested with kids

About TutoTOONS Games for Kids
Crafted and play-tested with kids and toddlers, TutoTOONS games foster kidsâ€™ creativity and help them learn while playing the games they love. Fun and educational TutoTOONS games strive to bring meaningful and safe mobile experience to millions of children worldwide.

Important Message to Parents
This app is free to download and play, but there are certain in-game items that may be purchased for real money. By downloading this app you agree to TutoTOONS Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Every syllable must have a talking vowel, but sometimes it can be hard to determine what sound the vowel will make. Identifying the syllable type can give you clues about the vowel sound which can help you decode the word. This app will provide supplemental support for students learning about syllabication.

VoCaBiTâ€™s English as a second language (ESL App) for Xhosa speakers does not require phone or internet services after the initial install. Approximately 5,000 basic English vocabulary words/phrases are gamified to provide an engaging experience for students beginning at grade level 3 and continuing through graduate school level. Also, for professionals wanting to stay current with terminology in their particular fields of endeavor, VocaBiT APP can be a very useful tool. Advanced users have unlimited access to the Personal Library to load specific repositories of terminology for personal use or for publishing to other users of VocaBiT APP. English definitions/phrases are intended to provide reference points and context. Therefore, the definitions of words/phrases may be approximate as opposed to pure translations. The objective of the VoCaBiT APP is not to teach language, but rather to provide opportunities for continuous reinforcement of vocabulary skills through the engagement of rigorous, fun-based activities. In addition to Xhosa, VocaBiT is available in the following languages:

Proficiency in vocabulary is fundamental to proficiency in all subjects. Scholastic disciplines are built on an understanding of the meanings of words. Furthermore, command of vocabulary supports academic success. In the classroom, for example, whether a student is a native English speaker, or one for whom English is a second language (ESL}, VoCaBiT APP can be a useful tool for reinforcing vocabulary in any subject. Furthermore, the app can be tailored to accommodate studentsâ€™ particular needs. Also, for professionals needing to stay current with terminology in their fields of endeavor, VoCaBiT APP offers a path for study and reinforcement. VoCaBiT is available to the following language speakers:
===
Xhosa translation:
IsiNgesi VoCaBiT njengoko njengolwimi lwesibini (ESL) App for abathetha isiXhosa ayifuni iinkonzo yefowuni okanye internet emva kokuqala ukufaka. Malunga nama-5,000 amagama basic IsiNgesi Isigama / esiwasebenzisayo gamified ukuba zinike amava umgeni Abafundi ekuqaleni kwinqanaba grade 3 Ukuqhubeka ngokusebenzisa kwinqanaba onesidanga lesikolo. Kwakhona, ngokuba Iingcali abafuna ukuhlala zangoku isigama kwiinkalo zabo kwiinzame, VocaBiT APP kunokuba sisixhobo esiluncedo kakhulu. Abasebenzisi ababhekisa phambili yokuya kwi Library Personal ukuba ukulayisha koovimba ezithile lwesigama oyisebenzisela wena buqu okanye ngokupapasha kwabanye abasebenzisi VocaBiT APP. Iinkcazelo zesiNgesi / ibinzana zenzelwe ukubonelela ngeenkcukacha kunye nomxholo. Ngoko ke, iinkcazo zamagama / amabinzana zingalinganiswa ngokuchasene neenguqulelo ezicocekileyo. Ugqaliselo VoCaBiT APP ayenziwanga ukufundisa ulwimi, kodwa kunokuba ukubonelela Amathuba Ukuqinisa eqhubekekayo Isigama izakhono ngokusebenzisa Engagement imisebenzi enzima, fun-based. Ukongeza kwesiXhosa, iVocaBiT iyafumaneka ngeelwimi ezilandelayo:

Ubungcali kwisigama siyisiseko ekufundiseni kuzo zonke izifundo. Izikhokelo ze-Scholastic zakhiwe ekuqondeni kweentsingiselo zamagama. Kwakhona, umyalelo wesigama uxhasa impumelelo yezemfundo. Eklasini, umzekelo, kukuba ingaba umfundi isithethi Native IsiNgesi, okanye elinye bani IsiNgesi lulwimi lwesibini (ESL, VoCaBiT APP kunokuba sisixhobo esiluncedo zokomeleza Vocabulary kuso nasiphi na isifundo. Ngapha koko, le app kungenziwa Yenzelwe . VoCaBiT APP ukulungiselela iimfuno wabaFundi ethile Kwakhona, ngokuba Iingcali abafuna ukuhlala zangoku isigama kwiinkalo zabo ayenzayo, inikeza indlela lokufundisisa unyanzeliso VoCaBiT ifumaneka izithethi zeelwimi ilandelayo.:

Arabic, Bengali, Chinese_zh-CHS, Chinese_zh-CHT, Czech, French, German, Haitian,Creole, Hindi, Igbo, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Khmer, Korean, Kurdish,Malay, Nepali, Pashto, Persian, Portuguese, Punjabi, Russian, Somali, Spanish, Swahili, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu

Ubungcali kwisigama siyisiseko ekufundiseni kuzo zonke ì´ë¯¸ì§€ê°€ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. Izikhokelo ze-Scholastic zakhiwe ekuqondeni kweentsingiselo zamagama. VoCaBiT APP ukulungiselela iimfuno wabaFundi ethile Kwakhona, ngokuba Iingcali ì•„í”„ê°€ë‹ˆìŠ¤íƒ„ ì§€ì—­ ì‚¬íšŒ ì§€ì—­ ì‚¬íšŒ ë´‰ì‚¬ í™œë™ì€ ë‹¤ìŒê³¼ ê°™ì´ êµ¬ì„±ë©ë‹ˆë‹¤ :

ì•„ëì–´, ë²µê³¨ì–´, ì¤‘êµ­ì–´ (ë²ˆì²´), ì¤‘êµ­ì–´ (ë²ˆì²´), ì¤‘êµ­ì–´ (ë²ˆì²´), ì²´ì½” ì–´, í”„ë‘ìŠ¤ì–´, ë…ì¼ì–´, ì•„ì´í‹° ì–´, í¬ë¦¬ì˜¬ ì–´, íŒë””ì–´, ì´ë³´ ì–´, ì´íƒœë¦¬ì–´, ì¼ë³¸ì–´, ìë°”ì–´, í¬ë©”ë¥´ì–´, ì¿ ë¥´ë“œì–´, ë§ë ˆì´ì–´, ë„¤íŒ”ì–´, íŒŒìŠˆí† ì–´, í˜ë¥´ì‹œì•„ì–´, ëŸ¬ì‹œì•„ì–´, ì†Œë§ë¦¬ì•„ ì–´, ìŠ¤í˜ì¸ì–´, ìŠ¤ì™€íë¦¬ì–´, íƒœêµ­ì–´, í„°í‚¤ì–´, ìš°í¬ë¼ì´ë‚˜ì–´, ìš°ë¥´ë‘ì–´, ë² íŠ¸ë‚¨ì–´, ì½”ì‚¬ì¸, ìš” ë£¨ë°” ì–´, ì¤„ ë£¨ì–´

VoCaBiTâ€™s English as a second language (ESL App) for Russian speakers does not require phone or internet services after the initial install. Approximately 5,000 basic English vocabulary words/phrases are gamified to provide an engaging experience for students beginning at grade level 3 and continuing through graduate school level. Also, for professionals wanting to stay current with terminology in their particular fields of endeavor, VocaBiT APP can be a very useful tool. Advanced users have unlimited access to the Personal Library to load specific repositories of terminology for personal use or for publishing to other users of VocaBiT APP. English definitions/phrases are intended to provide reference points and context. Therefore, the definitions of words/phrases may be approximate as opposed to pure translations. The objective of the VoCaBiT APP is not to teach language, but rather to provide opportunities for continuous reinforcement of vocabulary skills through the engagement of rigorous, fun-based activities. 

Proficiency in vocabulary is fundamental to proficiency in all subjects. Scholastic disciplines are built on an understanding of the meanings of words. Furthermore, command of vocabulary supports academic success. In the classroom, for example, whether a student is a native English speaker, or one for whom English is a second language (ESL}, VoCaBiT APP can be a useful tool for reinforcing vocabulary in any subject. Furthermore, the app can be tailored to accommodate studentsâ€™ particular needs. Also, for professionals needing to stay current with terminology in their fields of endeavor, VoCaBiT APP offers a path for study and reinforcement. VoCaBiT is available to the following language speakers:

===
Russian translation:
ĞĞ½Ğ³Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¸Ğ¹ ĞºĞ°Ğº Ğ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ¹ ÑĞ·Ñ‹Ğº VoCaBiT (Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ ESL) Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ñ€ÑƒÑÑĞºĞ¾ÑĞ·Ñ‹Ñ‡Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ½Ğµ Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµĞ±ÑƒĞµÑ‚ Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ĞµÑ„Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ½ĞµÑ‚-ÑƒÑĞ»ÑƒĞ³ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑĞ»Ğµ Ğ¿ĞµÑ€Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡Ğ°Ğ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ ÑƒÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ²ĞºĞ¸. ĞšÑ€Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾, Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ„ĞµÑÑĞ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ², Ğ¶ĞµĞ»Ğ°ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ² ĞºÑƒÑ€ÑĞµ Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ² ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ»Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑÑ… Ğ´ĞµÑÑ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸, Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ VocaBiT Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞ½ÑŒ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ĞµĞ·Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼ Ğ¸Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼. ĞĞ¿Ñ‹Ñ‚Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑÑ‚ Ğ½ĞµĞ¾Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿ Ğº Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞµĞºĞµ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ³Ñ€ÑƒĞ·ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ñ…Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‰ Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑĞ¼ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ VocaBiT. ĞĞ½Ğ³Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¸Ğµ Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ / Ñ„Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñ‹ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´Ğ½Ğ°Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡ĞµĞ½Ñ‹ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¾Ğ±ĞµÑĞ¿ĞµÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ¸ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµĞºÑÑ‚Ğ°. Ğ¦ĞµĞ»ÑŒ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ VoCaBiT ÑĞ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ‚ Ğ½Ğµ Ğ² Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ°Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ÑŒ ÑĞ·Ñ‹Ğº, Ğ° Ğ² Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ°Ğ²Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ·Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¾ÑĞ½Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑĞ¾Ğ²ĞµÑ€ÑˆĞµĞ½ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ ÑĞ»Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¿Ğ°ÑĞ° Ğ¿Ğ¾ÑÑ€ĞµĞ´ÑÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²ĞµĞ´ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ ÑÑ‚Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸Ñ…, ÑƒĞ²Ğ»ĞµĞºĞ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ·Ğ°Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ğ¸Ğ¹.

Ğ—Ğ½Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğµ ÑĞ»Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¿Ğ°ÑĞ° Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµĞµÑ‚ Ğ¾ÑĞ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ¾Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ°Ğ³Ğ°ÑÑ‰ĞµĞµ Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ²Ğ»Ğ°Ğ´ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ²ÑĞµĞ¼Ğ¸ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ğ°Ğ¼Ğ¸. ĞĞ°Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑ€, Ğ² ĞºĞ»Ğ°ÑÑĞµ, ÑĞ²Ğ»ÑĞµÑ‚ÑÑ Ğ»Ğ¸ ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚ Ğ½Ğ¾ÑĞ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ¼ Ğ°Ğ½Ğ³Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑĞ·Ñ‹ĞºĞ° Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ ĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ°Ğ½Ğ³Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¸Ğ¹ ÑĞ²Ğ»ÑĞµÑ‚ÑÑ Ğ²Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ¼ ÑĞ·Ñ‹ĞºĞ¾Ğ¼ (ESL), Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ VoCaBiT Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ĞµĞ·Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼ Ğ¸Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ ÑƒÑĞ¸Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ ÑĞ»Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ€Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ¿Ğ°ÑĞ° Ğ¿Ğ¾ Ğ»ÑĞ±Ğ¾Ğ¼Ñƒ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´Ğ¼ĞµÑ‚Ñƒ. ĞšÑ€Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾, Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ ÑƒĞ´Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ»ĞµÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¾ÑĞ¾Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµĞ±Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ĞµĞ¹ ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ² ĞšÑ€Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾, Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ„ĞµÑÑĞ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ², ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ¼ Ğ½ĞµĞ¾Ğ±Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾ Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ² ĞºÑƒÑ€ÑĞµ Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ² ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ»Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑÑ… Ğ´ĞµÑÑ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸, Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ VoCaBiT Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´Ğ»Ğ°Ğ³Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¿ÑƒÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¸Ğ·ÑƒÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¸ ÑƒĞºÑ€ĞµĞ¿Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ VoCaBiT Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿ĞµĞ½ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ ÑĞ»ĞµĞ´ÑƒÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ½Ğ¾ÑĞ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ¹ ÑĞ·Ñ‹ĞºĞ°:

ì˜ì–´ ì‹¤ë ¥ í–¥ìƒì„ìœ„í•œ ì˜ì–´ ì‹¤ë ¥ í–¥ìƒ (ì˜ì–´ ì‹¤ë ¥ í–¥ìƒ í”„ë¡œê·¸ë¨)ì€ ì˜ì–´ ì‹¤ë ¥ í–¥ìƒì„ìœ„í•œ ì˜ì–´ ì‹¤ë ¥ í–¥ìƒì„ ìœ„í•´ ë…¸ë ¥í•˜ê³  ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. 5000 ĞŸÑ€Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ·Ğ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ Ğ¾ÑĞ½Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… ÑĞ»Ğ¾Ğ² / Ñ„Ñ€Ğ°Ğ· Ğ°Ğ½Ğ³Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ ÑĞ·Ñ‹ĞºĞ° Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñ‹Ğ³Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ²Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑÑ, Ñ‡Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ±Ñ‹ Ğ¾Ğ±ĞµÑĞ¿ĞµÑ‡Ğ¸Ñ‚ÑŒ ÑƒĞ²Ğ»ĞµĞºĞ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ‹Ñ‚ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ ÑƒÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸ĞºĞ¾Ğ², Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ°Ñ Ñ 3 Ğ³Ğ¾ ĞºĞ»Ğ°ÑÑĞ° Ğ¸ Ğ·Ğ°ĞºĞ°Ğ½Ñ‡Ğ¸Ğ²Ğ°Ñ Ğ°ÑĞ¿Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ñ‚ÑƒÑ€Ğ¾Ğ¹. ĞšÑ€Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾, Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ„ĞµÑÑĞ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ², Ğ¶ĞµĞ»Ğ°ÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ² ĞºÑƒÑ€ÑĞµ Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ² ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ»Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑÑ… Ğ´ĞµÑÑ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸, Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ VocaBiT Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ¾Ñ‡ĞµĞ½ÑŒ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ĞµĞ·Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¼ Ğ¸Ğ½ÑÑ‚Ñ€ÑƒĞ¼ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ¼. ĞĞ¿Ñ‹Ñ‚Ğ½Ñ‹Ğµ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»Ğ¸ Ğ¸Ğ¼ĞµÑÑ‚ Ğ½ĞµĞ¾Ğ³Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ğ¹ Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿ Ğº Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ¹ Ğ±Ğ¸Ğ±Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¾Ñ‚ĞµĞºĞµ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ·Ğ°Ğ³Ñ€ÑƒĞ·ĞºĞ¸ Ğ¾Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ½Ğ½Ñ‹Ñ… Ñ…Ñ€Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‰ Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ»Ğ¸Ñ‡Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾ Ğ¸ÑĞ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¸ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¿ÑƒĞ±Ğ»Ğ¸ĞºĞ°Ñ†Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ´Ñ€ÑƒĞ³Ğ¸Ğ¼ Ğ¿Ğ¾Ğ»ÑŒĞ·Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ÑĞ¼ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ VocaBiT. ĞĞ½Ğ³Ğ»Ğ¸Ğ¹ÑĞºĞ¸Ğµ Ğ¾Ğ¿ĞµÑ‚ĞµĞ´ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ / Ñ„Ñ€Ğ°Ğ·Ñ‹ Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´Ğ½Ğ°Ğ·Ğ½Ğ°Ñ‡ĞµĞ½Ñ‹ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¾Ğ±ĞµÑĞ¿ĞµÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¾Ñ€Ğ¸ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ² Ğ¸ ĞºĞ¾Ğ½Ñ‚ĞµĞºÑÑ‚Ğ°. ĞšÑ€Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾, Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ Ğ¼Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµÑ‚ Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ°Ğ´Ğ°Ğ¿Ñ‚Ğ¸Ñ€Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ°Ğ½Ğ¾ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ ÑƒĞ´Ğ¾Ğ²Ğ»ĞµÑ‚Ğ²Ğ¾Ñ€ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¾ÑĞ¾Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ… Ğ¿Ğ¾Ñ‚Ñ€ĞµĞ±Ğ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ĞµĞ¹ ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ´ĞµĞ½Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ² ĞšÑ€Ğ¾Ğ¼Ğµ Ñ‚Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¾, Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¾Ñ„ĞµÑÑĞ¸Ğ¾Ğ½Ğ°Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ², ĞºĞ¾Ñ‚Ğ¾Ñ€Ñ‹Ğ¼ Ğ½ĞµĞ¾Ğ±Ñ…Ğ¾Ğ´Ğ¸Ğ¼Ğ¾ Ğ±Ñ‹Ñ‚ÑŒ Ğ² ĞºÑƒÑ€ÑĞµ Ñ‚ĞµÑ€Ğ¼Ğ¸Ğ½Ğ¾Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ³Ğ¸Ğ¸ Ğ² ÑĞ²Ğ¾Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ¾Ğ±Ğ»Ğ°ÑÑ‚ÑÑ… Ğ´ĞµÑÑ‚ĞµĞ»ÑŒĞ½Ğ¾ÑÑ‚Ğ¸, Ğ¿Ñ€Ğ¸Ğ»Ğ¾Ğ¶ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ğµ VoCaBiT Ğ¿Ñ€ĞµĞ´Ğ»Ğ°Ğ³Ğ°ĞµÑ‚ Ğ¿ÑƒÑ‚ÑŒ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ Ğ¸Ğ·ÑƒÑ‡ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ Ğ¸ ÑƒĞºÑ€ĞµĞ¿Ğ»ĞµĞ½Ğ¸Ñ VoCaBiT Ğ´Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑƒĞ¿ĞµĞ½ Ğ´Ğ»Ñ ÑĞ»ĞµĞ´ÑƒÑÑ‰Ğ¸Ñ… Ğ½Ğ¾ÑĞ¸Ñ‚ĞµĞ»ĞµĞ¹ ÑĞ·Ñ‹ĞºĞ° :

ì•„ëì–´, ë²µê³¨ì–´, ì¤‘êµ­ì–´ (ë²ˆì²´), ì¤‘êµ­ì–´ (ë²ˆì²´), ì¤‘êµ­ì–´ (ë²ˆì²´), ì²´ì½” ì–´, í”„ë‘ìŠ¤ì–´, ë…ì¼ì–´, ì•„ì´í‹° ì–´, í¬ë¦¬ì˜¬ ì–´, íŒë””ì–´, ì´ë³´ ì–´, ì´íƒœë¦¬ì–´, ì¼ë³¸ì–´, ìë°”ì–´, í¬ë©”ë¥´ì–´, ì¿ ë¥´ë“œì–´, ë§ë ˆì´ì–´, ë„¤íŒ”ì–´, íŒŒìŠˆí† ì–´, í˜ë¥´ì‹œì•„ì–´, ëŸ¬ì‹œì•„ì–´, ì†Œë§ë¦¬ì•„ ì–´, ìŠ¤í˜ì¸ì–´, ìŠ¤ì™€íë¦¬ì–´, íƒœêµ­ì–´, í„°í‚¤ì–´, ìš°í¬ë¼ì´ë‚˜ì–´, ìš°ë¥´ë‘ì–´, ë² íŠ¸ë‚¨ì–´, ì½”ì‚¬ì¸, ìš” ë£¨ë°” ì–´, ì¤„ ë£¨ì–´

VoCaBiTâ€™s English as a second language (ESL App) for Arabic speakers does not require phone or internet services after the initial install. Approximately 5,000 basic English vocabulary words/phrases are gamified to provide an engaging experience for students beginning at grade level 3 and continuing through graduate school level. Also, for professionals wanting to stay current with terminology in their particular fields of endeavor, VocaBiT APP can be a very useful tool. Advanced users have unlimited access to the Personal Library to load specific repositories of terminology for personal use or for publishing to other users of VocaBiT APP. English definitions/phrases are intended to provide reference points and context. Therefore, the definitions of words/phrases may be approximate as opposed to pure translations. The objective of the VoCaBiT APP is not to teach language, but rather to provide opportunities for continuous reinforcement of vocabulary skills through the engagement of rigorous, fun-based activities.
Proficiency in vocabulary is fundamental to proficiency in all subjects. Scholastic disciplines are built on an understanding of the meanings of words. Furthermore, command of vocabulary supports academic success. In the classroom, for example, whether a student is a native English speaker, or one for whom English is a second language (ESL}, VoCaBiT APP can be a useful tool for reinforcing vocabulary in any subject. Furthermore, the app can be tailored to accommodate studentsâ€™ particular needs. Also, for professionals needing to stay current with terminology in their fields of endeavor, VoCaBiT APP offers a path for study and reinforcement. 
In addition to Arabic, VoCaBiT is available, on Google Play, to the following language speakers:

VoCaBiTâ€™s English as a second language (ESL App) for Spanish speakers does not require phone or internet services after the initial install. Approximately 5,000 basic English vocabulary words/phrases are gamified to provide an engaging experience for students beginning at grade level 3 and continuing through graduate school level. Also, for professionals wanting to stay current with terminology in their particular fields of endeavor, VocaBiT APP can be a very useful tool. Advanced users have unlimited access to the Personal Library to load specific repositories of terminology for personal use or for publishing to other users of VocaBiT APP. English definitions/phrases are intended to provide reference points and context. Therefore, the definitions of words/phrases may be approximate as opposed to pure translations. The objective of the VoCaBiT APP is not to teach language, but rather to provide opportunities for continuous reinforcement of vocabulary skills through the engagement of rigorous, fun-based activities. In addition to Spanish , VocaBiT is available in the following languages:

Proficiency in vocabulary is fundamental to proficiency in all subjects. Scholastic disciplines are built on an understanding of the meanings of words. Furthermore, command of vocabulary supports academic success. In the classroom, for example, whether a student is a native English speaker, or one for whom English is a second language (ESL}, VoCaBiT APP can be a useful tool for reinforcing vocabulary in any subject. Furthermore, the app can be tailored to accommodate studentsâ€™ particular needs. Also, for professionals needing to stay current with terminology in their fields of endeavor, VoCaBiT APP offers a path for study and reinforcement. VoCaBiT is available to the following language speakers:

VoCaBiTâ€™s English as a second language (ESL App) for Italian speakers does not require phone or internet services after the initial install. Approximately 5,000 basic English vocabulary words/phrases are gamified to provide an engaging experience for students beginning at grade level 3 and continuing through graduate school level. Also, for professionals wanting to stay current with terminology in their particular fields of endeavor, VocaBiT APP can be a very useful tool. Advanced users have unlimited access to the Personal Library to load specific repositories of terminology for personal use or for publishing to other users of VocaBiT APP. English definitions/phrases are intended to provide reference points and context. Therefore, the definitions of words/phrases may be approximate as opposed to pure translations. The objective of the VoCaBiT APP is not to teach language, but rather to provide opportunities for continuous reinforcement of vocabulary skills through the engagement of rigorous, fun-based activities. In addition to Italian, VocaBiT is available in the following languages:

Proficiency in vocabulary is fundamental to proficiency in all subjects. Scholastic disciplines are built on an understanding of the meanings of words. Furthermore, command of vocabulary supports academic success. In the classroom, for example, whether a student is a native English speaker, or one for whom English is a second language (ESL}, VoCaBiT APP can be a useful tool for reinforcing vocabulary in any subject. Furthermore, the app can be tailored to accommodate studentsâ€™ particular needs. Also, for professionals needing to stay current with terminology in their fields of endeavor, VoCaBiT APP offers a path for study and reinforcement. VoCaBiT is available to the following language speakers:

Inoltre, l'applicazione puÃ² essere adattata . per soddisfare le esigenze specifiche degli studenti anche, per i professionisti che hanno bisogno di rimanere aggiornati con la terminologia nei loro campi di attivitÃ , VoCaBiT APP offre un percorso di studio e di rinforzo VoCaBiT Ã¨ disponibile nelle seguenti relatori lingua.:

ì´íƒˆë¦¬ì•„ì–´ ì‚¬ìš©ìë¥¼ìœ„í•œ VoCaBiTì˜ ì˜ì–´ (ESL App)ëŠ” ì´ˆê¸° ì„¤ì¹˜ í›„ì— ì „í™” ë˜ëŠ” ì¸í„°ë„· ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ê°€ í•„ìš”í•˜ì§€ ì•ŠìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ì•½ 5,000 ê°œì˜ ê¸°ë³¸ ì˜ì–´ ì–´íœ˜ / ë‹¨ì–´ê°€ 3 ë‹¨ê³„ì—ì„œ ì‹œì‘í•˜ì—¬ ëŒ€í•™ì› ìˆ˜ì¤€ì˜ í•™ìƒë“¤ì—ê²Œ ë§¤ë ¥ì ì¸ ê²½í—˜ì„ ì œê³µí•˜ê¸° ìœ„í•´ ê³„ë°œë©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ë˜í•œ VocaBiT APPëŠ” íŠ¹ì • ë¶„ì•¼ì—ì„œ ì „ë¬¸ ìš©ì–´ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ê³ ìí•˜ëŠ” ì „ë¬¸ê°€ì—ê²Œ ë§¤ìš° ìœ ìš©í•œ ë„êµ¬ê°€ ë  ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ê³ ê¸‰ ì‚¬ìš©ìëŠ” ê°œì¸ ì‚¬ìš©ì„ìœ„í•œ íŠ¹ì • ìš©ì–´ ì €ì¥ì†Œë¥¼ë¡œë“œí•˜ê±°ë‚˜ VocaBiT APPì˜ ë‹¤ë¥¸ ì‚¬ìš©ìì—ê²Œ ê²Œì‹œí•˜ê¸° ìœ„í•´ ê°œì¸ ë¼ì´ë¸ŒëŸ¬ë¦¬ì— ë¬´ì œí•œ ì•¡ì„¸ìŠ¤ í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ì˜ì–´ ì •ì˜ / ë¬¸êµ¬ëŠ” ì°¸ì¡° ì ê³¼ ë¬¸ë§¥ì„ ì œê³µí•˜ê¸°ìœ„í•œ ê²ƒì…ë‹ˆë‹¤. ë”°ë¼ì„œ ë‹¨ì–´ / êµ¬ë¬¸ì˜ ì •ì˜ëŠ” ìˆœìˆ˜í•œ ë²ˆì—­ê³¼ ë°˜ëŒ€ë˜ëŠ” ëŒ€ëµì ì¸ ê²ƒì¼ ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. VoCaBiT APPì˜ ëª©ì ì€ ì–¸ì–´ë¥¼ ê°€ë¥´ì¹˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì´ ì•„ë‹ˆë¼ ì—„ê²©í•˜ê³  ì¬ë¯¸ìˆëŠ” í™œë™ì„ í†µí•´ ì–´íœ˜ë ¥ì„ ì§€ì†ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ê°•í™”í•  ìˆ˜ìˆëŠ” ê¸°íšŒë¥¼ ì œê³µí•˜ëŠ” ê²ƒì…ë‹ˆë‹¤. ì´íƒˆë¦¬ì•„ì–´ ì™¸ì—ë„ VocaBiTëŠ” ë‹¤ìŒ ì–¸ì–´ë¡œ ì œê³µë©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

ì–´íœ˜ ëŠ¥ë ¥ì€ ëª¨ë“  ê³¼ëª©ì˜ ìˆ™ë‹¬ì—ìˆì–´ ê¸°ë³¸ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤. ìŠ¤ì½œë¼ ì² í•™ì€ ë‹¨ì–´ì˜ ì˜ë¯¸ë¥¼ ì´í•´í•˜ë„ë¡ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ì¡ŒìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ë˜í•œ ì–´íœ˜ë ¥ì€ í•™ë¬¸ì  ì„±ê³µì„ ì§€ì›í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ì˜ˆë¥¼ ë“¤ì–´, í•™ìƒì´ ì˜ì–´ë¥¼ ëª¨êµ­ì–´ë¡œ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ëŠ” ì‚¬ëŒì´ë“ , ì˜ì–´ê°€ ì œ 2 ì–¸ì–´ (ESL)ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ëŠ” ì‚¬ëŒì´ë“ , VoCaBiT APPëŠ” ëª¨ë“  ê³¼ëª©ì—ì„œ ì–´íœ˜ë¥¼ ê°•í™”í•  ìˆ˜ìˆëŠ” ìœ ìš©í•œ ë„êµ¬ê°€ ë  ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. VoCaBiT APPëŠ” í•™ìƒë“¤ì˜ íŠ¹ë³„í•œ í•„ìš”ë¥¼ ìˆ˜ìš©í•˜ê¸° ìœ„í•´ ë…¸ë ¥í•˜ê³  ìˆìœ¼ë©°, í˜„ì¬ ìì‹ ì˜ ë¶„ì•¼ì—ì„œ ì „ë¬¸ ìš©ì–´ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ê³ ìí•˜ëŠ” ì „ë¬¸ê°€ë¥¼ ìœ„í•´ VoCaBiT APPëŠ” í•™ìŠµ ë° ë³´ê°•ì„ìœ„í•œ ê²½ë¡œë¥¼ ì œê³µí•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

====
ì´íƒˆë¦¬ì•„ì–´ ë²ˆì—­ :
ì¸í„°ë„·ì„ í†µí•´ ë¬´ë£Œë¡œ ì œê³µë˜ëŠ” ì„œë¹„ìŠ¤ëŠ” ì¸í„°ë„·ì„ í†µí•´ ë¬´ë£Œë¡œ ì œê³µë©ë‹ˆë‹¤ (app ESL). 5.000 ë””ë² ì´ìŠ¤ ê°€ì„ë°©ì— ëŒ€í•œ ë³´ì»¬ ë³´ì»¬ ë¦¬ì…‰ì…˜ / í•™ìƒ ê¸°ìˆ™ì‚¬ ë‹¹ 3 ì¸ì˜ í•™ìƒë“¤ì€ ê°ê¸° ë‹¤ë¥¸ ìœ í•™ìƒë“¤ì—ê²Œ ê²Œì„ì„ ì œê³µí•˜ê³  3 ëª…ì˜ í•™ìƒë“¤ì€ ê³„ì†í•´ì„œ 3 ëª…ì˜ ë°°ìš°ìë¥¼ ì´ˆì²­í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ë˜í•œ, ì „ë¬¸ ì§ì—…ì¸ìœ¼ë¡œì„œì˜ ì „ë¬¸ ì§ì—…ì¸ì€ ì „ë¬¸ ì§ì—…ì¸ìœ¼ë¡œì„œì˜ ì „ë¬¸ ì§ì—…ì¸ìœ¼ë¡œì„œ, ì „ë¬¸ ì§ì—…ì¸ ë³´ì¡° í”„ë¡œê·¸ë¨ì€ ì „ë¬¸ì ì¸ ì§ì—…ì„ í•„ìš”ë¡œí•©ë‹ˆë‹¤. ê°œì¸ ì •ë³´ ë³´í˜¸ë¥¼ìœ„í•œ ê°œì¸ ì •ë³´ ë³´í˜¸ ì •ì±…ì€ ê°œì¸ ì •ë³´ ë³´í˜¸ ì •ì±…ì— ë”°ë¼ ê°œì¸ ì •ë³´ ë³´í˜¸ ì •ì±…ì— ë”°ë¼ ë‹¤ë¦…ë‹ˆë‹¤. ì •ì˜ ë° ì •ì±…ì— ëŒ€í•œ í¬ê´„ì  ì¸ ì •ì˜ê°€ í¬í•¨ë˜ì–´ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. íŒ”ë ˆìŠ¤í‹°ë…¸, ê°€ì„ë°© / ê°€ì„ë°©ì˜ ìˆœê²°í•œ ë¶„ì—´ê³¼ ìˆœìˆ˜í•œ ë¶„ëª…í•œ ë¶„ëª…í•œ ìˆœêµ. ì§‘ì¤‘í•˜ì§€ ëª»í•˜ëŠ” ì‚¬ëŒë“¤ì„ ëŒ€ìƒìœ¼ë¡œ í•œ ì§‘ì¤‘ êµìœ¡ì€ ì§‘ì¤‘ êµìœ¡ì„ ìœ„í•´ ì§‘ì¤‘ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ì‹œí–‰ë˜ì–´ ì™”ìœ¼ë©°, ì§€ì†ì ìœ¼ë¡œ ê²½ìŸì„ í¼ì¹˜ëŠ” ì‚¬ëŒë“¤ì€ ì§‘ì¤‘ì  ì¸ êµìœ¡ì„ í†µí•´ ì§‘ì¤‘ êµìœ¡ì— ì „ë…í–ˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. Oltre all'italiano, VocaBiT ì„¸ë¶€ ì •ë³´ ë§í¬ :

La Padronanza del VocabolarioëŠ” í…Œ ë„¤ë¦¬ í˜ì–´ë¡œ êµ¬ì„±ë˜ì–´ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ê°€ì¶•ì€ ê°€ì„ë°©ì˜ ì¤‘ìš”ì„±ì„ ì¸ì •í•˜ê³  ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ì„±ê³µ, ì„±ê³µ ë° ì„±ê³µì„ìœ„í•œ ë³´ì™„ì±…. í•™ìƒ, í•™ìƒ, í•™ìƒ ëª¨ë‘ì—ê²Œ ì˜ì–´ë¡œ ë§í•˜ê¸°, ë“£ê¸°, ë“£ê¸°, ë“£ê¸°, ì½ê¸°, ì“°ê¸°, ë“£ê¸°, ë“£ê¸°, ë“£ê¸°, ë“£ê¸°, ë“£ê¸°, ë“£ê¸°, ë“£ê¸°, ë“£ê¸°, ë“£ê¸°, ë“£ê¸°, ë“£ê¸° ë¶€ì‘ìš©ì— ëŒ€í•œ ì „ë¬¸ì˜ í•™ìƒì€ í•™ìƒì˜ ì „ë¬¸ì„±ì— ë”°ë¼ ë‹¬ë¼ì§€ê¸° ë•Œë¬¸ì— í•™ìƒì€ ì „ë¬¸ì˜ í•™ìƒì˜ ì±…ìƒ ì˜†ì— â€‹â€‹ë†“ê³  í•™ìƒì˜ ì±…ìƒ ì˜†ì—ìˆëŠ” í•™ìƒì˜ ì±…ìƒ ì˜†ì— â€‹â€‹ë†“ê³  ë³¼ ìˆ˜ ìˆìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.
ì²´ì½” ì–´, í”„ë‘ìŠ¤ì–´, ë…ì¼ì–´, íŒë””ì–´, ì´ë³´, ì´íƒˆë¦¬ì•„ì–´, í¬ë©”ë¥´ì–´, ì¿ ë¥´ë“œì–´, ë„¤íŒ”ì–´, í¬ë¥´íˆ¬ê°ˆì–´, í€ì ë¸Œì–´, ëŸ¬ì‹œì•„ì–´, ì†Œë§ë¦¬ì•„ ì–´, ìŠ¤í˜ì¸ì–´, í„°í‚¤ì–´, ìš°í¬ë¼ì´ë‚˜ì–´, ì½”ì‚¬ì¸, ìš” ë£¨ë°” ì–´, ì¤„ ë£¨ì–´

VoCaBiTâ€™s English as a second language (ESL App) for German speakers does not require phone or internet services after the initial install. Approximately 5,000 basic English vocabulary words/phrases are gamified to provide an engaging experience for students beginning at grade level 3 and continuing through graduate school level. For professionals wanting to stay current with terminology in their particular fields of endeavor, VocaBiT APP can be a very useful tool. Advanced users have unlimited access to the Personal Library to load specific repositories of terminology for personal use or for publishing to other users of VocaBiT APP. English definitions/phrases are intended to provide reference points and context. Therefore, the definitions of words/phrases may be approximate as opposed to pure translations. The objective of the VoCaBiT APP is not to teach language, but rather to provide opportunities for continuous reinforcement of vocabulary skills through the engagement of rigorous, fun-based activities. 

Proficiency in vocabulary is fundamental to proficiency in all subjects. Scholastic disciplines are built on an understanding of the meanings of words. Furthermore, command of vocabulary supports academic success. In the classroom, for example, whether a student is a native English speaker, or one for whom English is a second language (ESL}, VoCaBiT APP can be a useful tool for reinforcing vocabulary in any subject. Furthermore, the app can be tailored to accommodate studentsâ€™ particular needs. Also, for professionals needing to stay current with terminology in their fields of endeavor, VoCaBiT APP offers a path for study and reinforcement. VoCaBiT is available to the following language speakers:

ì•„ëì–´, ë²µê³¨ì–´, ì¤‘êµ­ì–´ (ë²ˆì²´), ì¤‘êµ­ì–´ (ë²ˆì²´), ì¤‘êµ­ì–´ (ë²ˆì²´), ì²´ì½” ì–´, í”„ë‘ìŠ¤ì–´, ë…ì¼ì–´, ì•„ì´í‹° ì–´, í¬ë¦¬ì˜¬ ì–´, íŒë””ì–´, ì´ë³´ ì–´, ì´íƒœë¦¬ì–´, ì¼ë³¸ì–´, ìë°”ì–´, í¬ë©”ë¥´ì–´, ì¿ ë¥´ë“œì–´, ë§ë ˆì´ì–´, ë„¤íŒ”ì–´, íŒŒìŠˆí† ì–´, í˜ë¥´ì‹œì•„ì–´, ëŸ¬ì‹œì•„ì–´, ì†Œë§ë¦¬ì•„ ì–´, ìŠ¤í˜ì¸ì–´, ìŠ¤ì™€íë¦¬ì–´, íƒœêµ­ì–´, í„°í‚¤ì–´, ìš°í¬ë¼ì´ë‚˜ì–´, ìš°ë¥´ë‘ì–´, ë² íŠ¸ë‚¨ì–´, ì½”ì‚¬ì¸, ìš” ë£¨ë°” ì–´, ì¤„ ë£¨ì–´

VoCaBiTâ€™s English as a second language (ESL App) for Simplified_Chinese speakers does not require phone or internet services after the initial install. Approximately 5,000 basic English vocabulary words/phrases are gamified to provide an engaging experience for students beginning at grade level 3 and continuing through graduate school level. Also, for professionals wanting to stay current with terminology in their particular fields of endeavor, VocaBiT APP can be a very useful tool. Advanced users have unlimited access to the Personal Library to load specific repositories of terminology for personal use or for publishing to other users of VocaBiT APP. English definitions/phrases are intended to provide reference points and context. Therefore, the definitions of words/phrases may be approximate as opposed to pure translations. The objective of the VoCaBiT APP is not to teach language, but rather to provide opportunities for continuous reinforcement of vocabulary skills through the engagement of rigorous, fun-based activities. 

Proficiency in vocabulary is fundamental to proficiency in all subjects. Scholastic disciplines are built on an understanding of the meanings of words. Furthermore, command of vocabulary supports academic success. In the classroom, for example, whether a student is a native English speaker, or one for whom English is a second language (ESL}, VoCaBiT APP can be a useful tool for reinforcing vocabulary in any subject. Furthermore, the app can be tailored to accommodate studentsâ€™ particular needs. Also, for professionals needing to stay current with terminology in their fields of endeavor, VoCaBiT APP offers a path for study and reinforcement. VoCaBiT is available to the following language speakers:
===

ì•„ëì–´, ë²µê³¨ì–´, ì¤‘êµ­ì–´ (ë²ˆì²´), ì¤‘êµ­ì–´ (ë²ˆì²´), ì¤‘êµ­ì–´ (ë²ˆì²´), ì²´ì½” ì–´, í”„ë‘ìŠ¤ì–´, ë…ì¼ì–´, ì•„ì´í‹° ì–´, í¬ë¦¬ì˜¬ ì–´, íŒë””ì–´, ì´ë³´ ì–´, ì´íƒœë¦¬ì–´, ì¼ë³¸ì–´, ìë°”ì–´, í¬ë©”ë¥´ì–´, ì¿ ë¥´ë“œì–´, ë§ë ˆì´ì–´, ë„¤íŒ”ì–´, íŒŒìŠˆí† ì–´, í˜ë¥´ì‹œì•„ì–´, ëŸ¬ì‹œì•„ì–´, ì†Œë§ë¦¬ì•„ ì–´, ìŠ¤í˜ì¸ì–´, ìŠ¤ì™€íë¦¬ì–´, íƒœêµ­ì–´, í„°í‚¤ì–´, ìš°í¬ë¼ì´ë‚˜ì–´, ìš°ë¥´ë‘ì–´, ë² íŠ¸ë‚¨ì–´, ì½”ì‚¬ì¸, ìš” ë£¨ë°” ì–´, ì¤„ ë£¨ì–´

VoCaBiTâ€™s English as a second language (ESL App) for Bengali speakers does not require phone or internet services after the initial install. Approximately 5,000 basic English vocabulary words/phrases are gamified to provide an engaging experience for students beginning at grade level 3 and continuing through graduate school level. Also, for professionals wanting to stay current with terminology in their particular fields of endeavor, VocaBiT APP can be a very useful tool. Advanced users have unlimited access to the Personal Library to load specific repositories of terminology for personal use or for publishing to other users of VocaBiT APP. English definitions/phrases are intended to provide reference points and context. Therefore, the definitions of words/phrases may be approximate as opposed to pure translations. The objective of the VoCaBiT APP is not to teach language, but rather to provide opportunities for continuous reinforcement of vocabulary skills through the engagement of rigorous, fun-based activities. In addition to Bengali, VocaBiT is available in the following languages:
Proficiency in vocabulary is fundamental to proficiency in all subjects. Scholastic disciplines are built on an understanding of the meanings of words. Furthermore, command of vocabulary supports academic success. In the classroom, for example, whether a student is a native English speaker, or one for whom English is a second language (ESL}, VoCaBiT APP can be a useful tool for reinforcing vocabulary in any subject. Furthermore, the app can be tailored to accommodate studentsâ€™ particular needs. Also, for professionals needing to stay current with terminology in their fields of endeavor, VoCaBiT APP offers a path for study and reinforcement. 
In addition to Bengali, VoCaBiT is available, on Google Play, to the following language speakers:
===

ğŸ“With preschool games for kids 5 years free, getting ready for school is easy and fun!

ğŸ­Factory. Press buttons on the control panel and operate different machinery! Bake delicious letter shaped cookies for your funny friends.

ğŸ¦Chameleon. Funny food is hiding in the grass and catching letters with its long sticky tongue. Help it catch the right letters.

ğŸIsland. Participate in a race on the tropical island. Find the hidden letters. Fill up your car and finish the race first.

ğŸ­Caramel rope. Turn the gadget from side to side, swing the yummy letter on the caramel rope and feed the jolly character.

With the basics in school education, you will learn the basics of Math, numbers, colors, shapes. You have to find 7 handbooks and solve on 3 different complicated tasks with the basics of math Teacher.

Let's run in the course after time, get Math Notebooks and solutions

How to play Scary Math Teacher - School And Education Game:
- Learn math basics and go through all his tests.
- Solving baldness: problems in notebooks.
- Find a way to escape the horror school, the basics are very important.

Scary Math Teacher - School And Education Game with the following features:
- Simple controls make it easy to play and solve puzzles
- You will experience a real horror in school
- Solve problems in laptops
- Find a way out of school.

Funny letter-shaped people help your child learn how to read and write. They handily transform boring study into a super-entertaining activity! 


Set off colorful fireworks, send the jolly ABCD characters on an elevator ride and launch a rocket into deep space! While playing with the fun characters, children themselves do not notice they are learning to read. ğŸ“š

Super Phonics uses its own unique phonics-based methodology. Children learn to recognize sound-spelling relationships and word families such as CAT, BAT, HAT, & FLAT. Over the course of the game, children see the repeating combinations of letters and remember the sounds that each produces. Every letter and sound in the game is the product of professional voice work, helping children to develop pronunciation. ğŸ¤—

No child will get bored with these charming little letters! They serve as guides to new and entertaining adventures in a variety of lively mini-games:

ğŸŒŸ Fireworks â€“ Launch bright fireworks into the sky by collecting letters in short words!
ğŸŒŸ The Elevator â€“ Help the letters find the right floor and set up a fun dance party!
ğŸŒŸ Rocket Ship â€“ Put together a team of brave letter astronauts so they can set out on a lively journey into space!

Going through the mini-games level by level, children recall how to read and write simple words. A well-developed system of hints allows even the youngest children to take the first steps in reading independently.

ğŸ’¥ The Super Phonics app for children includes: ğŸ’¥

ğŸ‘‰ A unique play-based methodology for learning to read
ğŸ‘‰ Spelling games for kids kindergarten
ğŸ‘‰ Super-entertaining mini-games for boys & girls free
ğŸ‘‰ A wide variety of difficulty levels
ğŸ‘‰ A colorful game interface
ğŸ‘‰ Memory and attention training
ğŸ‘‰ Development of fine motor skills
ğŸ‘‰ Parental controls
ğŸ‘‰ No third-party advertising

Download educational ABC learning games for kids from the Bini Bambini creative group. Play and learn to read with our free apps for toddlers! ğŸ™‚ğŸ“

Features:
- A cool & fun cooking game with TONS of UNICORN COTTON CANDY flavorsï¼
- Cook yummy cotton candy with tons of delicious toppings!

LOL Surprise Dolls Games Supermarket Shopping is a game designed for children. The game is a surprise encounter with Open the egg (egg) that has been provided. To open the egg, players only need to knock the eggs until the eggs were broken up.
GAME FEATURES

- Play for the client and the cashier in grocery store
- Shopping with your favorite dolls
- Learn to use money educational shopping game for children
- Understand all the process in the supermarket
- Many mini games
- Bonus game with surprise eggs
- Bright graphics and easy interface for kids
- Free shopping game for children



Cashier: scan products and items, make bill receipts, and collect all cash from customers; count money and give them change back as the cashier boss.
Grocery: help the doll's customer enjoy her shopping such as fruits and vegetables, bread and milk, candy and chocolate, juice and soda, soap and toothpaste and others.
Fruits and vegetables: choose fresh Fruits and vegetables: bananas, apples, strawberries, potatoes, tomatoes, carrots and many others. Enjoy juicy fruits in the fruit section of the supermarket.
Candies and sweets: in this game store you can choose and sort bright candies.
Scales: put the goods on the scales, get the price tag and attach it to the products.
Cleaning: you can also become a supermarket Manager! Wash floors, clean shelves and sort trash.

Bonus: and bonus game with surprise eggs! Unlock all the surprise eggs to gather a collection of new toys ksi meritos!
LOL Games - Grocery Store Supermarket and Surprise Egg is great fun for little ones who love to role play and love shopping at the Grocery store!


NEW!! Point, pop, unpack gather! Shake things up with the Lol surprise dolls , in this coordinating ball pop amusement .
Presently with every single new amazement including finding your doll's water surprise!
Include Glitter Series and Series 3 dolls to your accumulation.
Try not to stop now Keep flying to unpack and finish your doll gathering.
You're nearly there! Energized yet?

open all dolls from the first and second season and brag about your extensive collection!
you earn from these toys eggs would be stored and sorted in categories.
Simulator stores all your dolls, clothes, stickers and sprays in a special toys storage egg.
But that is not all, this simulator is free even from inside.
You do not have to pay for opening free doll lol toy eggs with surprise.
You have access to endless amount of miraculous eggs.

so this doll opening game is suitable for girls and boys of all ages! If you love
collect things or if you like lol dolls and everything about them but can't afford
them right now,
welcome to this virtual collection of surprise chibi dolls!

Join the favorite game of many players. Create your unforgettable happy moments together.

This amazing game in the style of craft, it collected all the best and remove all unnecessary.
Gather resources in an endless world of real-generation breed farm to eat and not starve to death, defend your territory from attacking zombies and vampires at night!

Show maximum imagination to build better huts on the beach!

- World generated in real time
- New beautiful textures and objects
- Many animals, zombies, vampires, predators.
- Stunning biomes, fully voxel map
- Day and night + weather (rain, snow, hurricanes)
- And much more!

in the CUBE game LocoCraft Crafting Exploration: Crafting Game Adventure there are 6 types of maps available that you can explore both single users and multi users of terrain biome. On this map at CUBE LocoCraft Crafting Exploration you will find many houses and everything looks very luxurious with a large swimming pool, and you can redesign it with a one-car garage, several entrances, two balconies, and more. The front has large windows, and the back has a place for you and your friends to throw a party! Let's sharpen your ability to create, this is where you will appear when you enter the map, and if you die while playing a game, so let's build a more beautiful city so that the city will be bigger and more interesting to explore, CUBE Loco Craft Crafting Exploration uses 16x16 textures with smooth and bright texture.

Crazy Loco Crafts:Exploration 3D. Creative and Survival in sandbox block world!

In this pixel style sandbox openworld block game. You can create whatever you want!
Turn blocks into building materials and create your dream house, or go explore the map and fight dangerous monsters and zombies. Craft, build and explore an amazing living world! 

Show maximum imagination to build better huts on the beach!

Features: 
- World generated in real time
- New beautiful textures and objects
- Many animals, zombies, vampires, predators.
- Stunning biomes, fully voxel map
- Day and night + weather (rain, snow, hurricanes)
- And much more!

BBasac Studio

See and play with your very own dinosaurs! This cool augmented reality app lets you see a world of dinos. With Dino Cam, your camera-enabled device reveals dinosaurs all around you. Whether you're at home, outside or in between, just aim the camera and lifelike dinos will appear in the world you see through your camera.

Weâ€™ve added 9 NEW dinos and updated ALL the dinos so they look, stomp, and roar better than ever. You get spiky tail-swinging Kentrosaurus for free and if you like his style, you can upgrade with 13 MORE dinos. 

Dino Dan Pack: Tyrannosaurus rex, Triceratops, Stegosuaurus, Therizinosaurus, Giganotosaurus, Plesiosaur (If youâ€™ve previously bought any of our â€˜oldâ€™ dinos, this pack is free.)

Dino Dana Pack: Spinosaurus, Euoplocephalus, Kosmoceratops, Brachiosaurus, Diplodocus, Albertosaurus, Psittacosaurus

Cool controls give you the power to make your dinos roar, flick their tails, snap their jaws and perform other actions.

You can also take and save pictures of your dinos or even email them to friends! Finally! Photographic evidence that dinos still walk (and fly) the earth.

*** We listened to your feedback and now Dino Cam can be used with or WITHOUT an AR marker. The app also switches seamlessly between these two modes for an easier and more enjoyable experience.

You can get the AR marker at DinoDan.com/marker

Dino Cam is brought to you by the makers of Dino Dan, Dino Dan: Trekâ€™s Adventures, and Dino Dana, the hit children's television series.


Whatâ€™s New

- Dino Cam now supports ARCore technology to seamlessy mix virtual dinosaurs into the world around you, as seen through your device. If your device supports ARCore you do not need the AR marker. 

- You no longer need a printed AR marker to see the dinosaurs. Just point and watch. (The app can still be used with printed AR markers for an even more dino-riffic experience, but a marker is no longer required to make the app function).

- ë” ì´ìƒ ê³µë£¡ì„ë³´ê¸° ìœ„í•´ ì¸ì‡„ ëœ ë§ˆì»¤ê°€ í•„ìš”í•˜ì§€ ì•ŠìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤. ê·¸ëƒ¥ ê°€ë¦¬í‚¤ê³  ì§€ì¼œë³´ì‹­ì‹œì˜¤. (ì•±ì€ ì¸ì‡„ ëœ AR ë§ˆì»¤ì™€ í•¨ê»˜ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì—¬ í›¨ì”¬ ë” ê¹Œë‹¤ë¡œìš´ ê²½í—˜ì„ í•  ìˆ˜ ìˆì§€ë§Œ ë§ˆì»¤ëŠ” ë” ì´ìƒ ì•± ê¸°ëŠ¥ì„ ìˆ˜í–‰í•˜ëŠ” ë° í•„ìš”í•˜ì§€ ì•ŠìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.)

The Arena app allows current Basecamp users to utilize our competitive games King of the Mountain and Climb, anytime and anywhere. Play the games in solo mode or challenge a classmate to a battle of wits. Collectively, the two game modes offer over 5,000 questions designed to assist students to commit critical core academic content to long-term memory. The questions are presented in five unique Mountains (i.e., Musculoskeletal, Neuromuscular, Cardiopulmonary, Other Systems, Non-Systems). The games add a competitive aspect to studying and fully engage students as they learn. See how you stack up to the competition! Students can explore their performance data using the Arena â€“ Scorecard and Leaderboard. Summative data collected in the Arena can be used to direct future remedial efforts. Lace up those hiking boots and let the games begin!

Company Information
Scorebuilders is a physical therapist owned company whose sole focus is to prepare students for the National Physical Therapy Examinations. We sell more review products and offer more review courses than any other company. Scorebuilders has experienced three decades of continuous growth and is the recognized leader in physical therapist and physical therapist assistant licensing preparation. Scorebuilders offers candidates the knowledge and insight necessary to achieve their educational goals.

Arena is the exclusive property of Scorebuilders. No part of this app may be reproduced or transmitted in any form, without the express written consent of Scorebuilders.

ê²½ê¸°ì¥ì€ Scorebuildersì˜ ë…ì  ì¬ì‚°ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤. ì´ ì•±ì˜ ì–´ë– í•œ ë¶€ë¶„ë„ Scorebuildersì˜ ì„œë©´ ë™ì˜ ì—†ì´ëŠ” ì–´ë– í•œ í˜•íƒœë¡œë„ ë³µì œí•˜ê±°ë‚˜ ì „ì†¡í•  ìˆ˜ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤.

Learn how to recognize, write, and transcribe the glyphs of the Kulitan script!

READ - Identify glyphs using flashcards that become more difficult to answer over time!

WRITE - Practice writing by tracing glyphs in the correct stroke order âœï¸

TRANSCRIBE - Can't read something? Transcribe it using the two-way transcriber with a custom-made Kulitan keyboard! âŒ¨ï¸

LEARN - Are you just curious about Kulitan? The information page provided contains glyph tables, the history of Kulitan, and writing guides ğŸ“–

------------
This app was developed in partial fulfillment of the requirements for Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, presented to the Institute of Computer Science, University of the Philippines Los BaÃ±os. The accompanying paper for this app was presented at the 2019 ICS Undergraduate Research Symposium. It can be viewed at https://bit.ly/LEARNKULITANPAPER

The information and data in this app was verified by SÃ­nÃºpan Singsing: Center for Kapampangan Cultural Heritage in Angeles City.

Introduce your preschool child to easily understand math by playing Baldino Class, the 1st grade cool math games.

Max Cube Craft Exploration and Building Games is an entire country consisting of several cities and tons of areas map to explore. This is definitely one of the big making maps, on the map you will be able to explore some cities, incredible airports, military bases consisting of airports and airplane bases. If you want to explore then you might find this city interesting as there are many things to explored. Its architecture is often found in modern cities today. There is a good contrast from modern and old buildings, and that is realistic too, because every modern city is a con stant development project. Even when you think you've seen everything there are still areas that you might not have found. and commercial areas with skyscrapers, office complexes and hotels, and large rivers dividing cities in two regions. On the river you will find submarines and several other large ships. Further from the seeds there is a large suburban environment. in Max CubeCraft Exploration and Building Games, a houses look identical and most likely this map was actually made. This is a realistic city with many different areas to explore.
